NK048(tshi)003:2543: gyi snang stong ya bral du song na gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)003:2544: dang 'gal bas mi 'thad pa des na snga 'gyur
NK048(tshi)003:2545: ba'i grub mtha' rang lugas yang dag pa 'dira ni
NK048(tshi)003:2546: phung po khams dang skye mched sogs gzhi dang /
NK048(tshi)003:2547: byang phyogs so bdun dang phyin drug sogs lam dang /
NK048(tshi)003:2548: bral smin gyi yon tan 'bras bu'i chosa skad dam
NK048(tshi)003:2549: tha snyad gang la yang rtag dang mi rtag snang
NK048(tshi)003:2550: stong bden gnyis sogas rgya gang du ma chad phyogsa
NK048(tshi)003:2551: gang du ma lhung ba'am bral ba yi snang stong
NK048(tshi)003:2552: bden gnyis dbyer med dam zung 'jug kho na'i rang
NK048(tshi)003:2553: gi grub mtha' bskyangsa te 'jog pa yin pas 'di
NK048(tshi)003:2554: las gzhan du snang ba kun rdzob dang ni stong
NK048(tshi)003:2555: pa dona dam pa ya bral ba snang stong re
NK048(tshi)003:2556: re'i steng du ni gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu
NK048(tshi)003:2557: yi rnam bzhag thams cad skyon med cig 'jog mi
NK048(tshi)003:2558: nus pas gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum chara gang dang
NK048(tshi)003:2559: gang du'ang snang stong bden pa 'di gnyis la rtsis
NK048(tshi)003:2560: che chung gis 'di spang bya dang 'di blang bya'o
NK048(tshi)003:2561: zhes bzang ngan gyi dbye ba meda pas mgo mnyam
NK048(tshi)003:2562: du ye nas gnas pas na blang dor du lta
NK048(tshi)003:2564: snang ba kun rdzob 'di dang spang pa'i pha rola
NK048(tshi)003:2565: lam gzhan zhig na stong ba dona dam pa yang
NK048(tshi)003:2567: stong pa dona dama pa spang ba'i pha rol na
NK048(tshi)003:2568: kun rdzob gazhana zhig meda pa nyid yin pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)003:2569: te / dper na me nyid spang ba'i tsha ba
NK048(tshi)003:2570: dang tsha ba spang ba'i me nyid med pa bzhin
NK048(tshi)003:2571: te / no // des na gzhi lam 'bras bu'i
NK048(tshi)003:2572: bsdus pa'i chos ganga snang ba de la stong basa
NK048(tshi)003:2573: khyab pa dang ganga stong pa de la snang basa
NK048(tshi)003:2577: gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:2578: stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no zhes rgyal ba'i yum las gsungs pa'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)003:2579: me dang tsha ba bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)003:2580: de gang gi phyir na mchog gi don gzigs dam pa rnams kyis /
NK048(tshi)003:2581: snang de ci'i phyir stong pa'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)003:2582: stong de ci'i phyir snang ba'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)003:2583: zhes gsungs pa bzhin chos gang snang na de rang
NK048(tshi)003:2584: gi ngo bos ye nas mi stong ba zhig yin
NK048(tshi)003:2585: mi srid cing gal te srid na de 'ba' zhig
NK048(tshi)003:2586: ma gtogs pa gzhan phyogs dus kyis bsdus pa'i shes
NK048(tshi)003:2587: bya gcig kyang mi srid de /
NK048(tshi)003:2588: 'di ltar rtag mtha' bzung ste shes bya'i khong na
NK048(tshi)003:2589: gcig bden zhig srid na cha med gcig yin dgos
NK048(tshi)003:2590: pas gal te rdul phra rab lta bu cha med
NK048(tshi)003:2591: gcig bden par grub par yod par gyur na phyogs
NK048(tshi)003:2592: dus kyi shes pa gang ji snyed pas de 'ba'
NK048(tshi)003:2594: phyogs dus kyis bsdus pa'i 'khor 'das kyi chos gcig
NK048(tshi)003:2595: kyang mi snang bar de 'ba' zhig snang dgos pa
NK048(tshi)003:2596: dang / mthar de yul du byed pa'i yul can
NK048(tshi)003:2597: gyi shes pa yang mi srid cing de rang gi
NK048(tshi)003:2598: ngo bo la yang snang mi snang dang phra rdul
NK048(tshi)003:2599: yin min gyi cha yang mi srid pa zhig dgos
NK048(tshi)003:2600: pas phyang chad nam mkha' lta bu 'ba' zhig ma
NK048(tshi)003:2601: gtogs 'khor 'das kyi snang stong tha snyad thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:2602: shes bya la mi srid par nges par rgyun chad
NK048(tshi)003:2603: de gtan med du 'byung dgos na'ang de ltar ma
NK048(tshi)003:2604: yin par 'khor 'das kyi snang rtog bslu med kyi
NK048(tshi)003:2605: tha snyad 'gog tu med par ches bkra ba 'di
NK048(tshi)003:2606: nyid chos thams cad rang rang gi ngo bos stong
NK048(tshi)003:2607: pa'i gnad kyis rang snang ba yin par shes par
NK048(tshi)003:2608: dang / bya'o // stong pa nyid de'ang mi snang
NK048(tshi)003:2609: ba'am snang ba med na mi grub pa yin pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:2610: phyir na kun mkhyen chos rjes /
NK048(tshi)003:2611: snang ba ma yin pa'i stong pa bden pa gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:2612: char mi srid pa dang rtogs byar mi rung ba
NK048(tshi)003:2614: ji skad du mgon po klus kyang //
NK048(tshi)003:2615: gang la stong pa nyid rung ba //
NK048(tshi)003:2616: de la thams cad rung bar 'gyur //
NK048(tshi)003:2617: gang la stong nyid mi rung bas //
NK048(tshi)003:2618: de la thams cad rung mi 'gyur //
NK048(tshi)003:2621: chos 'ga' yod pa ma yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:2622: de phyir stong nyid ma gtogs par //
NK048(tshi)003:2623: chos 'ga' yod pa ma yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:2625: gang zhig stong dang rten 'byung dag /
NK048(tshi)003:2626: dbu ma'i lam du don gcig par //
NK048(tshi)003:2627: gsungs mchog ces sogs gsungs pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:2628: de'i phyir dngosa dang dngosa meda gnyis po yanga chos
NK048(tshi)003:2629: can nam stong gzhir byas nasa rang rang ngo bos
NK048(tshi)003:2630: stong dgos pa'i phyir na gang snang ba'i dngos po
NK048(tshi)003:2631: 'di kun brten nas skye shing snang ba rmi lam
NK048(tshi)003:2632: gyi bu snang ltar de dang der btagsa pa tsam
NK048(tshi)003:2633: zhiga las don la grub pa med la /
NK048(tshi)003:2634: dngos med stong ba'ang brten nas brtags pa rmi lam
NK048(tshi)003:2635: gyi bu shi ba ltar blo yisa btagsa pa tsam
NK048(tshi)003:2636: las grub pa med pas de ltar snang ba stong
NK048(tshi)003:2637: pa dngos dang dngos med snang btags kyi rten 'brel
NK048(tshi)003:2638: 'di la gnas lugs dpyod pa'i rigas pa yang dag
NK048(tshi)003:2639: pasa dpyad pa zab mos drangs pa'i snang stong dbyer
NK048(tshi)003:2640: med pa'i ngesa shesa zab mo la snang ba tha
NK048(tshi)003:2641: snyad bden pa dang stong pa don dam bden pa
NK048(tshi)003:2642: 'di gnyis snang ba thabsa dang stong pa thabs las
NK048(tshi)003:2643: byung ba nyid du 'char zhing mthong ste /
NK048(tshi)003:2644: de'i phyir de gnyis las gang gciga shos yoda par
NK048(tshi)003:2645: gyur na na gciga shos de yang meda pa nyid
NK048(tshi)003:2646: mi srid pas chu dang brlan ltar ye nas 'adu
NK048(tshi)003:2647: 'bral meda para gnas pas so sor byar med pa
NK048(tshi)003:2648: de yi phyir na gzhi lam 'bras gsum gang la
NK048(tshi)003:2649: yang snang ba dang de'i stong pa nyid dag so
NK048(tshi)003:2650: so'i char ni gnyis 'dzin can gyis shesa shing rtog
NK048(tshi)003:2651: na yanga gnas lugs kyi don du nama yanga so
NK048(tshi)003:2652: sor dbye ba ye nas med pa de yi phyir
NK048(tshi)003:2653: na snang stong 'di gnyis srad bu dkar nag bsgril
NK048(tshi)003:2654: ba dang gcig rjes su gcig byung ba lta bu
NK048(tshi)003:2655: ma yin par me dang tsha ba ltar dbyer med
NK048(tshi)003:2656: pa yin la de mtshon pa'i brdar tha snyad du
NK048(tshi)003:2657: mdo dang rgyud sder stong rten 'byung ngam thabs shes
NK048(tshi)003:2658: sam snang stong zung 'jug cesa brjod de /
NK048(tshi)003:2659: de yang lha yi bu rab rtsal sems kyi zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK048(tshi)003:2660: shes rab dang ni thabs shes pa //
NK048(tshi)003:2661: de gnyis kun tu 'dres gyur cing //
NK048(tshi)003:2663: des ni dam pa rtogs pa 'gyur //
NK048(tshi)003:2665: de ltar snang stong dbyer med pa'i gansa lugsa yang
NK048(tshi)003:2666: dag pa mthonga ba'i ngesa shesa zab mo ni snang
NK048(tshi)003:2667: stong ganga gi mathara lhung ba meda pa'i phyir snang
NK048(tshi)003:2668: stong so so'i phyogs su lhung ba'i nges shes ni
NK048(tshi)003:2669: gnas lugs mthar thug dang mthun pa'i nges shes su
NK048(tshi)003:2670: mi 'gyur ro // des na gnas lugs yang daga
NK048(tshi)003:2671: par dpyod pa'i shesa raba zab mo'i ngora gang snang
NK048(tshi)003:2672: ba dang de'i stong pa nyid 'di gnyis po yod
NK048(tshi)003:2674: med na med mnyamsa yin pas ngo bo gciga la
NK048(tshi)003:2675: ldog pa tha dad tsam gyis dbye bar 'doda cing
NK048(tshi)003:2676: / de yang dang po'i lasa can gyi gang zag
NK048(tshi)003:2677: rnams la snang stong 'di gnyis dagga bya dang 'goga
NK048(tshi)003:2678: byed lta bur so sor snang bar 'gyur la de
NK048(tshi)003:2679: tshe snang stong gnyis gcig tu 'dres pa meda pas
NK048(tshi)003:2680: da dung gcig tu 'dres pa'i snang stong zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)003:2682: des na gang snang ba'i chos kun gdod nas stong
NK048(tshi)003:2683: zhing stong pa'i gnad kyis rten 'byung du rang 'char
NK048(tshi)003:2684: bar nges shes bskyed pa dang /
NK048(tshi)003:2685: des na snang stong dbyer med dam zung 'jug dang /
NK048(tshi)003:2686: spros bral dang mnyam pa nyid de dbu ma'i lta
NK048(tshi)003:2687: rim bzhin rang rgyud la rim par bskyed cing 'byung
NK048(tshi)003:2689: de'i phyir nam zhiga na chos kun ye nas stong
NK048(tshi)003:2690: pa'i ranga bzhin nyid ni rang gsal ba'am snang bar
NK048(tshi)003:2691: 'achara ba la yida chesa thoba ste sus kyang mi
NK048(tshi)003:2692: 'phrog pa'i nges shes zab mo 'thob la /
NK048(tshi)003:2693: de yanga 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:2694: gdoda nasa te ye nas stong pa nyid yin pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:2695: gnad kyis rten 'byung du rang snang ba yin pa
NK048(tshi)003:2696: dang snang ba 'di daga rten 'byung yin pa'i gnad
NK048(tshi)003:2697: kyis stong pa yis te ye stong de'i rang bzhin
NK048(tshi)003:2698: yin pas na stong bzhina du snang la snang bzhina
NK048(tshi)003:2699: du stong par mthong bas snang stong zung 'jug gi
NK048(tshi)003:2700: ngesa shesa mchog tu skye bar 'gyur ba nyid yin
NK048(tshi)003:2701: la / de ltar gnas lugs snang stong zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)003:2702: tu snang ba 'di ni nges don gyi mdo dang
NK048(tshi)003:2703: rgyud sde dang man ngag gi lam zab mo kun
NK048(tshi)003:2704: gyi rtsa ba'am snying po ste thosa bsam yang dag
NK048(tshi)003:2705: pa'i lam gyis gnas lugs la sgro 'dogas thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:2706: legs par chod pa'i dona yang dag pa'i lta ba
NK048(tshi)003:2707: 'khrul ba'i dri ma meda pa nyid yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:2709: gnad de je bas sogs tshig bcad dgu dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:2710: gong du ji skad bstan pa'i bden gnyis sam snang
NK048(tshi)003:2711: stong zung 'jug mnyam pa chen por mthong ba'i ganda
NK048(tshi)003:2712: de gong nas gong du je basa je zaba tu
NK048(tshi)003:2713: ji bzhin rtogsa shing goms pasa rang bzhin gyis rnam
NK048(tshi)003:2714: par dag pa'i dbyings dang gnyis su med pa'i kun
NK048(tshi)003:2715: rdzob kyi snang ba gang ji snyed pa la yang
NK048(tshi)003:2716: ranga matshana tha mal gyi zhena pa rim gyis spong
NK048(tshi)003:2717: bar 'gyur basa dbyings snang ye shes lhar ye nas
NK048(tshi)003:2718: dag pa'i gnas tshul yang dag pa gnas snang mthun
NK048(tshi)003:2719: pa'i snang ba gong 'phel du dag pa'i stobs kyis
NK048(tshi)003:2720: rgyud sde'i theg pa'i lta rima gyis khyad par de
NK048(tshi)003:2721: ltar snang ba yin te mdor na snang stong ngam
NK048(tshi)003:2722: dbyings ye gnyis su med par zung du chub pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:2723: gnad mthong goms kyi khyad par las dbyings dang gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:2724: su med pa'i gnad kyis snod bcud ye nas lhar
NK048(tshi)003:2725: dag pa'i dag mnyam gyi lta ba'i mthong ba dag
NK048(tshi)003:2726: tshul gyis rgyud sde rin po che'i mtho dman gyi
NK048(tshi)003:2727: dbye ba 'jog gi gzhan du snod bcud kyi snang
NK048(tshi)003:2728: ba min pa la lhar mos pa'i khyad par las
NK048(tshi)003:2729: rgyud sde'i mtho dman du mi 'byed la /
NK048(tshi)003:2730: de'i phyir na snod bcud kyi snang ba ye nas
NK048(tshi)003:2731: lha ma yin pa la yid kyis lha dang dkyil
NK048(tshi)003:2732: 'khor du mos pas bsgom pa tsam zhiga dang /
NK048(tshi)003:2733: ye nas snod bcud dag pa'i lhar snang ba'i ngesa
NK048(tshi)003:2734: shesa kyi lta ba mthong goms kyis gdengas su gyur
NK048(tshi)003:2735: pa gnyis gnam sa bzhin yin pas mtshungsa pa'i go
NK048(tshi)003:2736: skabsa rnam pa kun tu mi srid de dper na
NK048(tshi)003:2737: dbu mas chosa rnams ye nas rang bzhin gyis sam
NK048(tshi)003:2738: bdena pa'i stong pa nyid du ngesa pa gang yina
NK048(tshi)003:2739: pa de ni dbu ma'i lta ba yina la bram
NK048(tshi)003:2740: zesa nad pa rnams la sngagsa 'debsa pa'i tshe na
NK048(tshi)003:2741: nada med par yid kyis mosa pa dbu ma'i lta
NK048(tshi)003:2743: des na tshul mthong gi spyod yul las 'das pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:2744: snang stong ngam dbyings ye gnyis su med pa'i dona
NK048(tshi)003:2745: dama zab mo'i gnas lugsa ji bzhin rtogsa pa yis
NK048(tshi)003:2746: kun rdzob kyi snang ba gang ji snyed pa ye
NK048(tshi)003:2747: nas dag pa'i lha ru sus kyang mi 'phrog pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:2748: yid chesa kyi / de las gazhana du tshul mthong
NK048(tshi)003:2749: 'khrul ba'i kun rdzob kyi snang tshul 'di kho na
NK048(tshi)003:2750: la gansa nasa snod bcud lha ru ji ltar 'grub
NK048(tshi)003:2752: de'i phyir gzung 'dzina 'khrul ba'i snang ba 'di nyid
NK048(tshi)003:2753: min pa'i 'khor ba zhes bya ba ngan pa zhig
NK048(tshi)003:2754: gzhan du grub pa meda la /
NK048(tshi)003:2755: 'khor ba de spong bar byed lam mtho dman gyi
NK048(tshi)003:2756: dbye ba ji snyed pa rnams kyang dona dama stong
NK048(tshi)003:2757: nyid kho na'i ngos nas 'jog nus pa min te
NK048(tshi)003:2758: / dona dama stong pa'i dbyings de tshul gciga nyid
NK048(tshi)003:2759: yin pa'i phyir dbye bar mi nus pas mtho dman
NK048(tshi)003:2762: chosa cana kun rdzob kyi snang ba 'od gsal ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:2763: cha ji snyed pa 'di kun chos nyid dona dama
NK048(tshi)003:2764: pa dbyings rnams par dag pa'i gshisa su son pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:2765: snang stong ngam dbyings ye zung du 'jug pa'i gnad
NK048(tshi)003:2766: mthong gomas kyi blo gros kyi nus pa gong 'phel
NK048(tshi)003:2767: du snang ba lhar ji ltar dag pa'i tshul gyi
NK048(tshi)003:2768: rim pa la brten nas bya ba yi rgyud dang
NK048(tshi)003:2769: cha mnyam spyod rgyud dang rnal 'byor rgyud dang rnal
NK048(tshi)003:2770: 'byor bla na meda pa'i rgyud de rgyud sde rin
NK048(tshi)003:2771: po che'i dbye ba bzhi'am drug tu bstan pa yin
NK048(tshi)003:2772: no // desa na snang stong bdena pa gnyis so
NK048(tshi)003:2773: so ba'am re re rkyang pa yisa rgyud sde'i mtho
NK048(tshi)003:2774: damna 'jog pa gang dag mi 'thad pas mi 'byed
NK048(tshi)003:2775: kyang ji ltar na snang stong ngam dbyings ye dbyer
NK048(tshi)003:2776: med dam bdena gnyis zung du 'jug pa yi gnas
NK048(tshi)003:2777: lugs zab mo'i lta ba la ci tsam mthong goms
NK048(tshi)003:2778: kyi yid chesa zab mo ci tsam thoba pa yi
NK048(tshi)003:2779: lta ba'i khyad par de tsam bzhin du lam nyamsa
NK048(tshi)003:2780: lena gyi bsgom pa dang spyod pa'i khyad par gyi
NK048(tshi)003:2781: gnad rnams kyang de yi rjes su 'brang ba yin
NK048(tshi)003:2782: pas de tsam gyis rgyud sde'i mtho dman gyi khyad
NK048(tshi)003:2784: de yi phyir na sangs rgyas las kyang 'phrad par
NK048(tshi)003:2785: dka' ba'i gsang sngags bla na meda pa'i rdo rje'i
NK048(tshi)003:2786: theg pa rin po che snyigs dus kyi tshe lus
NK048(tshi)003:2787: gciga gis grol ba zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang gi
NK048(tshi)003:2788: go 'phang bde myur du ster ba'i lam zab mo
NK048(tshi)003:2789: ma nora ba ji bzhina nyamsa su len par bzhed
NK048(tshi)003:2790: na sems can gyi rgyud kyi khyad par las blta
NK048(tshi)003:2791: bya chu lta bu gcig la mthong ba mi gciga
NK048(tshi)003:2792: pa rigs drug gi 'agro basa khro chu dang rnag
NK048(tshi)003:2793: dang gnas khang dang chu dang bdud rtsi dang rnal
NK048(tshi)003:2794: 'byor bas ma ma ki la sogs pa mi 'dra
NK048(tshi)003:2795: ba tha dada para mthonga ba'i chu yi dpe ji
NK048(tshi)003:2796: lta ba bzhina du rgyud daga pa'i 'phags pa chen
NK048(tshi)003:2797: pos ji ltar gzigsa pa la brten pa'i kun tu
NK048(tshi)003:2798: tha snyad pa'i tshad ma'i sgo nasa snod bcud kyi
NK048(tshi)003:2799: snang ba ye nas dag pa rab 'byams snang srid
NK048(tshi)003:2800: gzhir bzhengsa kyi lha sngags ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
NK048(tshi)003:2801: du grub cing bsgrub pa la skal ba dang ldan
NK048(tshi)003:2802: pa su zhiga yida mi ches para 'gyur te shin
NK048(tshi)003:2803: tu yid ches sus kyang bzlog tu med pa skye
NK048(tshi)003:2804: bar 'gyur ro // gsum pa de la log rtog bsal ba la gsum /
NK048(tshi)003:2805: 'khor ba'i rang bzhin ma dag par 'dod pa'i log rtog bsal ba /
NK048(tshi)003:2806: rgyud sde la lta ba'i mtho dman med par 'dod pa'i log rtog bsal ba /
NK048(tshi)003:2807: lta ba'i dbang gis theg dgur 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)003:2809: gal te de ltar sogs tshigs bcad lnga dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:2810: gal te snod bcud snang grags rigs gsum ye nas
NK048(tshi)003:2811: dag pa lha sngags ye shes su grub par gong
NK048(tshi)003:2812: du bstan pa de ltar ma shesa nasa sdug bden
NK048(tshi)003:2813: 'khor ba'i ranga bzhina las nyon kun 'byung gi 'bras
NK048(tshi)003:2814: bu phung khamsa skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i snod bcud
NK048(tshi)003:2815: snang tshul ma dag para snang ba de ltar don
NK048(tshi)003:2816: la'ang ma dag par 'dod bzhina du snang ba thams
NK048(tshi)003:2817: cad dag pa'i rten dang brtan pa'i lha ru bsgomsa
NK048(tshi)003:2818: pasa lha dang dkyil 'khor du grol bar 'dod kyang
NK048(tshi)003:2819: 'dod pa'i grub 'bras mngon du mi 'byin te dper
NK048(tshi)003:2820: na rang lus ngana skyug gi bum para 'dra ba
NK048(tshi)003:2821: yi dam bde dgyes 'jigs gsang sogs su bsgom pa
NK048(tshi)003:2822: dri bazanga gisa legs par byugsa pa dang 'drar te
NK048(tshi)003:2823: 'dra bar snod bcud lha dang dkyil 'khor min pa
NK048(tshi)003:2824: la lha dang dkyil 'khor du yin no snyam du
NK048(tshi)003:2825: bsgoms pa rdo rje theg pa'i khyad chos su semsa
NK048(tshi)003:2826: shing 'dod pa desa kye ma 'khor 'das dbyer med
NK048(tshi)003:2827: mnyam pa nyid mi phyed pa'i rdo rje theg pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:2828: lta ba dang bskyed rdzogs kyi sgom pa thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:2829: ri mo'i mar me bzhina du gzugs brnyan tsam du
NK048(tshi)003:2831: des na snod bcud kyi chos gang ji snyed pa
NK048(tshi)003:2832: gnas tshul yang dag pa'i don la lha dang dkyil
NK048(tshi)003:2833: 'khor du ye shes gnas su zin kyang de ltar
NK048(tshi)003:2834: ma rtogs pa'i tshul mthong byis pas kun tu tha
NK048(tshi)003:2835: snyad pa'i ngor gnas snang mi mthun par snang tshul
NK048(tshi)003:2836: la ma dag para snang na yanga snang dus nyid
NK048(tshi)003:2837: nas ye nas dag pa chen por gnas par ma
NK048(tshi)003:2838: mthong ba de ni tshur mthong ma dag pa 'khrul
NK048(tshi)003:2839: basa grub pa'i mtha' nyid yin la /
NK048(tshi)003:2840: 'phags pa'i gzigs pa la brten pa'i kun tu tha
NK048(tshi)003:2841: snyad pa'i tshad ma'i ngor snod bcud kyi gansa tshul
NK048(tshi)003:2842: stong pa'i dbyings dang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
NK048(tshi)003:2843: lha dang dkyil 'khor du snang ba gnas snang mthun
NK048(tshi)003:2844: pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'phags chen rnams kyis
NK048(tshi)003:2845: yang dag par gzigas pa'i dona nyid gang gis mi
NK048(tshi)003:2846: byed pa'i rdo rje'i theg pa'i grub pa'i mthar smra
NK048(tshi)003:2847: zhing mchog tu 'dod pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:2848: de'i phyir snod bcud thams cad ye nas lha'i dkyil
NK048(tshi)003:2849: 'khor du daga pa'i rten dang brten para min no
NK048(tshi)003:2850: snyam du ma dag par lta bzhina du dag pa
NK048(tshi)003:2851: lha'i rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor du yin no
NK048(tshi)003:2852: snyamsa pa'i sgom pa ganga yin pa de gnyis snang
NK048(tshi)003:2853: mun ltar 'agla 'du'i ranga rtagsa shin tu gsal bar
NK048(tshi)003:2854: ngomas pa yi lam de ni rdo rje theg pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:2855: lam gyi gzugs brnyan las kyang gzugsa brnyan nyid yin
NK048(tshi)003:2856: te de ltar ci tsam 'bad pas bsgom par byas
NK048(tshi)003:2857: kyang mthar 'bras snod bcud lha dang dkyil 'khor du
NK048(tshi)003:2858: dag pa'am grol ba nyid mi thob ste /
NK048(tshi)003:2859: dper na sol ba nag po 'bad pa'i ci tsam
NK048(tshi)003:2860: bkrus pasa kyang mi dkar ba'am dkar bar mi 'gyur
NK048(tshi)003:2861: ba bzhina no // gal te snod bcud ye nas
NK048(tshi)003:2862: lhar dag pa nyid mina kyang lha yina no snyamsa
NK048(tshi)003:2863: pas bcosa ma'i bsgom pa de tsam gyis 'bras bu
NK048(tshi)003:2864: snod bcud lhar dag pa'am grol ba thob para 'gyur
NK048(tshi)003:2865: na ni don dam dpyod pa'i rigs lam gyis ngo
NK048(tshi)003:2866: bos sam bdena pa'i stong pa nyid la ngesa shesa
NK048(tshi)003:2867: ci yang meda bzhina du phyi rol mu stegsa nyi
NK048(tshi)003:2868: ma pa rnams kyis snang ba spangsa pa'am med pasa
NK048(tshi)003:2869: stong pa sogas bsgom pasa kyang rang bzhin nam bden
NK048(tshi)003:2870: pas stong pa nyid yang dag par mthong ste nyon
NK048(tshi)003:2871: mongas pa spong bar 'gyur rigs dgos pas shin tu
NK048(tshi)003:2874: bya spyod bla med sogs tshigs bcad gsum dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:2875: de la rdo rje theg pa bya ba spyod pa
NK048(tshi)003:2876: rnal 'byor bla na meda pa sogs rgyud sde bzhi'am
NK048(tshi)003:2877: drug la gnas lugs mthong ba'i lta ba'i mtho damna
NK048(tshi)003:2878: ci yang meda par gyur na shin tu mi 'thad
NK048(tshi)003:2880: de ji ltar na snang srid thams cad ye nas
NK048(tshi)003:2881: bzang ngan gnyis chos dang bral ba'i daga mnyam chen
NK048(tshi)003:2882: por rtogsa pa yi lta ba la goms pa gdengas
NK048(tshi)003:2883: du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa mchog yin bzhina du
NK048(tshi)003:2884: badga dam tshig pa dang lha ye shes pa la
NK048(tshi)003:2885: bazanga ngana dang / gatsanga ba dang mi gtsang ba
NK048(tshi)003:2886: sogs 'dod yon la blang dor so sora ni gnas
NK048(tshi)003:2887: lugs la med pas ma mthonga bzhina du blang dor
NK048(tshi)003:2888: med pa la blang dor gyi dbye ba sna tshogs
NK048(tshi)003:2889: pas ngal ba dang du len na rang gi ranga
NK048(tshi)003:2890: la shes bzhin du blang dor sna tshogs pas don
NK048(tshi)003:2891: med par sdug bsngal gyis gnod pa byed par zad
NK048(tshi)003:2892: bazanga ngana dang / do // yanga na bya rgyud
NK048(tshi)003:2893: sogs rgyud sde 'og ma bzhina du bdag dang lha
NK048(tshi)003:2894: la bzang ngan dang gtsang sme sogs blang dora yoda
NK048(tshi)003:2895: pa nyid du so sor zhena cing chags bzhina du
NK048(tshi)003:2896: bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi dag mnyam gyi dgongs
NK048(tshi)003:2897: spyod zab mo sbyor sgrol dang sha chang sogas blang
NK048(tshi)003:2898: dora med par mnyam pa nyid yin ces 'dod yon
NK048(tshi)003:2899: la rang gar spyod par byed na bla na med
NK048(tshi)003:2900: pa'i dag mnyam blang dor med pa'i dgongs spyod zab
NK048(tshi)003:2901: mo nyams 'og du ma chud bzhin du de ltar
NK048(tshi)003:2902: spyod pa ni ma rtogsa tho co'i spyod pa zhes
NK048(tshi)003:2903: mdo rgyud kun nas rgyal bas yang yang smad para
NK048(tshi)003:2904: 'gyur ba de mina nam ste yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:2906: ji lta ji ltar sogs tshigs bcad gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:2907: de la ji lta ji ltar gansa lugas snang stong
NK048(tshi)003:2908: ngam dag mnyam dbyer med zung 'jug dona je bas
NK048(tshi)003:2909: je zab gong 'phel du mthong ba'i rim pa'i ngesa
NK048(tshi)003:2910: shesa zab mo lta bar brjod cing 'dod la lta
NK048(tshi)003:2911: basa ji ltar ji ltar gtan la phaba cing thaga
NK048(tshi)003:2912: bacada pa de dang de bzhina du bsgom pas nyams
NK048(tshi)003:2913: su blang ba dang spyod pasa la dor zhing skyong
NK048(tshi)003:2914: dgos pa yin la des na theg pa gong 'og
NK048(tshi)003:2915: gi rim pa ni lta ba'i mtho dman gyis 'byed
NK048(tshi)003:2916: dgos pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan du bsam par mi
NK048(tshi)003:2917: bya'o // de lta na'ang theg pa'i rim pa dgur ma ngesa so she na /
NK048(tshi)003:2918: de ni shin tu nges te /
NK048(tshi)003:2919: ji lta na nanga ba'i grub mtha' kun las dam'a
NK048(tshi)003:2920: shosa nyan thos kyi theg pa nasa mthar phyin rdo
NK048(tshi)003:2921: rje rtse mo'i a ti yo ga'i theg pa'i bar
NK048(tshi)003:2922: sde tshana dgu yi grangsa su ni 'jog pa'i rgyu
NK048(tshi)003:2923: matshana yang dag pa dang dbang po rab 'bring tha
NK048(tshi)003:2924: gsum re re la'ang dbang po tha ma'i tha ma
NK048(tshi)003:2925: tha ma'i 'bring tha ma'i rab sogs gsum gsum du
NK048(tshi)003:2926: dbye ba la sogs pa yod pa'i phyir yin te
NK048(tshi)003:2927: / dper na thega pa mtho damna dang dbye bsdu
NK048(tshi)003:2928: mang du yod kyang theg pa gsum la sogas par
NK048(tshi)003:2929: gdul bya'i khams dbang mos pa sogs la ltos te
NK048(tshi)003:2930: dgongas pas bzhag pa ji lta ba de bzhina du
NK048(tshi)003:2932: bzhi pa don bsdu ba ni /
NK048(tshi)003:2933: des na nang gi sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:2934: gong du ji skad bstan pa des na bden gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:2935: zung 'jug gi gnas lugs dag pa chen po mthong
NK048(tshi)003:2936: ba'i nang gi ye shesa kyi stobsa /
NK048(tshi)003:2937: ji lta ji ltar stobsa 'phela bar gyur ba de
NK048(tshi)003:2938: lta de ltar snod bcud rnams gnas snang mthun par
NK048(tshi)003:2939: dag par mthong ba dang nang gi ye shes kyi
NK048(tshi)003:2940: stobs ci tsam zhen pa de tsam du gnas snang
NK048(tshi)003:2941: mi mthun pa ma daga par mthong ba ste de
NK048(tshi)003:2942: ltar dag pa dang ma dag par so sora mthonga
NK048(tshi)003:2943: ba yin la / de yi phyir snang stong ye
NK048(tshi)003:2944: nas 'du 'bral spang bas dbyer meda dam zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)003:2945: tu gnas pa gzhi yin la /
NK048(tshi)003:2946: gzhi de bdena gnyis zung 'jug dbyer meda pa'i tshul
NK048(tshi)003:2947: gyis ji lta ba bzhin du rtogsa pa lam yin
NK048(tshi)003:2948: la / lam de ji bzhina gomsa pa mthar phyin
NK048(tshi)003:2949: pa lasa chos gzugs kyi sku gnyis zung 'jug mthar
NK048(tshi)003:2950: thug gi ye shesa mchog nyid thob par gyur pa
NK048(tshi)003:2952: stong de ci'i phyir rang bzhin snang ba'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)003:2953: snang de ci'i phyir ngo bos stong pa'i phyir //
NK048(tshi)003:2954: snang stong ye nas 'du 'bral snang pa'i phyir //
NK048(tshi)003:2955: zung 'jug 'di las gzhan gang gtso zhes bya //
NK048(tshi)003:2957: dri lan drug pa snang ba gcig nyid mi gcig
NK048(tshi)003:2958: par mthong ba'i thun mong gi blta bya gang 'thad
NK048(tshi)003:2959: la gnyis / mi 'thad pa gzhan lugs so sor dgag /
NK048(tshi)003:2962: chu gcig 'gro ba sogs tshigs bcad bcu bzhis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:2963: 'di ltar snang ba'i chu gciga la rigs drug gi
NK048(tshi)003:2964: 'gro ba las snang mi gcig pa so so la
NK048(tshi)003:2965: khro chu dang rnag la sogs pa mi gciga pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:2966: dngosa pora snang ba'i tshe na de la la las
NK048(tshi)003:2967: thun mong gi blta bya yod par 'dod pa ste
NK048(tshi)003:2968: de gang zhe na chu nyid yina la de mthonga
NK048(tshi)003:2969: ba'i yul cana rnams kun kyang tshad ma yina zhes
NK048(tshi)003:2971: chu la ranga bzhina gyis grub pa'i blta bya thun
NK048(tshi)003:2972: mong pa 'ag'a zhig tshad mas grub pa yod cing
NK048(tshi)003:2973: rigs drug gi 'gro bas de dang de mthong zhing
NK048(tshi)003:2974: yul can rnams tshad ma yin na chu gtsang ma
NK048(tshi)003:2975: la rnag tu mthong ba la sogs pa'i rigs drug
NK048(tshi)003:2976: gis mthong ba so so pa la tshad ma dang
NK048(tshi)003:2977: tshad mina gyi dbye ba med pas 'khrul ba zhig
NK048(tshi)003:2979: gal te so so'i yul snang rnag dang chu sogs
NK048(tshi)003:2980: rang rang la gang snang ba de gzhan dang thun
NK048(tshi)003:2981: mong mina par gyur na ka ba dang bum pa
NK048(tshi)003:2982: gnyis mthonga ba'i blo la thun mong ba'i blta bya
NK048(tshi)003:2983: med pa bzhina du thun mong gi blta bya mi
NK048(tshi)003:2984: srid par 'gyur bas blta bya thun mong pa zhig
NK048(tshi)003:2986: yang la lasa thun mong gi blta bya rlan gshera
NK048(tshi)003:2987: tsam zhig yina no zer ba yang mi 'thad de
NK048(tshi)003:2988: / rigs drug gi 'gro ba thun monga du rang
NK048(tshi)003:2989: rang so sora rlan gshera tsam ma loga par blta
NK048(tshi)003:2990: ba yod cing de mthong ba yin na /
NK048(tshi)003:2991: de 'dra'i thun mong gi rlan gsher tsam de la
NK048(tshi)003:2992: rigs drug gi 'gro bas chu rnag sogs mi gcig
NK048(tshi)003:2993: pa'i mthong snang mi 'dra ba mang du byung zhing
NK048(tshi)003:2994: phan tshun gciga gi mthonga ba de nyid gcig shos
NK048(tshi)003:2995: la snang nas mthong ba med pa yi chu dang
NK048(tshi)003:2996: rnag la sogas par snang ba de las gzhan pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:2997: snang gzhi rlan gsher de gang zhig yin te de
NK048(tshi)003:2999: gzhan yanga gzugs med nam mkha'a mtha' yasa para rlan
NK048(tshi)003:3000: gsher tsam de nyid gang snang ba thams cad nam
NK048(tshi)003:3001: mkha' 'ba' zhig tu snang ba'i gzhi ru ga la
NK048(tshi)003:3003: gcig dang tha dad du brtags na yang thun mong
NK048(tshi)003:3004: gi blta bya rlan gsher tsam de chu nyid dang
NK048(tshi)003:3005: gciga yina na de nyid chu khor nar snang ba
NK048(tshi)003:3006: las rnag la sogas pa gzhan pa nyid du rnam
NK048(tshi)003:3007: pa kun tu snang mi rung ste de chu nyid
NK048(tshi)003:3008: du snang ba'i phyir dper na chu nyid la chur
NK048(tshi)003:3009: snang zhing dmigs pa bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)003:3010: gal te rlan gsher de chu la sogas pa lasa
NK048(tshi)003:3011: gzhan tha dad du yod par gyur na rlan gshera
NK048(tshi)003:3012: tsam de nyid ci yanga dmigas pa mina te chu
NK048(tshi)003:3013: la sogs pa gzhan snang zhing dmigs pa'i phyir dper
NK048(tshi)003:3014: na chu nyid dmigs pa gzhan dmigs pa ma yin
NK048(tshi)003:3015: pa bzhin no // de phyir chu dang rnag sogs
NK048(tshi)003:3016: mi gciga pa'i mthong snang mi 'dra ba so so
NK048(tshi)003:3017: ba la thun monga gi blta bya 'adi'o zhes gcig
NK048(tshi)003:3018: tu grub pa zhig mi srid cinga tha snyad du'ang
NK048(tshi)003:3019: thun monga du mthun par snang ba'i dngosa po gcig
NK048(tshi)003:3020: nyid la mi 'dra ba so sora snang ba sna
NK048(tshi)003:3021: tshogs pa yang mi srid pa'i phyir te dper na
NK048(tshi)003:3022: ka bum sogs mi 'dra bar so sor snang ba
NK048(tshi)003:3023: la thun mong gi blta bya zhig mi srid cing
NK048(tshi)003:3024: las snang mthun pa'i mi rnams la'ang thun mong du
NK048(tshi)003:3025: mthun par snang ba'i chu gcig nyid la chu ru
NK048(tshi)003:3026: snang ba las rnag la sogs par mi 'dra bar
NK048(tshi)003:3027: so sor snang ba yang mi srid pa bzhin no
NK048(tshi)003:3028: pa bzhin no // // des na phan tshun ltos
NK048(tshi)003:3029: nasa chu dang rnag la sogs pa mthong ba mi
NK048(tshi)003:3030: gcig par rnam par bzhag pa tsam zhiga lasa gzhan
NK048(tshi)003:3031: du rigs pas dpyad pa'i chu dang rlan gsher sogs
NK048(tshi)003:3032: thun mong gi blta gzhi'am blta bya zhig khas lena
NK048(tshi)003:3033: par byed na de gansa lugsa don dam pa yin
NK048(tshi)003:3034: para grub dgosa pasa de ltar na de rigs pas
NK048(tshi)003:3035: dpyad bzod du grub pa la sogs par 'gyur bas
NK048(tshi)003:3036: ganga ltar brtags pa'am mkhas blang kyang mi 'athada pa
NK048(tshi)003:3038: gal te mthun par snang ba'i thun monga gi blta
NK048(tshi)003:3039: bya zhig gtan nas meda par gyur na semsa tsam
NK048(tshi)003:3040: pa'i 'dod pa bzhina du gzugs la sogs pa'i yul
NK048(tshi)003:3041: phyi don du grub pa meda para nang shesa pa
NK048(tshi)003:3042: nyid bag chags kyi dbang gis gzugs la sogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3043: yul snang gzung rnam du snang bar khas len dgos
NK048(tshi)003:3044: na yang / de ni yang dag par 'thad pa
NK048(tshi)003:3045: ma yina te yul don la grub pa meda pa
NK048(tshi)003:3046: de bzhina du nang 'dzina pa sems de yang dona
NK048(tshi)003:3047: la grub pa meda para 'dra ba'am mnyam pa yin
NK048(tshi)003:3048: la gzung 'dzina gnyis po'ang tha snyad kun rdzob tsam
NK048(tshi)003:3049: du snang bar yang mnyam pa yin pa'i phyir na
NK048(tshi)003:3050: ganga snang ba de la don dam dpyod pa'i rigs
NK048(tshi)003:3051: pas brtagsa na gzung 'dzina gnyis las 'dzin pa yod
NK048(tshi)003:3052: la bzung ba meda do zhes don la so sor
NK048(tshi)003:3053: phye ba 'di mi 'thad de ji ltar na tha
NK048(tshi)003:3054: snyad du gzugs la sogs pa yul snang gzung bar
NK048(tshi)003:3055: snang ba yod kyang don du grub pa med pas
NK048(tshi)003:3056: rdzun pa yin pa de ltar 'dzina para snang yanga
NK048(tshi)003:3057: dpyad na ma grub pas rdzun pa yin pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)003:3058: na yang / ro // des na sher mdo las /
NK048(tshi)003:3059: yul sems gnyis mtshungs par bkag cing mngon pa'i chos las mtshungs par yod ces gsungs pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:3060: gong du ji skad bstan pa de phyir snang stong
NK048(tshi)003:3061: ris su ma chad pas rgya chad phyogs lhung bral
NK048(tshi)003:3062: ba'i snang tsam thun monga gi blta bya ni mi
NK048(tshi)003:3063: dang lha la sogs par chu dang bdud rtsi la
NK048(tshi)003:3064: sogs pa mthun par snang ba dang mi snang ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:3065: gzhir yod para grub phyir de meda para 'dod du
NK048(tshi)003:3066: mi rung ste / dper na ma brtags ma dpyad
NK048(tshi)003:3067: pa'i snang tsam gyi zlos gar mkhan tha snyad du
NK048(tshi)003:3068: yod na lha la sogs pa'i zlos gara gyi rnam
NK048(tshi)003:3069: 'gyur mi 'dra ba sna tshogs pa mthonga bar rung
NK048(tshi)003:3070: ba dang med na mi rung ba la sogas pa
NK048(tshi)003:3071: mi rung ste / bzhin no // de yang snang
NK048(tshi)003:3072: stong ris su ma chad pa'i yod tsam 'di kho
NK048(tshi)003:3073: na lasa ma gtogsa pa'i yoda pa gzhan zhig nasa
NK048(tshi)003:3074: kyang grub pa mi srid pas med la snang stong
NK048(tshi)003:3075: ris su ma chad pa'i snang tsam 'di nyid gal
NK048(tshi)003:3076: te meda par gyur na ni tha snyad kyi snang
NK048(tshi)003:3077: ba 'di kun gtan nas mi snang bar thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:3078: nam mkha'a 'ba' zhig lta bur ci yang med par
NK048(tshi)003:3079: 'gyur dgos pas de ni shin tu mi 'thad do
NK048(tshi)003:3080: mi rung ste / bzhin no // // de lta
NK048(tshi)003:3081: na yang phyi dang nanga gi 'khrul ba'i rkyen sna
NK048(tshi)003:3082: tshogs kyis ni dona gyi gnas tshul dngosa ji lta
NK048(tshi)003:3083: ba bzhina du mi mthong bar rnam par gzhan dang
NK048(tshi)003:3084: gzhan du phyin ci log tu mthong bar 'gyur ba
NK048(tshi)003:3085: dper na sgyu ma'i sngagsa btabs pa'i stobs kyis shing
NK048(tshi)003:3086: bu sogs la de dang der mi mthong bar rta
NK048(tshi)003:3087: dang glang po che la sogs par snang zhing mthong
NK048(tshi)003:3088: mi rung ste / bzhin no // // ba bzhin
NK048(tshi)003:3089: no // de phyir mthun par snang ba'i thun monga
NK048(tshi)003:3090: gi blta bya ni 'di kho na'o zhesa dpyad pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3091: gzhi zhig ngesa par bazhaga tu mi rung ngo zhes
NK048(tshi)003:3092: mi rung ste / bzhin no // // ba bzhin no // so // gnyis pa la gsum /
NK048(tshi)003:3093: thun mong du spyir bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)003:3094: dag mnyam dbyer med chen por bye brag tu bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)003:3095: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgo nas don bsdu ba'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3097: snang stong zung 'jug mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa dang /
NK048(tshi)003:3098: de la tshad ma dang tshad min mi 'thad pa'i rtsod pa spang ba'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3100: des na rang gi lugs sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3101: ji skad bstan pa desa na 'thad ldan rang gi
NK048(tshi)003:3102: lugsa la ni rgya chad phyogs lhung bral ba'i snang
NK048(tshi)003:3103: stong risa su ma chad pa'i gzhi snang stong dbyer
NK048(tshi)003:3104: med mnyam pa nyid rang gi ngo bo stong dang
NK048(tshi)003:3105: mi stong la sogs pa'i spros pa cir yanga ma
NK048(tshi)003:3106: grub pa de nyid gang cir snang ba thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:3107: kun la mnyam pa yin pa'i phyir dngosa po gcig
NK048(tshi)003:3108: nyid dngos po sna tshogas para yanga snang bar shin
NK048(tshi)003:3110: ganga la snang stong mi 'gal bar ris su ma
NK048(tshi)003:3111: chad pas snang stong dbyer med nyid rung ba'am 'thad
NK048(tshi)003:3112: pa yin na de la snang dang mi snang tshad
NK048(tshi)003:3113: ma dang tshad min thun mong gi blta bya la
NK048(tshi)003:3114: sogs pa'i tha snyad thamsa cada rung para ches 'thad
NK048(tshi)003:3115: par 'gyur la / ganga la snang stong dbyer med
NK048(tshi)003:3116: 'gal bar rtog pas mi runga ba de la snang
NK048(tshi)003:3117: dang mi snang sogs tha snyad thams cada rung bar
NK048(tshi)003:3118: mi 'gyur te tha snyad thams cad rgyun chad pas
NK048(tshi)003:3121: rang lugs la mngon rjes kyi tshad ma grub cing don med ma yin par bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)003:3122: gzhan la tshad ma'i rnam bzhag mi 'thad par bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)003:3123: de phyir tshad mar bsgrub ba'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3125: 'o na tshad ma sogs tshigs bcad lnga dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3126: 'o na gang snang kun la mnyam pa nyid yin
NK048(tshi)003:3127: pa de'i phyir tshad ma dang tshad mina gyi rnam
NK048(tshi)003:3128: dbye'ang 'athada pa meda par 'gyur ce na /
NK048(tshi)003:3129: tshul mthong gi shes pa 'phral gyis 'khrul rgyus ma
NK048(tshi)003:3130: bslad pa'i ngor chu la sogs pa gang snang ba
NK048(tshi)003:3131: de nyid rnag la sogs pa gzhan pa nyid du
NK048(tshi)003:3132: ma snang ba'am mi snang ba de yi phyir na
NK048(tshi)003:3133: tshul mthonga gi shes pa 'khrul rgyus ma bslad pa
NK048(tshi)003:3134: des yul gzhal bya rang mtshan mi 'grub pa ma
NK048(tshi)003:3135: yina pas shin tu 'grub par 'gyur te /
NK048(tshi)003:3136: ganga gi phyir chu la sogs pa'i dngosa por gang
NK048(tshi)003:3137: snang ba kun ranga bzhina gyis rang min gzhan thams
NK048(tshi)003:3138: cad las log pa'i sra gsher sogs rang rang gi
NK048(tshi)003:3139: ngo bo thun mong ma yin pa la gansa pa
NK048(tshi)003:3140: nyid yin pas de la ldog pa'i sgo nas gciga
NK048(tshi)003:3141: dang tha dada la sogs pa'i rnam dbye byar rung
NK048(tshi)003:3142: ba'i gzhal bya rang mtshan dang de yang dag par
NK048(tshi)003:3143: 'jal ba'i tshad ma bslu med du grub pa nyid
NK048(tshi)003:3144: kyi phyir ro // de yi phyir na gzhal bya
NK048(tshi)003:3145: dang 'jal byed phan tshun ltos te gzhal bya gzhal
NK048(tshi)003:3146: ba'i tshad ma nyid grub kyi ltos pa med par
NK048(tshi)003:3147: ranga dabnga kho nas chos rnams la ni gzhal bya
NK048(tshi)003:3148: dang 'jal byed tshad mas grub par 'jog pa nyid
NK048(tshi)003:3149: kyi phyir ro // ma yin te / gal te
NK048(tshi)003:3150: rang dbang kho nas grub par gyur na gnas lugas
NK048(tshi)003:3151: dpyad bzod nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
NK048(tshi)003:3152: des na chu gcig po la zhes pa de yang
NK048(tshi)003:3153: 'khrul rgyus ma bslad pas chu ranga 'dzina gyis tshad
NK048(tshi)003:3154: mas bslu med du grub kyang der ltos med du
NK048(tshi)003:3155: rang dbang kho nasa grub pa nyid min te /
NK048(tshi)003:3156: 'di ltar dona dama dpyod pasa dpyad bzod med pas
NK048(tshi)003:3157: chu tshad mas mi 'grub cinga yi dwagsa kyi shes
NK048(tshi)003:3158: ngora yanga chu de tshad mas grub par mi 'gyur
NK048(tshi)003:3159: ba'i phyir ro // de phyir ltos te chu sogs
NK048(tshi)003:3160: rang sogs rang 'dzin gyi yul gzhal bya rnams la
NK048(tshi)003:3161: 'khrul rgyus ma bslad pas mangna sum tshad ma dang
NK048(tshi)003:3162: ba'i phyir ro // / rtags yang dag gis rjes
NK048(tshi)003:3163: dapaga tshad mas drangs pa'i nges pa na de yi
NK048(tshi)003:3164: yul rnams la tshad mas ji ltar bcad pa de
NK048(tshi)003:3165: ltar blang dor 'jug ldog gang don la de ltar
NK048(tshi)003:3166: bslu ba med pa'am mi baslu ba'i phyir te des
NK048(tshi)003:3167: na tshad ma legs par grub cing des ji ltar
NK048(tshi)003:3168: bcad pa ltar bslu ba med pas de bstan pa
NK048(tshi)003:3169: dona med pa ma yina no //
NK048(tshi)003:3170: de'i shugs kyis ldog phyogs tshad min 'khrul ba nyid du yang bstan no //
NK048(tshi)003:3172: des na chu gcig sogs tshigs bcad gsum dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3173: des na chu gciga la zhesa pa de yang rang
NK048(tshi)003:3174: 'dzin mi yi mthonga ba 'khrul rgyus ma bslad pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3175: tshad ma kho na la ltos nasa tshad mas grub
NK048(tshi)003:3176: pa'i chu blta gzhir bzhag ste gzhan lha nyid la
NK048(tshi)003:3177: ltos na ni tshad mas grub pa'i bdud rtsi gcig
NK048(tshi)003:3178: nyid la blta gzhira 'dzina dgos kyi gzhan chu dang
NK048(tshi)003:3179: rnag la blta gzhir mi 'dzin la de ltar ma
NK048(tshi)003:3180: yin par gang yang tshad mas grub pa med na
NK048(tshi)003:3181: chu phor pa gang lta bu la yi dwags kyis
NK048(tshi)003:3182: rnag dang mis chu dang lhas bdud rtsi ru mthong
NK048(tshi)003:3183: bar gyur pa'i tshe de gsum ka gzhi gcig po
NK048(tshi)003:3184: de la tshangs zhing tshogas pa yod pa min la
NK048(tshi)003:3185: de gsum po las gciga kyang tshad mas grub pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3186: blta gzhi min na de gsum ma yin pa lasa
NK048(tshi)003:3187: dngosa po gzhan dang gzhan zhiga tu mthonga ba 'adi'o
NK048(tshi)003:3188: zhes tshad mas sgrub mi nus pas blta gzhi gtan
NK048(tshi)003:3189: gnas med par 'gyur bas mthonga don rnag la sogs
NK048(tshi)003:3190: pa gsum ka meda par 'gyur basa /
NK048(tshi)003:3191: de ltar na misa mthong ba'i chu 'di yang chu
NK048(tshi)003:3192: nyid min par gyur na de las gazhana zhiga chu
NK048(tshi)003:3193: ru mthong ba 'adi'o zhes 'thad pa sgrub tu med
NK048(tshi)003:3194: pas mi 'thad pa kho na yin pasa chu zhes
NK048(tshi)003:3195: bya ba gtan meda du thal bar 'gyur ro //
NK048(tshi)003:3196: de lta'i lugs de la'ang tha snyad pa'i tshad ma
NK048(tshi)003:3197: yi rnam par bzhag pa kun gtan nas 'thad para
NK048(tshi)003:3198: mi 'gyur de la de ltar na tshad min gyi
NK048(tshi)003:3199: rnam bzhag rnams kyang mi 'thad pas blang dor 'jug
NK048(tshi)003:3200: ldog thams cad don med par 'gyur ro //
NK048(tshi)003:3202: gnas skabs gnyis su bzhag pa /
NK048(tshi)003:3203: mthar thug gcig tu bsgrub pa /
NK048(tshi)003:3204: de phyir dag pa chen por bsgrub pa thun mong min pa'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3206: ma dag tshur rol mthong ba'i tha snyad tshad ma /
NK048(tshi)003:3207: dag pa'i gzigs pa la brten pa'i tha snyad tshad ma'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3209: de phyir 'phral gyi sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3210: de phyir phyi nang gi 'phral gyi 'khrul rgyu yisa
NK048(tshi)003:3211: ma bslad pa'i dabnga po'i yul du snang ba'i dngos
NK048(tshi)003:3212: po de nyid tshad grub bam rang mtshan yina pa
NK048(tshi)003:3213: re zhig tshur mthong de'i ngor bsgrub dgosa te dper
NK048(tshi)003:3214: na dbang shes la chu nyid chu dang smig rgyur
NK048(tshi)003:3215: chur snang ba la chur snang ba'i shes pa 'phral
NK048(tshi)003:3216: gyi 'khrul rgyus ma bslad pas ma 'khrul ba'i shes
NK048(tshi)003:3217: pa tshad ma dang smig rgyur chur snang ba'i shes
NK048(tshi)003:3218: pa 'khrul rgyus bslad pas 'khrul ba'i shes pa tshad
NK048(tshi)003:3219: min dang / de gnyis yul yang tha snyad du
NK048(tshi)003:3220: chu la rang mtshan yod pa dang smig rgyu la
NK048(tshi)003:3221: rang mtshan med pa'i khyad par bzhina du shes par
NK048(tshi)003:3222: min dang / bya'o // desa na gnas skabsa su
NK048(tshi)003:3223: yi dwagsa nyid la sngon lasa kyi sgrib pa ngan
NK048(tshi)003:3224: pasa mi rnams kyis mthong ba'i chu gtsang ma nyid
NK048(tshi)003:3225: la rnag tu snang yanga sngon gyi las ngan pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3226: skyon nam sgrib pa de nyid bral ba'am sel bar
NK048(tshi)003:3227: gyur ba na da gdoda dam da gzod mi rnams
NK048(tshi)003:3228: bzhin du chu ru snang zhing mthong ba'i phyir de
NK048(tshi)003:3229: la ltos nasa re zhig mis chur mthonga ba de
NK048(tshi)003:3230: nyid tshad ma dang gazhana pa yi dwags la las
NK048(tshi)003:3231: kyi sgrib pa ngan pa'i skyon gyis bsgyur bas rnag
NK048(tshi)003:3232: tu mthong ba'i phyir re zhiga tshur mthong de'i ngor
NK048(tshi)003:3233: chu nyid ni tshad mara bsgrubsa pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:3234: de bzhin du chu dang bcud rtsi la sogs pa la'ang 'dra'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3236: mthar thug rig pas sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3237: gnas yongs su gyur pas tha snyad kyi gnas tshul
NK048(tshi)003:3238: mthar thug pa ji bzhin mthong ba'i dag pa'i gzigs
NK048(tshi)003:3239: pa la brten pa'i tshad ma'i rigas pas dpyad pa
NK048(tshi)003:3240: na ma dag tshur rol mthong ba'i snang ba chu
NK048(tshi)003:3241: dang rnag la sogs pa de dag kun kyang baga
NK048(tshi)003:3242: chagas 'khrul ba'i dbang gis snang ba ste /
NK048(tshi)003:3243: de las gazhana du bag chags 'khrul snang spangs bas
NK048(tshi)003:3244: gnas yongs su gyur pa'i 'phags mchog rnams la mi
NK048(tshi)003:3245: rnams kyi mthong ba'i chu 'di nyid daga pa yisa
NK048(tshi)003:3246: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams dang yum chen ma ma
NK048(tshi)003:3247: ki yi skur yanga snang zhing mthong ba'i phyir na
NK048(tshi)003:3248: mi yisa mthong ba yi chu de kho na gzhan
NK048(tshi)003:3249: la ltos pa med par mtha' gciga tu tshad mar
NK048(tshi)003:3250: mi 'grub pas bsgrub tu runga ba ma yina la
NK048(tshi)003:3251: des na sngon las ngan pa'i bag chags 'khrul pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3252: sgrib pa'i rkyen ma dag pa rnams je dag pas
NK048(tshi)003:3253: zhes je dag je dag tu ci tsam song ba
NK048(tshi)003:3254: de nyid du mthong ba 'oga ma 'og ma la
NK048(tshi)003:3255: ltos nas mthong ba gong ma gonga ma tshad ma
NK048(tshi)003:3256: ru khasa blang ba 'di nyid ni tha snyad dpyod
NK048(tshi)003:3257: pa'i rigs pas grub cing gnod pa med pas 'athada
NK048(tshi)003:3258: pa yang dag pa nyid yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:3259: gnyis pa mthar thug gcig tu bsgrub pa ni /
NK048(tshi)003:3260: mthar thug de kho na sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3261: gnas lugs mathara thug chos kyi dbyings de kho na
NK048(tshi)003:3262: nyid ni bden gnyis dbyer med dam zung 'jug gcig
NK048(tshi)003:3263: lasa gnyis su med pa'i phyir de kho na nyid
NK048(tshi)003:3264: ji bzhin mthonga ba'i tshad ma'ang mthar thug pa gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:3265: su med pas gcig nyid yin te tshad ma mthar
NK048(tshi)003:3266: thug gnyis pa zhig mi srid pas meda do //
NK048(tshi)003:3267: de phyir gansa lugs mthar thug bdena pa gcig pu dag mnyam zung 'jug ste /
NK048(tshi)003:3268: de ji lta ba bzhin du gzigs pa'i tshad ma
NK048(tshi)003:3269: yang rang byung gi ye shesa rnam pa thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:3270: mkhyen pa gcig pu nyid las gzhan du med la
NK048(tshi)003:3271: gnas lugs de nyid mthong ba la sgrib pa'i spang
NK048(tshi)003:3272: bya gang ji snyed pa yang ma riga pa ste
NK048(tshi)003:3273: rmongs pa'i rang bzhin gciga pu lasa meda pa'am ma
NK048(tshi)003:3274: 'das pa'i phyir na sangs rgyas dang sems can riga
NK048(tshi)003:3275: pa dang ma riga pa tsam du snga 'gyur gyi
NK048(tshi)003:3276: rgyud dang man ngag rnams su bstan pa nyid shin
NK048(tshi)003:3277: tu zab mo'i don nges pa'i snying po mthar thug
NK048(tshi)003:3278: yang dag pa'o // gsum pa de'i phyir dag pa
NK048(tshi)003:3279: chen por bsgrub pa thun mong ma yin pa ni
NK048(tshi)003:3280: yang dag pa'o // / de phyir tshad ma'i sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3281: ji skad bstan pa de phyir dag pa'i gzigs pa
NK048(tshi)003:3282: la bsten pa'i tha snyad tshad ma'i tshul 'di yisa
NK048(tshi)003:3283: phyi nang gi snang ba 'di thams cad kun gdod
NK048(tshi)003:3284: nas ranga bzhina gyis rnam par dag pa'i zhing dang
NK048(tshi)003:3285: lhar bsgrub pa 'di ni snga 'gyur rdo rje theg
NK048(tshi)003:3286: pa'i rang lugsa zab zab mo kho na ste /
NK048(tshi)003:3287: de nyid ji lta ba bzhin du gzigs shing legs
NK048(tshi)003:3288: par ston par mdzad pa'i kun mkhyen ronga zoma ma
NK048(tshi)003:3289: ha pan+di ta yi snang ba lha bsgrub la sogs
NK048(tshi)003:3290: pa'i legs par bshad pa senga ge'i nga ro lta
NK048(tshi)003:3292: kun mkhyen klong chen pa la sogs pa'i snga 'gyur
NK048(tshi)003:3293: ba'i kun rdzob tu dag pa chen por bsgrub pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3294: lung rigs man ngag rnams ni 'gran zla kun dang
NK048(tshi)003:3295: bral bas gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa kho
NK048(tshi)003:3296: na yina la / de las gzhan na kun rdzob
NK048(tshi)003:3297: tu dag pa chen por bsgrub pa'i tshul lugsa 'di
NK048(tshi)003:3298: nyid tshul bzhina du smra ba meda pasa dag pa
NK048(tshi)003:3299: chen por bsgrub tshul 'di yi thada ganga ltar khasa
NK048(tshi)003:3300: blang kyang 'gal bar mthong basa na rgyud don zab
NK048(tshi)003:3301: mo ji bzhin du rtogs pas dben pa nyid do
NK048(tshi)003:3302: na yina la / // gnyis pa dag mnyam dbyer
NK048(tshi)003:3303: med chen por bye brag tu bstan pa la gsum
NK048(tshi)003:3304: na yina la / // / thun mong gi blta bya snang stong re res mi rung bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)003:3305: zung 'jug dag mnyam pa bden pa dbyer med du bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)003:3306: dag mnyam chen por grub pa'i tshul dang nges pa'i yon tan no //
NK048(tshi)003:3308: de la thun mong sogs tshigs bcad bcu gcig dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3309: de la thun monga gi blta bya zhes pa de
NK048(tshi)003:3310: nyid snang ba dang stong pa so so ba re
NK048(tshi)003:3311: res mi runga ste mi 'thad la de'i rgyu mtshan
NK048(tshi)003:3313: gal te thun mong gi blta bya zhes pa de
NK048(tshi)003:3314: nyid snang ba dang stong pa so so ba re
NK048(tshi)003:3315: res mi rung ste mi 'thad la de'i rgyu mtshan
NK048(tshi)003:3317: gal te thun mong gi blta bya ci yang med
NK048(tshi)003:3318: pas stong pa rkyang pa tsam yina na 'gro ba
NK048(tshi)003:3319: mi la sogs pa su yang runga la yanga ci
NK048(tshi)003:3320: yang med pa'i nam mkha' yanga don byed nus pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3321: bum pa la sogs par snang bar 'gyur zhing bum
NK048(tshi)003:3322: pa la sogs pa don byed pa'i dngos po rnams
NK048(tshi)003:3323: kyang nam mkha'a ltar ci yang med pas mi snang
NK048(tshi)003:3324: bar 'gyur dgos la de'i phyir snang ba dang bral
NK048(tshi)003:3325: ba'i ci yang med pas stong pa tsam thun mong
NK048(tshi)003:3326: gi blta byar runga zhing chu la sogs par snang
NK048(tshi)003:3327: na mo gsham gyi bu dang nam mkha'i me tog
NK048(tshi)003:3328: la sogs pa thun mong gi blta byar rung zhing
NK048(tshi)003:3329: chu la sogs pa thams cad du ci yi phyir
NK048(tshi)003:3330: mi snang ste snang dgos la /
NK048(tshi)003:3331: de ltar na dngosa po rnams phyogs dus gcig na
NK048(tshi)003:3332: yod pa ltar phyogs dus thams cad na rtag tu
NK048(tshi)003:3333: yod pa'am / yang na phyogs dus gcig na med
NK048(tshi)003:3334: pa ltar phyogs dus thams cad na meda par thal
NK048(tshi)003:3335: yod pa'am / bar 'gyur te / dngos po rnams
NK048(tshi)003:3336: rgyu meda du 'dod pa la ji skad brjod pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3337: skyon kun 'di la yang 'jug par mtshungsa pas so
NK048(tshi)003:3338: yod pa'am / bar 'gyur te / // gzhan yang
NK048(tshi)003:3339: ci yang med pa'i stong pa'i ganas skabsa dngos med
NK048(tshi)003:3340: de nyid yin bzhina du chu la sogs pa'i snang
NK048(tshi)003:3341: ba'i dngos po yin pa'ang med de /
NK048(tshi)003:3342: ci'i phyir na de gnyis phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)003:3343: gal te ngo bos ma stong pa yi snang ba
NK048(tshi)003:3344: thun mong gi blta bya zhig yoda par gyur na
NK048(tshi)003:3345: ni ci yang med pas stong nyid tsam thun mong
NK048(tshi)003:3346: gi blta bya'am / snang gzhira bazhaga pa'i rang tshig
NK048(tshi)003:3347: dang 'gal ba yin pas mi 'thad pa kho na
NK048(tshi)003:3348: gi blta bya'am / ro // 'o na khyod kyi
NK048(tshi)003:3349: gonga du rang lugs la ni stong pa nyid dang
NK048(tshi)003:3350: rten 'byung gi snang ba gnyis mi 'gal bar zung
NK048(tshi)003:3351: 'jug gam dbyer med du bstan pa de ci zhe
NK048(tshi)003:3352: gi blta bya'am / ro // na / 'dir ni
NK048(tshi)003:3353: gnyis chos kyi snang ba tshu rol mthong pa'i dona
NK048(tshi)003:3354: la dpyad pa'i kun tu tha snyad pa'i tshad ma'i
NK048(tshi)003:3355: rnam bzhag gi skabsa yina pasa na de'i ngora dngos
NK048(tshi)003:3356: po gcig nyid yod pa dang meda pa gnyis 'gal
NK048(tshi)003:3357: gi blta bya'am / ro // na / ba ste
NK048(tshi)003:3358: / phan tshun spang bas gnyis ka yin pa mi
NK048(tshi)003:3359: gi blta bya'am / ro // na / ba ste
NK048(tshi)003:3360: / srid do // gong du ji skad bstan pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3361: dngosa po gcig gi steng gi snang stong bdena pa
NK048(tshi)003:3362: gnyis me dang tsha ba bzhin du mi 'gal bar
NK048(tshi)003:3363: bstan pa ni 'phags pa'i ye shesa gnyis snang med
NK048(tshi)003:3364: pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir de gnyis kyi shan legs
NK048(tshi)003:3366: gnyis pa stong pa las ris su chad pa'i snang
NK048(tshi)003:3367: ba kho nas mi rung ba ni gal te rang
NK048(tshi)003:3368: gi ngo bos stong pa dang bral ba'i mi stong
NK048(tshi)003:3369: pa'i snang ba tsam zhig thun mong gi blta bya'i
NK048(tshi)003:3371: ji ltar na mi stong ba'i thun mong gi snang
NK048(tshi)003:3372: gzhi de nyid chu rnag bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3373: snang ba rnams las gang ltar snang ba yina zhes
NK048(tshi)003:3374: brtags na 'di ltar snang ba yin no zhesa so
NK048(tshi)003:3375: sor risa su ma chada pa'i snang ba zhig sus
NK048(tshi)003:3376: kyang bsam para mi nus pa'i phyir bsam brjod las
NK048(tshi)003:3378: de'i phyir thun mong gi snang gzhi ni mi stong
NK048(tshi)003:3379: ba'i snang ba tsam zhig yod ces pa 'di nyid
NK048(tshi)003:3380: 'grub pa ma yina te ci'i phyir na shesa byed
NK048(tshi)003:3381: kyi tshad mas te tshad ma gang gis ma mthonga
NK048(tshi)003:3382: bzhina du de 'dra'i snang gzhi yoda cesa sgrub byed
NK048(tshi)003:3383: med pa'i dam baca'a tsam du zad pas rnam pa
NK048(tshi)003:3384: kun tu mi 'grub pa kho na'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3385: skyon gzhan yang chu rnag sogs gang snang ba de
NK048(tshi)003:3386: nyid mi stong bar risa su chad par gyur na
NK048(tshi)003:3387: ni chu sogs gang ltar snang ba de lasa rnag
NK048(tshi)003:3388: sogs gazhana du rnam pa kun tu snang mi rung
NK048(tshi)003:3389: zhing / de nyid mi stong ba bden grub kyi
NK048(tshi)003:3390: snang ba yina pa'i phyir na yanga snang ba de
NK048(tshi)003:3391: nyid don dam dpyod pa'i rigas pasa dpyad bzod du
NK048(tshi)003:3393: gzhan yang chu dang rnag dang bdud rtsi sogas kyi
NK048(tshi)003:3394: thun mong gi snang gzhi nyid ni chu la sogs
NK048(tshi)003:3395: pa de gsum so so ba ganga yin kyang 'agla
NK048(tshi)003:3396: ba ste 'di ltar gala te chu ru snang ba
NK048(tshi)003:3397: de yi snang gzhi rnag nyid du grub pa yin
NK048(tshi)003:3398: na de nyid chu ru snang bar ji ltar 'gyur
NK048(tshi)003:3399: te / me nyid chu ru snang bar mi 'gyur ba bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)003:3400: gal te chu ru snang ba'i gzhi de nyid rnag
NK048(tshi)003:3401: nyid mina par chu nyid mina par chu nyid yina
NK048(tshi)003:3403: chu nyid chur snang ba las rnag la sogas pa
NK048(tshi)003:3404: gazhana du ci la snang ste snang mi rigs te
NK048(tshi)003:3405: / chu nyid me la sogs pa gzhan pa nyid du snang mi rung ba bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)003:3406: gal te yi dwagsa kyi mthong ba'i yul du gang
NK048(tshi)003:3407: snang ba de yanga chu 'di nyid yin no zhe
NK048(tshi)003:3408: na / de ltar na yi dwags la rnag snang
NK048(tshi)003:3409: de yang meda par khasa blang ba nyid du thal
NK048(tshi)003:3411: mdor na ganga phyir rigs drug gi 'gro ba ranga
NK048(tshi)003:3412: rang so so la gang chu la sogs pa thun
NK048(tshi)003:3413: min gyi snang ba de dang de lasa snang gzhi
NK048(tshi)003:3414: logas su ci yang yoda pa min te gal te
NK048(tshi)003:3415: yoda par gyur na gang snang ba dang de'i snang
NK048(tshi)003:3416: gzhi tha dad du 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'thad de
NK048(tshi)003:3417: / dper na ka ba dang bum pa gnyis phan
NK048(tshi)003:3418: tshun gcig gzhi gciga shos nyid mina pa bzhina ni
NK048(tshi)003:3419: / / des na gang snang ba de las gzhan
NK048(tshi)003:3420: du snang gzhi logs su tha dad pa nyid med
NK048(tshi)003:3423: gzhi gnas tshul snang stong zung 'jug rgya chad phyogs
NK048(tshi)003:3424: lhung dang bral ba mthar thug pa gnas snang rnam
NK048(tshi)003:3425: kun mthun pa'i dag mnyam bden par dbyer med du
NK048(tshi)003:3426: bstan pa / lam snang tshul dag dang ma dag
NK048(tshi)003:3427: par gnas snang mi mthun par sna tshogs su snang
NK048(tshi)003:3428: bstan pa / tshul / de ltar ma rtogs pa dang rtogs pa'i skyon yon 'bras bu bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3430: don dam du mnyam pa chen por bstan pa dang /
NK048(tshi)003:3431: kun rdzob tu dag pa chen por bsgrub pa dang /
NK048(tshi)003:3432: mthar thug dbyings ye bden pa dbyer med zung 'jug tu bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3434: des na snang stong sogs tshigs bcad gcig dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3435: gong du ji skad bstan pa desa na chos kun
NK048(tshi)003:3436: gdod nas snang stong ris su ma chad pa'i zung
NK048(tshi)003:3437: 'jug gama rang gi ngo bos bdena pa'am grub pa
NK048(tshi)003:3438: med pa'i stong pa'i dbyings dang 'du 'bral med pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3439: snang ba tsam zhiga de rgya gang du ma chad
NK048(tshi)003:3440: phyogsa gang du lhung ba dang bral ba yi snang
NK048(tshi)003:3441: stong zung 'jug spros bral ro mnyam chena po ru
NK048(tshi)003:3442: 'khor 'adsa kyi chosa kun ye gdoda ma nasa mnyam
NK048(tshi)003:3443: pa chen por gnas pa'i phyir na de ltar mnyam
NK048(tshi)003:3444: pa nyid rang byung gi ye shes 'od gsal rdzogsa
NK048(tshi)003:3445: pa chena po ru gdod nas grub pa'i dona de
NK048(tshi)003:3446: nyid rtog ge'i rigs pas ma dkrugs par nges pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3447: mdo rgyud zab mo'i lung rigs kyis gtan la phaba
NK048(tshi)003:3448: par byas nasa gnas lugs bsal bzhag med par mnyam
NK048(tshi)003:3449: par 'jog pa ni mnyam nyid rdzogs pa chen po
NK048(tshi)003:3450: ste de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK048(tshi)003:3451: pa dang spros bral dbu ma chen po yang yin
NK048(tshi)003:3453: tshul de goms pa'i sogs tshigs bcad brgyad dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3454: gong du ji skad bstan pa'i tshul de la ji
NK048(tshi)003:3455: bzhin gomas par byed pa'i lam gyi gnas skabsa su
NK048(tshi)003:3456: yang dang por dag pa'i gzigas pa la brten pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3457: rigs pa tshad ma'i lam nasa phyi dang nang gi
NK048(tshi)003:3458: dngos po ma daga pa'i snang ba 'di thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:3459: ye nas dag pa'i ye shes chen por rang grol
NK048(tshi)003:3460: ba'i snang srid rnam par dag pa'i chosa kyi sku
NK048(tshi)003:3461: nyid yin no zhesa yin pa la yin par nges
NK048(tshi)003:3463: bslu ba med pa'i rdo rje'i lung rgyud kyi dgongs
NK048(tshi)003:3464: pa'i dona la yang dag par 'byor zhing grub pa
NK048(tshi)003:3465: rgyud don dang shin tu mthun te desa na sgyu
NK048(tshi)003:3466: 'phrul dra ba gnyis su med pa'i rgyud lasa phung
NK048(tshi)003:3467: po lnga snang la rang bzhin med pa'i sgyu ma
NK048(tshi)003:3468: lta bu yi snang ba phyogs dang risa su ma
NK048(tshi)003:3469: chad pa de nyid ye nas rnam par dag pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3470: zhing dang lhar snang ba yin no zhesa gang gsung
NK048(tshi)003:3471: ba'i dgongs pa'i don zab mo la yida ches phyir
NK048(tshi)003:3472: mi ldog pa nyid yang dag par skye bar 'gyur
NK048(tshi)003:3473: te / 'di ltar yi dwags kyi 'gro ba rnams
NK048(tshi)003:3474: chu gtsang ma 'di yang rnag tu mthong ba'i las
NK048(tshi)003:3475: ngan gyi sgrib pa rnams dag pa'i stobs kyis rnag
NK048(tshi)003:3476: snang dang rnag 'dzina las bzlog pa'am log pa'i tshe
NK048(tshi)003:3477: na gzod chu nyid la chur snang zhing /
NK048(tshi)003:3478: mthong bar gyur pas na rnag snang dang rnag 'dzin
NK048(tshi)003:3479: de yang phyin ci log gi mthong ba 'khrul ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:3480: snang bar rtogsa shing de bzhin du gnas snang mi
NK048(tshi)003:3481: mthun par snang tshul ma dag par gang mthong ba
NK048(tshi)003:3482: de nyid 'khrul bar rtogs shing gnas tshul ye nas
NK048(tshi)003:3483: dag pa chen po lha'i dkyil 'khor du rtogs shing
NK048(tshi)003:3484: de nyid la tshul bzhin du gomas par byas pasa
NK048(tshi)003:3485: de la chu gtsang ma ru snang ba 'di nyid
NK048(tshi)003:3486: kyang las sgrib rab tu dag pa'i rgyal sras byang
NK048(tshi)003:3487: chub sems dpa' chen po yis chu de yi rdul
NK048(tshi)003:3488: phra rab re rera yang grangs meda pa'i sangs rgyas
NK048(tshi)003:3489: kyi dag pa'i zhing khams su mthong zhing chu de
NK048(tshi)003:3490: yum chen ma ma kira mngona sum du mthong zhing
NK048(tshi)003:3491: snang nas rola pa'i bya ba byed cing bde stong
NK048(tshi)003:3492: gi ye shes chen po'i grogs nyid du 'gyur ba
NK048(tshi)003:3493: yin la / shin tu rnam par dag pa mthar
NK048(tshi)003:3494: thug pa sgrib gnyis bag chags phra ba yang shin
NK048(tshi)003:3495: tu dag pa'am spangsa pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sara dag
NK048(tshi)003:3496: mnyam zung 'jug ro mnyam chena pora gzigs pa gang
NK048(tshi)003:3497: zhig bri gang dang bral bar gnas snang rnam pa
NK048(tshi)003:3498: kun tu mthun pas dag pa chen por rtag tu
NK048(tshi)003:3500: de yi phyir na shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3501: sangs rgyas kyi gzigas pa ni sgrib gnyis bag chags
NK048(tshi)003:3502: dang bcas pa ma lusa pa spangsa pa'i phyir dngosa
NK048(tshi)003:3503: po'i gansa tshul yang dag par mthar thug ji bzhin
NK048(tshi)003:3504: ma nora ba nyid ni sangs rgyas de yisa mthong
NK048(tshi)003:3505: ba de kho na las gazhana du cung zad kyang
NK048(tshi)003:3506: yoda pa ma yina pas na de nyid kho na
NK048(tshi)003:3507: mthar thug gi tshad ma ru bzung ste phyi nang
NK048(tshi)003:3508: gi snang gi snang ba ma dag pa 'di thams
NK048(tshi)003:3509: cad kun ye gdoda ma nasa kyang shin tu daga
NK048(tshi)003:3510: pa'i ye shes chosa kyi skur gansa so zhesa dam
NK048(tshi)003:3511: baca'a ba gang zhig grub pa'i rtse mo ru zab
NK048(tshi)003:3512: mo'i lung dang riga pa'i blo gros kyi miga mchog
NK048(tshi)003:3513: dang ldan pa rnams la shin tu grub cing gsal
NK048(tshi)003:3514: ba yin gyi rtog ge gzhan gyi spyod yul ni
NK048(tshi)003:3515: ma yin no // de ltar na yang gzhan dang
NK048(tshi)003:3516: thun mong ma yin pa'i zab mo'i theg pa mchog
NK048(tshi)003:3517: de ni theg pa thams cad kyi rtse mo ngo
NK048(tshi)003:3518: matshara rmad du byung ba'i 'oda zer gyis 'od zer
NK048(tshi)003:3519: 'bum phrag stong du mang'a basa shin tu gsal ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:3520: 'od zer 'bum du brdal ba'i nyi ma lta bu
NK048(tshi)003:3521: 'di la damna pa'i yida cana lung rigs zab mo'i
NK048(tshi)003:3522: blo gros kyi mig dang bral ba'i 'byung po'i bya
NK048(tshi)003:3523: lta bu phal cher zab mo'i don mthong ba la
NK048(tshi)003:3524: long ba lta bur 'gyur bas na gong du ji
NK048(tshi)003:3525: skad bstan pa de nyid rtogs par ma gyur to
NK048(tshi)003:3527: de la mthar thug sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3528: de la shin tu mathara thug pa gnyis su med
NK048(tshi)003:3529: pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyingsa de nyid gzhan gang
NK048(tshi)003:3530: du'ang mi snang bar lha snang kho nara snang ngo
NK048(tshi)003:3531: zhesa phyogsa gciga gam mtha' gcig tu bsgrub para mi
NK048(tshi)003:3532: nus kyang don la ma dag pa'i snang ba gang
NK048(tshi)003:3533: ji snyed pa thams cad rang grol ba'i rang bzhina
NK048(tshi)003:3534: ye gdoda ma nasa shin tu rnam par dag pa
NK048(tshi)003:3535: yi dbyingsa ka dag chen po dang rang bzhin 'od
NK048(tshi)003:3536: gsal ba'i snang cha ye shesa chos kyi sku gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:3537: ye nas zung 'jug 'adu 'bral meda pa'i phyir snang
NK048(tshi)003:3538: ba'i cha gang ji snyed pa ye gdoda ma nas
NK048(tshi)003:3539: ye shes kyi lha ru dag pa la gansa lugsa
NK048(tshi)003:3540: dpyad pa'i rigs pasa kyang mi gnoda de gang gi
NK048(tshi)003:3541: phyir na sgrib gnyis bag chags dang bcas pa ma
NK048(tshi)003:3542: lus pa shin tu spangsa ba'am shin tu dag pa
NK048(tshi)003:3543: yi snang stong zung du 'ajug pa'i dbyingsa dang ye
NK048(tshi)003:3544: shes dbyer med pa de ni mathara thug gi de
NK048(tshi)003:3545: kho na nyid yina pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)003:3546: gnyis pa sa lam snang tshul dag dang ma dag
NK048(tshi)003:3547: par gnas snang mi mthun par sna tshogs su snang
NK048(tshi)003:3548: tshul ni / de las gzhan du sogs tshigs bcad lnga dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3549: gzigs pa shin tu dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji
NK048(tshi)003:3550: ltar gzigs pa de kho na lasa gazhana du sus
NK048(tshi)003:3551: gang ltar du brtagsa kyang de ni dbyings ye gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:3552: su med pa'i mthar thuga gi dona yang dag pa
NK048(tshi)003:3553: nyid min te sgrib gnyis bag chags dang bcas pa
NK048(tshi)003:3554: zad par ma spangsa pasa gansa tshul dang snang tshul
NK048(tshi)003:3555: rnam pa kun tu mi mthuna pa yin pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)003:3556: ro // des na gansa skabsa su rnal 'byor ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:3557: lam gyi snang ba gang la dper na miga gi
NK048(tshi)003:3558: skyon ci tsam pa dag pa'i rim pas raba riba
NK048(tshi)003:3559: kyi snang ba de tsam nyid du dag par 'gyur
NK048(tshi)003:3560: ba bzhina du yul cana sgrib pa'i dri mas ci
NK048(tshi)003:3561: tsam ci tsam daga pa lasa de tsam de tsam
NK048(tshi)003:3562: nyid du yul kyang de bzhina du dag pa nyid
NK048(tshi)003:3563: du mthonga bar 'gyur ba ste yul cana dri mas
NK048(tshi)003:3564: daga kyang da dung de las logas shiga na yul
NK048(tshi)003:3565: de ma daga pa'am ma dag pa'i yul zhig meda
NK048(tshi)003:3566: pa'i phyir dag pa kho na'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3567: des na yul dang yul can gyi dag pa gnyis su med par rigs pa bya'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3568: de lta na yanga ganga zaga gciga gis ma dag
NK048(tshi)003:3569: 'khrul ba'i snang ba ma lus pa dag nas 'tshang
NK048(tshi)003:3570: rgya ba'am sangs rgyas par gyur ba de yi tshe
NK048(tshi)003:3571: na gzhan su la yang ma daga pa'i dngosa po
NK048(tshi)003:3572: gcig kyang mi snang bar 'gyur dgos so zhe na
NK048(tshi)003:3573: / sangs rgyas pa po de las gazhana pa dag
NK048(tshi)003:3574: la ma dag pa'i dngos po mi snang bar mi
NK048(tshi)003:3575: 'gyur te ranga rang gi snang ba ma dag pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3576: sgrib pasa rang rang la sgribs pa'i phyir na ma
NK048(tshi)003:3577: dag par snang zhing mthong bar 'gyur ro //
NK048(tshi)003:3578: desa na gnas tshul yang dag pa la yul dang
NK048(tshi)003:3579: yul cana rnams kyi ranga bzhina ye gdoda ma nasa
NK048(tshi)003:3580: sgrib pas gos ma myong bas shin tu rnam par
NK048(tshi)003:3581: dag na yanga rang snang 'khrul ba'i glo bur gyi
NK048(tshi)003:3582: dri mas rang rang la sgrib pa'i phyir na mkhris
NK048(tshi)003:3583: nad can gyis dung bzhin du dag par mi mthong
NK048(tshi)003:3584: bas dri ma de sbyang ba'i thabs la 'bad par
NK048(tshi)003:3585: bya dgos la / spyang bya'i dri ma glo bur
NK048(tshi)003:3586: ba de rnams kyang ni ye nas rang rang gi
NK048(tshi)003:3587: ngo bos rnam par dag pa lasa logas shig na
NK048(tshi)003:3588: sbyang bya'i dri ma ma daga pa nyid grub pa
NK048(tshi)003:3589: mina pasa gdod nas ranga bzhina gyis rnam par dag
NK048(tshi)003:3590: pa'i 'oda gsal mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa nyid
NK048(tshi)003:3591: bya dgos la / shes par bya'o // gsum pa
NK048(tshi)003:3592: de ltar ma rtogs pa dang rtogs pa'i skyon yon
NK048(tshi)003:3594: de ltar snang tshul sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3595: de ltar snang tshul gnas don lus la sogs pa
NK048(tshi)003:3596: yul dang yul can mi 'dra ba sna tshogas pa
NK048(tshi)003:3597: nyid rang bzhin mnyam pa chen por ma rtogsa pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3598: dus na gnas don lus sogs sna tshogs pa so
NK048(tshi)003:3599: sora 'dzina pas byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams
NK048(tshi)003:3600: ganga la semsa chagas shing zhen pa de ni byis
NK048(tshi)003:3601: pa rnams rang snang la gzhan du 'khrul bas rmongsa
NK048(tshi)003:3602: pa ste rmongsa pa de yisa dar gyi srin bu
NK048(tshi)003:3603: ltar rang gis rang nyid 'ching bar byed do //
NK048(tshi)003:3604: gal te snang tshul sna tshogs pa rang snang gi
NK048(tshi)003:3605: rang bzhin mnyam pa chen por rtogsa shing goms par
NK048(tshi)003:3606: gyur na 'khor 'das kyi chos kun kyang zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)003:3607: ro mnyam gyi nganga du mthar thug gi 'bras bu'i
NK048(tshi)003:3608: batsana sa zin te dus gsum gyi 'dzin pa bral
NK048(tshi)003:3609: bas dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid dus gsum dus meda
NK048(tshi)003:3610: 'od gsal gnyug ma'i klong chen por rgyu las ma
NK048(tshi)003:3611: bskyed rkyen la ma byung bas rang byung gi ye
NK048(tshi)003:3612: shesa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal bar te ye shes
NK048(tshi)003:3613: chos kyi sku nyid brnyes par 'gyur ro //
NK048(tshi)003:3614: gsum pa dag mnyam chen por grub pa'i tshul dang nges pa'i yon tan ni /
NK048(tshi)003:3615: dag mnyam chen por sogs tshigs bcad bzhi dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3616: de ltar chos kun dag mnyam chena pora ye nas
NK048(tshi)003:3617: gnas par khasa lena pa'i zab mo'i tshul 'di nyid
NK048(tshi)003:3618: legas par rtogs shing grub pa ste grub par gyur
NK048(tshi)003:3619: pa na de la snang ba dang stong pa nyid
NK048(tshi)003:3620: ces cir yang ma grub pasa rang rang gi ngo
NK048(tshi)003:3621: bos stong pa yin pa'i gnad kyis stong dang mi
NK048(tshi)003:3622: stong 'khor ba dang 'das pa sogs cir yanga rung
NK048(tshi)003:3624: de ltar na dag pa dang ma dag pa sogs
NK048(tshi)003:3625: 'khor 'das kyi snang ba rten 'byung 'gags med pas
NK048(tshi)003:3626: cira yanga snang du rung zhing ches 'thad pa yin
NK048(tshi)003:3627: la / de lasa gazhana du rang gi ngo bos
NK048(tshi)003:3628: mi stong pa'i rtag pa dang snang ba med pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3629: stong pa phyang chad kyi mtha' bral sogs gang brtagsa
NK048(tshi)003:3630: pa de la stong dang mi stong sogs cir yanga
NK048(tshi)003:3631: mi rung bar 'gyur zhing 'khor 'das kyi snang ba
NK048(tshi)003:3632: rab 'byams 'gags pa med pas rten 'byung 'di dag
NK048(tshi)003:3633: cir yang mi snang bas gtan med du 'gyur la
NK048(tshi)003:3634: la / / de ltar na stong dang rten 'byung
NK048(tshi)003:3635: gnyis su med pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
NK048(tshi)003:3636: gang legs par gsung pa nyid dang shin tu 'gal
NK048(tshi)003:3637: la / / bar 'gyur ba'o // de yi phyir
NK048(tshi)003:3638: na bden pa dbyer med dag mnyam chen por bsgrub
NK048(tshi)003:3639: pa'i tshul zab mo 'di'i yid ches phyir mi ldog
NK048(tshi)003:3640: pa snying la rnyed pa'i sgo gcig pu par gyur
NK048(tshi)003:3641: pa ni stong dang rten 'byung 'gal ba med pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3642: zung 'jug gi lam mchog 'di kho na yina te
NK048(tshi)003:3644: snang stong dbyer med dam zung 'jug 'di la ngesa
NK048(tshi)003:3645: pa'i shesa pa the tshom gyi smag thams cad dang
NK048(tshi)003:3646: bral ba skyes shing goms par gyur na /
NK048(tshi)003:3647: chos kun gdod nas dag mnyam chen por bri ganga
NK048(tshi)003:3648: dang bral ba'i rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du rang
NK048(tshi)003:3649: grol ba la srid pa 'khor ba stong dang mi
NK048(tshi)003:3650: stong dag dang ma dag pa sogas chosa nyid dag
NK048(tshi)003:3651: mnyam zung 'jug chen po phal pa'i blos bsam gyi
NK048(tshi)003:3652: mi khyab pa'i don nyid la zab mo'i bzoda pa
NK048(tshi)003:3653: mchog tu gyur pa khong nasa skye bar 'gyur ro
NK048(tshi)003:3654: // de'i tshe rdul phra rab gcig gi khyon la
NK048(tshi)003:3655: rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rten brten
NK048(tshi)003:3656: pa dang bcas pa mthong zhing dus mtha'i skad cig
NK048(tshi)003:3657: gcig gi yun la yanga grangs med kyi bskal bar
NK048(tshi)003:3658: snang zhing mthong ba la sogs pa ste snang ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:3659: dngosa po rnams gdod nas bdena stong snang la rang
NK048(tshi)003:3660: bzhin med pa'i sgyu ma'i ngesa shes kyi sangas rgyas
NK048(tshi)003:3661: kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i zab mo
NK048(tshi)003:3662: nyid la legs par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
NK048(tshi)003:3663: gsum pa bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan cing don bsdu ba ni /
NK048(tshi)003:3664: de phyir rang snang sogs tshigs bcad bzhi dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3665: de phyir chos kun ye nas snang stong dag mnyam
NK048(tshi)003:3666: pa bden pa dbyer med dam zung 'jug tu gnas
NK048(tshi)003:3667: pa'i don de mtshon pa'i brdar rang snang ris su
NK048(tshi)003:3668: ma chad pas risa meda ces pa dang /
NK048(tshi)003:3669: rgya chad phyogsa lhung kun dang bral ba zhes dang /
NK048(tshi)003:3670: gzhi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab dang /
NK048(tshi)003:3671: chos nyid stong mi stong sogs kyi spros pa cir yanga grub pa zhes dang /
NK048(tshi)003:3672: me dang tsha ba bzhin du snang stong dbyer med
NK048(tshi)003:3673: dam zung du 'jug pa zhes pa la sogas pa
NK048(tshi)003:3674: grub mtha'i chosa skad zab mo de tsam pa 'di'i
NK048(tshi)003:3675: dona yang lo brgyar bsgrimsa te yang yang bsam par
NK048(tshi)003:3676: byas kyang rang rgyud la zab mo'i don la sngona
NK048(tshi)003:3677: goms cher yod pa mina pasa sam sngon goms kyi
NK048(tshi)003:3678: rgyu med na da lta blo shes rab chena po
NK048(tshi)003:3679: brtson pas sbyangsa pa yang mi damna pa rab tu
NK048(tshi)003:3680: bzang po yod moda kyang ji bzhin thugs su chud
NK048(tshi)003:3681: pa ni ma yina pas yang dag par dgongs par
NK048(tshi)003:3682: mi 'gyur te / 'di ni gsan rgya che yang
NK048(tshi)003:3683: gzhan gyi thugs su chud mi 'gyur zhes gsungs pa
NK048(tshi)003:3684: mi 'gyur te / bzhin no // de phyi mdo
NK048(tshi)003:3685: rgyud kyi grub mtha'a zab mo gang ji snyed pa
NK048(tshi)003:3686: mtha'a daga gi dgongs pa'i gting phug ganga du dbab
NK048(tshi)003:3687: cing gzhol ba yi brgya phrag dam pa'i chosa kyi
NK048(tshi)003:3688: legas bshad zab mo'i chu klung gi bcud thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:3689: 'abba pa'i mtsho chen po snang stong zung 'jug mthar
NK048(tshi)003:3690: thug dag mnyam bden pa dbyer med du gnas pa
NK048(tshi)003:3691: 'di ni ngo mtshar bas kyang ches ngo mtshar rmad
NK048(tshi)003:3693: de ltar gnas lugs mthar thug gnas snang rnam kun
NK048(tshi)003:3694: mthun pa de las snang tshul gzhan dag pa dang
NK048(tshi)003:3695: ma dag par gang snang ba rnams ni re 'ga'
NK048(tshi)003:3696: bas gcig tu ma ngesa shinga mi rtag pa 'byung
NK048(tshi)003:3697: zhing bslu ba dag dang bcas te snang la /
NK048(tshi)003:3698: sgrib pa mtha' dag spang ba'i gnas lugs ji lta
NK048(tshi)003:3699: ba bzhin du mathara phyin pa mngon du gyur pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3700: dag mnyam bden pa dbyer med zung 'jug gi ye
NK048(tshi)003:3701: shesa ni 'gyur ba med pas 'dus ma byas bslu
NK048(tshi)003:3702: ba meda pa'i dona gnyis su med par gzigas pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3703: rang byung gi ye shes gnas snang rnam kun shin
NK048(tshi)003:3704: tu mthun pas 'gyur na meda pa nyid yin no
NK048(tshi)003:3705: // e ma 'di las gzhan du gang brtags pa'i //
NK048(tshi)003:3706: dam baca'i 'bras bu mngon du 'byin min la //
NK048(tshi)003:3707: rgya chad phyogs bral zung 'jug gang rung bar //
NK048(tshi)003:3708: thams cad rung bar gcig shes kun grol lags //
NK048(tshi)003:3710: dri lan bdun pa spros bral dbu ma chen po la khas len yod med gang 'thad la bzhi /
NK048(tshi)003:3711: khas len med pa'i lugs dgag pa /
NK048(tshi)003:3712: khas len yod med so sor phye ba'i klong chen
NK048(tshi)003:3713: zhabs kyi kyis bzhed pa 'god pa der brten khas
NK048(tshi)003:3714: len yod pa'i phyogs ches cher bsgrub pa'i gzhan lugs
NK048(tshi)003:3715: dgag pa / klong chen zhabs kyi rjes su 'brang ste rang lugs rgyas par bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3717: spros bral dbu ma sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3718: zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas pa'i spros bral dbu
NK048(tshi)003:3719: ma chena po thal 'gyur ba la rang lugs la
NK048(tshi)003:3721: meda ces dpyad pa'i tshe bod snga rabsa pa'i mkhas
NK048(tshi)003:3722: pa phal che ba rnams mgrin gcig tu zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)003:3723: rab tu mi gnas pa'i dbu ma'i rang lugas la
NK048(tshi)003:3724: 'di yina 'di mina dang yod med la sogas pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3725: spros pa gang cir yanga ni meda pa'i phyir rnam
NK048(tshi)003:3726: pa kun tu cir yang khas lena meda para 'dod
NK048(tshi)003:3728: 'di ltar dpal ldan zla ba'i ranga gzhung dbu ma
NK048(tshi)003:3729: 'jug pa rtsa 'grel rnams lasa gzhi phung khams skye
NK048(tshi)003:3730: mched kyi rten 'brel dang lam sa bcu dang 'bras
NK048(tshi)003:3731: bu stobs bcu la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:3732: mkhyen nyid dang bcas pa snang tsam bslu med kyi
NK048(tshi)003:3733: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i grub mtha'i rnam par
NK048(tshi)003:3734: bzhag pa kun khas blang ba'i ranga lugas gsal bor
NK048(tshi)003:3735: yoda bzhin du khas len rnam kun med ces mngon
NK048(tshi)003:3736: sum du bsnyon nas gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu
NK048(tshi)003:3737: la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyi rnam bzhag thamsa cada
NK048(tshi)003:3738: gazhana ngo kho na la 'jog cing skyel ba de
NK048(tshi)003:3739: ni dpal ldan zla ba'i rang gzhung gi rjod byed
NK048(tshi)003:3740: kyi tshig dang / brjod bya'i dona gnyis gara 'gal ba 'du ba'i phyir de ltar ma yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:3742: klong chen rab 'byams sogs tshigs bcad bzhis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3743: rgyal ba gnyis pa kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po
NK048(tshi)003:3744: klong chen rab 'byamsa bzang po'i zhal nas 'di skad
NK048(tshi)003:3745: du dpal ldan zla ba'i rang lugs kyi dbu mara
NK048(tshi)003:3746: te dbu ma thal 'gyur ba la tha snyad kyi
NK048(tshi)003:3747: rnam bzhag khasa lena yoda dam meda gang yin dpyad
NK048(tshi)003:3748: pa la / gangs can pa'i snga rabas kyi mkhas
NK048(tshi)003:3749: pa phal cher rnams yod med phyogsa rera 'dzina te
NK048(tshi)003:3750: 'di ltar ba tshab bu bzhi'i ya gyal tshigs don
NK048(tshi)003:3751: gnyis kar mkhas pa rma bya byang brtson gyis khas
NK048(tshi)003:3753: mkhas mchog gtsang ba ni khas len med par 'dod
NK048(tshi)003:3754: pa la yang dpyad na lugsa gnyis po de re
NK048(tshi)003:3755: rer yang skyon yon gyi cha gnyis re gansa shing
NK048(tshi)003:3756: yod pas legs par ma phyed pa'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3757: desa na skyon thams cad dang bral ba'i ranga gi
NK048(tshi)003:3758: bzheda pa la ni 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag ye shes
NK048(tshi)003:3759: dang rjes su mthun par dona dam pa'i gansa lugsa
NK048(tshi)003:3760: ji bzhin gzhal ba mnyam bzhag la zlo ba'i tshe
NK048(tshi)003:3761: gshisa lugs chos kyi dbyings la yin min yod med
NK048(tshi)003:3762: la sogs pa'i spros pa cir yanga ma grub pa
NK048(tshi)003:3763: / de ltar khas kyang yod med la sogs pa
NK048(tshi)003:3764: ci zhiga lena par byed de khas len ci yang
NK048(tshi)003:3766: de phyir rang gi grub mtha'a zhes pa gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)003:3767: mthar thug gi don rang rang gis mi lta gzhal
NK048(tshi)003:3768: ba de nyid yin pas yod med sogs gang du
NK048(tshi)003:3769: khas blangs kyang gansa lugas kyi khasa lena yina pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3770: phyir mnyam bzhag ye shes yul du byed pa dang
NK048(tshi)003:3771: gzhan la brtsod pa la sogas pa'i tshe gshisa sam
NK048(tshi)003:3772: gnas lugs yod med la sogs pa'i spros mtshan shin
NK048(tshi)003:3773: tu phra ba yang med pa'i chos kyi dbyings ji
NK048(tshi)003:3774: lta ba bzhina yod dang med stong dang mi stong
NK048(tshi)003:3775: sogs kyi khas lena ci yanga meda pa nyid do
NK048(tshi)003:3776: // lam rjes thob pa tha snyad yul du byed
NK048(tshi)003:3777: pa'i tshe gzhi lam 'bras bur bcas pa'i grub pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3778: mtha' ji lta ji snyed kyi rnam par bzhag pa
NK048(tshi)003:3779: yang dag pa'i lung las ji ltar bstan pa rnams
NK048(tshi)003:3780: ma 'khrugs shing ma 'dres par so sora khas lena
NK048(tshi)003:3782: phyin chad khas len mi len gyi tshul 'di ltar
NK048(tshi)003:3783: dam bca' zhing smra shes na kho bosa legas par
NK048(tshi)003:3784: bashada pa yid bzhin mdzod kyi 'grel chen pad+ma dkar
NK048(tshi)003:3785: po'i mthu yin par blta'o zhes gsungs so //
NK048(tshi)003:3787: der bsten gangs can sogs tshigs bcad bcu gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3788: de ltar khas len yod pa'i phyogs der brten pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3789: gangsa can gyi mkhas pa 'ga' dang 'gas dbu ma
NK048(tshi)003:3790: thal 'gyur ba'i ranga lugs la dpyad na bden grub
NK048(tshi)003:3791: kyi khas len med kyang ma dpyad ma brtags 'jig
NK048(tshi)003:3792: rten grags pa'i tha snyad khas lena yod pa'i phyogs
NK048(tshi)003:3793: kho na lung dang rigs pa yang dang yang du
NK048(tshi)003:3794: rtsal du bton nas cher cher bsgrubs par mdzad pa
NK048(tshi)003:3795: yang legs par ma phyed de /
NK048(tshi)003:3796: ji ltar na de yanga mnyam rjes kyi dbu ma
NK048(tshi)003:3797: phra ba dang rags pa la sogs pa'i skabsa shan
NK048(tshi)003:3798: so sor legs par ma phyes par rnam kun khas
NK048(tshi)003:3799: len yod par bsgrub na gshisa dona gnas lugs chos
NK048(tshi)003:3800: kyi dbyings la yod med la sogs pa'i spros pa
NK048(tshi)003:3801: cir yanga ma grub pa'i phyir na dbu ma thal
NK048(tshi)003:3802: 'gyur ba'i rang lugs la ma brtags 'jig rten grags
NK048(tshi)003:3803: pa'i tha snyad thams cad mtha'a gcig tu khas lena
NK048(tshi)003:3804: yoda pa'ang 'grub par shin tu daka'a ste /
NK048(tshi)003:3805: 'di ltar dbu ma thal 'gyur ba ranga gi lugsa
NK048(tshi)003:3806: zhes pa dbu ma'i grub pa'i mathasa gnas lugs mthar
NK048(tshi)003:3807: thug pa'i dona rigs pas ji ltar gzhal ba gnod
NK048(tshi)003:3808: pa med pa nyid yin dgosa te /
NK048(tshi)003:3809: de lasa gazhana pa dag gis tha snyad kyi khas
