NK048(tshi)003:3810: len rnams ni rigs pas gnod pa yod pas ranga
NK048(tshi)003:3811: lugsa min te de ci yi slad du zhe na
NK048(tshi)003:3812: / dbu ma thal 'gyur ba ranga gisa ni don
NK048(tshi)003:3813: dam dpyod byed kyi rigs pas gazhala na gzhan lugs
NK048(tshi)003:3814: kyi tha snyad gang khas blangs ba de dag de
NK048(tshi)003:3815: ltar ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)003:3816: desa na thal 'gyur ba desa rang lugs kyi tha
NK048(tshi)003:3817: snyad khas blangsa ba yin na de nyid don dam
NK048(tshi)003:3818: dpyod pa'i rigs pas kyang gzhal na grub par ranga
NK048(tshi)003:3819: dabnga can don dam dpyod byed kyi rigs pas dpyad
NK048(tshi)003:3820: nas khasa blangsa bar rigas pa yang dag pasa 'phul
NK048(tshi)003:3821: nus pa de nyid kyi phyir des gang khasa blangsa
NK048(tshi)003:3822: pa yi ma brtags grags pa'i tha snyad de yang
NK048(tshi)003:3823: don dama par bden par grub cinga don dam dpyod
NK048(tshi)003:3824: pa'i rigs pas dpyad bzod nyid du 'gyur te /
NK048(tshi)003:3825: 'di ltar thal 'gyur ba rang gis dbu ma rang
NK048(tshi)003:3826: rgyud pa la brjod pa tha snyad bden pa rigs
NK048(tshi)003:3827: pas dpyod bzod du thal ba dang don dam pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3828: skye ba mi khegs pa dang /
NK048(tshi)003:3829: 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag dngos po'i 'jig rgyur thal ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:3830: skyon gsum rang la yang mtshungs par 'bab pas so
NK048(tshi)003:3831: // gal te ma brtags grags pa'i khas len de
NK048(tshi)003:3832: thal 'gyur ba ranga lugsa kyi khas lena ma yina
NK048(tshi)003:3833: // no zhe na / ranga lugs la 'jig rten
NK048(tshi)003:3834: rgan po'i ji ltar khas blang ba ltar khasa lena
NK048(tshi)003:3835: yoda pa yin zhes pa'i rang tshig dang 'gal ba
NK048(tshi)003:3836: // no zhe na / ma yin nam / gzhan
NK048(tshi)003:3837: yang ranga la don dam dpyod pa'i rigs pas dpyad
NK048(tshi)003:3838: na bden grub med ces pa dang ma dpyad 'jig
NK048(tshi)003:3839: rten rgan por gragsa pa'i tha snyad thams cad gnod
NK048(tshi)003:3840: med du yod ces pa'i khasa len gnyis ni yod
NK048(tshi)003:3841: par gyur cing de gnyis ka ngesa para bdena pa'am
NK048(tshi)003:3842: yang dag par gyur na dbu ma'i ranga lugs zhes
NK048(tshi)003:3843: pa de gnyis po lasa re re yin nama 'on
NK048(tshi)003:3845: de ltar gang rung re re nas rang lugs yina
NK048(tshi)003:3846: no zhe na gciga shosa rang lugs su 'thad pa
NK048(tshi)003:3847: ma yin te dngos 'agla yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)003:3848: gal te yod cesa pa rang lugs kyi khasa blangsa
NK048(tshi)003:3849: ba ma yina la meda par khas ni blangsa bar
NK048(tshi)003:3850: gyur pa ni rang lugs yin no zhe na /
NK048(tshi)003:3851: de lta na yod casa bya ba'i khasa lena ni
NK048(tshi)003:3852: rang lugs la ma brtags 'jig rten grags pa'i kun
NK048(tshi)003:3853: rdzob tsam du yanga mi runga ste meda pa kho
NK048(tshi)003:3854: na rung lugs khas blang yin pa'i phyir na'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3855: gnyis pa ltar yod med gnyis ka rang gi lugs yin pas khas blangsa ba yin no zhe na /
NK048(tshi)003:3856: chos gang yang rigs pas dpyad mi bzoda pa de
NK048(tshi)003:3857: khas mi len pa'am bsal nasa su rigs pasa gnoda
NK048(tshi)003:3858: pa meda pas dpyad bzod pa'am skyon med pa de
NK048(tshi)003:3859: khasa lena pa yina pa'i phyir yod med gnyis ka
NK048(tshi)003:3860: rigs pas dpyad bzod du 'gyur ro //
NK048(tshi)003:3861: de lta na yang rigs pas dpyad pas stong pa'am
NK048(tshi)003:3862: med pa dang ma dpyad pa'i snang ba'am yod pa
NK048(tshi)003:3863: ste / de gnyis po lhan cig tu dngos po
NK048(tshi)003:3864: gciga la 'du zhing tshogas pa 'jig rten na srid
NK048(tshi)003:3866: gal te tshogas na don dam dpyod byed kyis dpyad
NK048(tshi)003:3867: pas med pa'am stong bar rtogsa pa'i tshe na yanga
NK048(tshi)003:3868: ma dpyad 'jig rten rgan po'i dus bzhina du dngos
NK048(tshi)003:3869: po de nyid yod cing der 'dzin gyi yod rtog
NK048(tshi)003:3870: de nyid yod dgos pa'i phyir na don dam dpyod
NK048(tshi)003:3871: pas yod rtog ldog mi thub pas don dam dpyod
NK048(tshi)003:3872: byed kyi rigs pa'i dpyad pasa ci zhiga phan te
NK048(tshi)003:3873: dpyad pa don med du 'gyur zhing der ma zad
NK048(tshi)003:3874: kun rdzob ma brtags 'jig rten grags pa'i yod pa
NK048(tshi)003:3875: de yang don dam dpyad pa'i rigs pas dpyad bzod
NK048(tshi)003:3876: du yang grub par 'gyur na de rigas shing 'thad
NK048(tshi)003:3877: pa ma yina te shes bya'i khong na don dam
NK048(tshi)003:3878: dpyod pa'i rigs pas dpyad bzod pa'i chos gang yang
NK048(tshi)003:3880: gzhan yang don dam dpyod byed kyi rigs pas rnyed
NK048(tshi)003:3881: don dagga bya bden grub bcad pa'i meda dagga stong
NK048(tshi)003:3882: rkyang de lasa lhag pa'i gansa lugsa kyi lta ba
NK048(tshi)003:3883: mthar thug pa zhig meda par gyur na de nyid
NK048(tshi)003:3884: mngon du gyur pa'i tshe na med dgag stong rkyang
NK048(tshi)003:3885: de kho na 'dzin pa'i 'dzina stangsa de la gang
NK048(tshi)003:3886: snang ba'i cha cung zad kyang 'dzin pa'i skabs rnam
NK048(tshi)003:3887: pa kun tu mi thoba pa'i phyir gang snang ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:3888: cha thams cad stong rkyang med pa kho na'i dbyings
NK048(tshi)003:3889: su rgyas gdab pas na mtha' gcig tu lta ba
NK048(tshi)003:3890: dang sgom pa dang spyod pa'i gnas skabsa thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:3892: med pa kho nar lta ba'i yid can du rtsi yi phyir mi 'gyur te /
NK048(tshi)003:3893: 'di ltar gansa lugsa gtan la phab pa'i lta ba
NK048(tshi)003:3894: dang rjes su mthun pa nyid nam du yanga goms
NK048(tshi)003:3895: pa'ang bsgom dgosa pa'i phyir rang spyod pa yang lta
NK048(tshi)003:3896: sgom gyi rjes su 'brangs dgos pas so //
NK048(tshi)003:3898: rang lugs la so sor phye ste bzhag pa /
NK048(tshi)003:3899: de la rtsod pa spong ba /
NK048(tshi)003:3900: tshul des mdo sngags kyi lam gnad bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3902: mnyam rjes sam rgyu 'bras kyi dbu ma gnyis su bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)003:3903: des na gnas lugs dbu ma chen po'i ngor khas len med par bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)003:3904: snang tshul la tha snyad bden gnyis so sor khas len yod par bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3906: des na kun mkhyen sogs tshigs bcad lnga dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3907: des na kun mkhyen rgyal ba gnyis pa klong chen
NK048(tshi)003:3908: pas ji ltar bzhed pa bzhina du snga 'gyur gyi
NK048(tshi)003:3909: rang lugas rnyogs pa'i dri ma med pa ni 'di
NK048(tshi)003:3911: zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas pa'i dbu ma thal
NK048(tshi)003:3912: 'gyur mtshan nyid pa rtog ges rnyogs dang bral ba
NK048(tshi)003:3913: zhig yina na snang stong zung du 'jug pa'i dbu
NK048(tshi)003:3914: ma chena po'am spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:3915: dbu ma chen po nyid yin dgosa te /
NK048(tshi)003:3916: de ni 'di ltar theg chen 'phagsa pa'i mnyam bazhaga
NK048(tshi)003:3917: gnyis snang med pa'i ye shesa dang rjes su mthun
NK048(tshi)003:3918: para don dam mthar thug dpyod pa'i rigs pa yang
NK048(tshi)003:3919: dag gis gtan la phaba nasa yoda meda rtag chad
NK048(tshi)003:3920: la sogas pa'i mtha' ragas pa dang shin tu phra
NK048(tshi)003:3921: ba rnams ma lus pa kun nyer zhi ba'am nyer
NK048(tshi)003:3922: zhi'i rang bzhina bden gnyis zung 'jug gi gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)003:3924: de las gzhan du dgag bya bden grub bcad pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3925: stong pa meda dgag 'ab'a zhig yul du byed pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3926: lam de nyid snang stong bdena gnyis zung 'jug gi
NK048(tshi)003:3927: phyogsa gciga stong pa'i mtha' la lhung ba'i phyir lta
NK048(tshi)003:3928: ba nyi tshe ba'am nyi tshe'i lta ba de ni
NK048(tshi)003:3929: lta ba mthar thug snang stong zung 'jug dang ni
NK048(tshi)003:3930: spros kun bral ba'i lta ba mthar thug pa nyid
NK048(tshi)003:3931: ni mina te / lta ba mthar thug pa ni
NK048(tshi)003:3932: snang stong zung du 'jug pa'i spros pa thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:3933: dang bral ba nyid ni yoda pa dang meda pa'am
NK048(tshi)003:3934: snang ba dang stong pa zung 'jug mnyam pa nyid
NK048(tshi)003:3935: yin dgos kyang nyi tshe'i lta ba 'di ni dona
NK048(tshi)003:3936: dama med dgag stong pa'i dbyings 'ba' zhiga gam kho
NK048(tshi)003:3937: na'i yul can yina pas spros pa thams cad dang
NK048(tshi)003:3938: ma bral ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)003:3939: de yang 'di ltar spros pa zhes pa ni yod
NK048(tshi)003:3940: pa dang med pa stong dang mi stong pa la
NK048(tshi)003:3941: sogas pa'i dmigas pa'i rnam pa gzung 'dzin can gang
NK048(tshi)003:3942: ji snyed pa thamsa cada de spros pa nyid yin
NK048(tshi)003:3943: pas 'di ni stong pa'am meda pa'i spros pa dang
NK048(tshi)003:3944: ma bral ba'i med dgag de la dmigas pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)003:3945: na rnam par rtog pas gzhan sel sems kyi spyod
NK048(tshi)003:3946: yul gyi lta ba nyi tshe ba yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:3948: des na dbu ma sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3949: des na gnas lugs zung 'jug spros bral dbu ma
NK048(tshi)003:3950: chena po'i ngor byas na dgag pa dang sgrub pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:3951: khas lena ci yanga rnam pa kun tu yoda pa
NK048(tshi)003:3952: min te / dbu ma chen po'i rnal 'byor pa
NK048(tshi)003:3953: de yisa 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:3954: snang stong zung du 'jug pa'i spros bral mnyam pa
NK048(tshi)003:3955: nyid du rtogsa pa'i slad de don gyis chos thams
NK048(tshi)003:3956: cad kyi gnas lugs zung 'jug chos kyi dbyings yoda
NK048(tshi)003:3957: meda yina mina la sogas dagga sgrub kyi spros pa
NK048(tshi)003:3958: thams cad kun dang bral basa sam bral ba yin
NK048(tshi)003:3959: pas na gnas lugsa zung 'jug spros pa thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:3960: dang bral ba'i dona nyid ji lta ba bzhina du
NK048(tshi)003:3961: 'khor 'das kyi chosa kun kyang zung 'jug spros pa
NK048(tshi)003:3962: dang bral bas yod med sogs gang dang gang khas
NK048(tshi)003:3963: blangsa pa de dang de gnas lugs mthar thug dpyod
NK048(tshi)003:3964: pa'i rigas pasa de ltar mi 'grub pa'i phyir yod
NK048(tshi)003:3965: pa dang med pa stong pa dang mi stong ba
NK048(tshi)003:3966: snang ba dang mi snang ba sogs ganga du yang
NK048(tshi)003:3967: khasa ni lena par mi byed do //
NK048(tshi)003:3968: des na dbu ma thal 'gyur ba'i rang lugs la
NK048(tshi)003:3969: mnyam bzhag la zlo ba'i tshe khas len med do
NK048(tshi)003:3970: zhes grub cing shes par bya'o //
NK048(tshi)003:3972: de ltar gnas lugs sogs tshigs bcad bzhi dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:3973: de ltar mnyam bzhag la zlo ba'i tshe chos thams
NK048(tshi)003:3974: cad gansa lugas snang stong dbyer med pa'i zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)003:3975: gi dbyings mthar thug pa'i dona nam gshis la gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:3976: chos tha snyad kyi spros pa ci yang med pas
NK048(tshi)003:3977: khasa lena meda par grub kyang rjes thob shan 'byed
NK048(tshi)003:3978: pa'i tshe gnas skabs snang tshul la tha snyad tsam
NK048(tshi)003:3979: du bden pa gnyis ka so sora yanga kun rdzob
NK048(tshi)003:3980: tu yod la don dam du med ces pa'i khasa
NK048(tshi)003:3981: blang yoda de khas len can de 'dra'i tha snyad
NK048(tshi)003:3982: kyi bden pa gnyis kyang bden gnyis dbyer meda zung
NK048(tshi)003:3983: 'jug gi gnas lugas la ltos na bden gnyis so
NK048(tshi)003:3984: so'i snang tshul mi 'gogs pa'i tha snyad tsam zhig
NK048(tshi)003:3985: yin la / bden gnyis dbyer meda pa'i gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)003:3986: kyi dona ji lta bar mthong ye shesa la ltos
NK048(tshi)003:3987: na bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma gnyis po de
NK048(tshi)003:3988: yang nyi tshe ba'i tshad ma'am nyi tshe'i gansa yina
NK048(tshi)003:3989: te tshad ma de gang rung gciga gisa bden gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:3990: cig char 'dzina pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)003:3991: desa na tha snyad dpyod byed dang don dama dpyod
NK048(tshi)003:3992: byed kyi tshad ma gnyis po sems byung shes raba
NK048(tshi)003:3993: ste / bum pa la sogas pa'i dngos po kun
NK048(tshi)003:3994: tshad ma de gnyis kyis so sor dpyad cing gzhal
NK048(tshi)003:3995: ste / ba na / ji skad du dbu ma 'jug pa las /
NK048(tshi)003:3996: dngos kun yang dag rdzun par mthong ba yi //
NK048(tshi)003:3997: dngos rnyed ngo bo gnyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur //
NK048(tshi)003:3999: rdzun pa dang yang dag pa'i ngo bo snang ba
NK048(tshi)003:4000: dang stong pa gnyis ni rnyed cing rtogs par gyur
NK048(tshi)003:4001: na yanga tshad ma de gnyis yul so so ba
NK048(tshi)003:4002: yin pas gang rung gcig gis rang yul de gzhal
NK048(tshi)003:4003: zhing rtogs pa'i tshe gciga shos kyang gzhal zhing rtogs
NK048(tshi)003:4004: pa ni yoda pa mina pas tshad de gnyis gang
NK048(tshi)003:4005: yin kyang rung bden gnyis cig char mi gzhal zhing
NK048(tshi)003:4006: mi rtogs pas so skye'i blo gnyis snang can de
NK048(tshi)003:4007: la bdena pa gnyis res 'joga gi tshul du so
NK048(tshi)003:4008: sor snang ba lasa cig char du mi snang ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:4009: phyir na tshad ma gnyis so sos ji ltar gzhal
NK048(tshi)003:4010: ba'i rnyed don yod med kyi khasa lena gnyis kyang
NK048(tshi)003:4011: yod pa nyid du grub pa yina par shes par
NK048(tshi)003:4013: rang la mtshungs pa'i rtsod spang /
NK048(tshi)003:4014: gnyis ka stobs mtshungs ldan pa'i rtsod spang /
NK048(tshi)003:4015: bden pa gnyis su phye ste khas len dang bcas pa bstan pa'i dgos 'bras bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)003:4016: rgyu 'am lam gyi dbu ma'i khas len de yang
NK048(tshi)003:4017: don dam rang lugs su byas nas kun rdzob gzhan
NK048(tshi)003:4018: ngor skyel na lung rigs kyis gnod tshul bstan pa'o
NK048(tshi)003:4022: lung nas dgag sgrub ji snyed pa bstan tshul gyi sgo nas mi 'gal bar don bsdu ba'o //
NK048(tshi)003:4024: 'o na khas len sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:4025: 'o na de ltar khasa lena yoda meda dang bden
NK048(tshi)003:4026: gnyis kyi khas lena nanga 'agla ba'i tshul gyi skyon
NK048(tshi)003:4027: gong du rang gis gzhan la ji snyed brjod pa
NK048(tshi)003:4028: yi skyon de dag rang la'ang mtshungs par thal zhe
NK048(tshi)003:4030: gnyis pa rtsod pa de spang ba la gsum /
NK048(tshi)003:4031: rnam shes dang ye shes sam mnyam rjes sam gnas
NK048(tshi)003:4032: snang gi skabs kyi khyad par phyes te bstan pas
NK048(tshi)003:4033: gshis la khas len med pa'i phyir na snang tshul
NK048(tshi)003:4034: la yod med kyi khas len gnyis yod kyang dpyad
NK048(tshi)003:4035: bzod la sogs pa'i skyon rang la med par bstan
NK048(tshi)003:4036: pa dang / tshul des log rtog gzhan yang khegs par bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)003:4037: rang la bden gnyis khas len nang 'gal gyi skyon med par bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)003:4039: nged kyi khyad par sogs tshigs bcad bcus bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:4040: de la ngeda kyis 'di ltar skabs kyi khyad para
NK048(tshi)003:4041: legs par phyes nasa su rjes thob shan 'byed lam
NK048(tshi)003:4042: gyi dbu ma dang dngosa gzhi 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag
NK048(tshi)003:4043: zung 'jug ye shes kyi dbu ma chen po gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:4044: rim par ragas pa brda'i dbu ma dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4045: phra ba chos nyid kyi dbu ma'am rgyu dang 'bras
NK048(tshi)003:4046: bu'i sama rnam shesa kyi spyod yul dang ye shesa
NK048(tshi)003:4047: kyi spyod yul gyi gnas skabas kyi dbu ma che
NK048(tshi)003:4048: chung gi khyad legs par phyes nasa phra ba chos
NK048(tshi)003:4049: nyid kyi dbu ma'am zung 'jug 'bras bu'i dbu ma'am
NK048(tshi)003:4050: mnyam bzhag ye shesa kyi dbu ma'am chen por khas
NK048(tshi)003:4051: len med par bstan pa dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4052: rags pa sems kyi spyod yul rjes thob shan 'byed
NK048(tshi)003:4053: rgyu'am lam gyi dbu mar khas len yod par bshad
NK048(tshi)003:4054: pa'i phyir na gong du tha snyad pa'i bden pa
NK048(tshi)003:4055: rigs pas dpyad bzod du thal ba la sogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4056: skyon gsum gzhan la gang brjod pa de dag rang
NK048(tshi)003:4057: la ga la 'jug ste mi 'jug ces mdor bstan
NK048(tshi)003:4058: nas de rgyas par bstan pa des na mnyam bzhag
NK048(tshi)003:4059: ye shes zung 'jug 'bras bu'i dbu ma chen po
NK048(tshi)003:4060: la yod med sogs gnyis chos kyi khasa lena ci
NK048(tshi)003:4061: yang meda par ji skad bstan pa de nyid rang
NK048(tshi)003:4062: gi lugs gnas lugs mthar thug bden pa dbyer med
NK048(tshi)003:4063: de yina mod kyang de lta na'ang lam rjes thob
NK048(tshi)003:4064: shan 'byed rgyu'am lam gyi dbu ma la snang stong
NK048(tshi)003:4065: bdena pa gnyis so sora snang ba'i tshe snang ba
NK048(tshi)003:4066: ltar bdena gnyis dpyod pa'i rigs pa so so'i tshad
NK048(tshi)003:4067: ma yisa gzhal ba' dagga pa med pa stong pa
NK048(tshi)003:4068: dang sgrub pa yod pa snang ba ste bden pa
NK048(tshi)003:4069: gnyis so so la ltos pa'i bden grub med pa
NK048(tshi)003:4070: dang tha snyad du yod pa'i khas len thamsa cad
NK048(tshi)003:4071: kyang rim par sgro 'dogs dang bskur 'debs kyi loga
NK048(tshi)003:4072: rtog re re dgag pa'i cheda du yin gyi gshisa
NK048(tshi)003:4073: sama gnas lugs zung 'jug 'bras bu'i dbu ma bden
NK048(tshi)003:4074: gnyis dbyer med dgag sgrub bsal bzhag las 'das pa
NK048(tshi)003:4075: la bden pa gnyis so sor la ltos pa'i dgag
NK048(tshi)003:4076: sgrub tu khasa blangs pa ganga yanga meda pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)003:4077: gshisa gnas lugs mthar thug bden pa dbyer med zung
NK048(tshi)003:4078: 'jug mnyam pa nyid la bden pa gnyis po yanga
NK048(tshi)003:4079: so sor risa su chad pa yanga ye meda pasa
NK048(tshi)003:4080: yod med kyi khasa lena dgag sgrub gnyis po gang
NK048(tshi)003:4081: ltar yanga rang gi ngo bos bdena para grub pa
NK048(tshi)003:4082: cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir na dgag sgrub kyi
NK048(tshi)003:4083: khas len ci yang med par shes par bya'o //
NK048(tshi)003:4084: des na mnyam rjes kyi dbu ma'i khyad legs par
NK048(tshi)003:4085: phyes nas mnyam bzhag la bzlo ba'i tshe gshis la
NK048(tshi)003:4086: spros pa med pas khas len med pa rang lugs
NK048(tshi)003:4087: mthar thug tu bstan pa'i gnas kyis rjes thob shan
NK048(tshi)003:4088: 'byed pa'i tshe bden pa gnyis la ltos pa'i dgag
NK048(tshi)003:4089: sgrub gnyis kara yang gang dang gang ni khasa blang
NK048(tshi)003:4090: bar gyur kyang tha snyad snang tshul kun rdzob tsam
NK048(tshi)003:4091: gyi dbang du byas te khas blang ba yin pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4092: phyir dang / gansa skabas su bden gnyis so sor
NK048(tshi)003:4093: dpyod pa'i tshad ma so sos rnyed don dgag sgrub
NK048(tshi)003:4094: gnyis ka so so na re zhig ji ltar bcad
NK048(tshi)003:4095: pa de ltar bden de tshad ma so so dang
NK048(tshi)003:4096: 'gal ba med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)003:4097: de yang rang lugs mthar thug pa nyid ma yin
NK048(tshi)003:4098: pas na tha snyad bden pa rigs pas dpyad bzoda
NK048(tshi)003:4099: du thal ba la sogas pa'i skyon gsum po gang
NK048(tshi)003:4100: yang rang la mi 'bab ste snang ba'i dngos po'ang
NK048(tshi)003:4101: brten nas skyes pa'i phyir don dam dpyod pa'i rigs
NK048(tshi)003:4102: pas dpyad na mi bzoda de gcig dang du ma
NK048(tshi)003:4103: bral zhing rten 'brel yin pas so //
NK048(tshi)003:4104: dngosa meda kyang ni ltos nas btags pa'i phyir rigs
NK048(tshi)003:4105: pas dpyad pa mi bzod de ltos pa dang rten
NK048(tshi)003:4107: de'i phyir mthar thug gi don la dgag sgrub pa
NK048(tshi)003:4108: ma stong dang mi stong pa gnyis ka dper na
NK048(tshi)003:4109: rmi lam gyi bu dang de shi ba ji lta
NK048(tshi)003:4110: ba bzhin tha snyad gzhir ma grub par mtshungsa pa
NK048(tshi)003:4111: la gansa skabsa kyi dgag sgrub gnyis bden gnyis so
NK048(tshi)003:4112: so la ltos te tha snyad du snang tshul mi
NK048(tshi)003:4113: 'gog pas btagsa pa tsam zhig yin te /
NK048(tshi)003:4114: de yang ma brtagsa 'jig rten gragsa pa'i yoda tsam
NK048(tshi)003:4115: de snang tshul tha snyad du yod pa yin gyi
NK048(tshi)003:4116: gansa tshul don dam du yod pa min la /
NK048(tshi)003:4117: bdena meda don dam dpyod pa'i rigas shes kyis mthonga
NK048(tshi)003:4118: ba'i stong ba gansa tshul dona dam du 'doda pa
NK048(tshi)003:4119: de yanga snang tshul kun rdzob kyi zla la ltos
NK048(tshi)003:4120: pa'i dona dam yina gyi gnas lugs mthar thug bden
NK048(tshi)003:4121: pa dbyer med la ltos na dona dam rnam grangsa
NK048(tshi)003:4122: pa tsam mam mthun pa'i don dam zhes don dam
NK048(tshi)003:4123: mthar thug pa nyid ma yin pa de yang tha
NK048(tshi)003:4124: snyad kyi khongs su gtogs so //
NK048(tshi)003:4125: gzhan yang gal te de 'dra'i bden pa gnyis po
NK048(tshi)003:4126: de yang gnas tshul dang snang tshul tha dad pas
NK048(tshi)003:4127: phan tshun 'gal ba nyid yin na bden gnyis tha
NK048(tshi)003:4128: dada du 'dod pa la yang skyon bzhi 'abba par
NK048(tshi)003:4129: mdo sde dgong pa nges 'grel las gsung pa'i don
NK048(tshi)003:4130: / 'di ltar don dam mngon sum du rtogs kyang
NK048(tshi)003:4131: kun rdzob der der ma 'dus pas logs su dmigs
NK048(tshi)003:4132: pa'i phyir myang 'das mi thob pa dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4133: kun rdzob dang tha dad pa'i don dam pa'i bden
NK048(tshi)003:4134: pa de kun rdzob bden pa'i chos nyid ma yin
NK048(tshi)003:4135: par 'gyur te bum pa snam bu'i chos nyid ma
NK048(tshi)003:4137: bden gnyis tha dad pa'i phyir kun rdzob kyi bdag
NK048(tshi)003:4138: rab tu ma grub pa tsam don dam pa'i bden
NK048(tshi)003:4139: pa ni ma yin par 'gyur te /
NK048(tshi)003:4140: bum pa rab tu ma grub pa tsam snam bu ma yin pa bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)003:4141: don dam bden pa rtogs nas myang 'das thob pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4142: dus na'ang kun rdzob de bas logs su dmigs pas
NK048(tshi)003:4143: kun nas nyon mongs par yang 'gyur bas skyes bu
NK048(tshi)003:4144: gcig gi rgyud la kun nyon dang rnam byang dus
NK048(tshi)003:4145: gcig la 'jug pa mi 'gal bar 'gyur ba dang
NK048(tshi)003:4146: bzhi'o // yang gal te de 'dra'i bden gnyis gansa
NK048(tshi)003:4147: snang phan tshun gzhan mina pas gcig pa nyid yin
NK048(tshi)003:4148: na bden gnyis gciga pa'i skyon yang bzhisa gnoda par
NK048(tshi)003:4149: mdo de las gsungs pa ni /
NK048(tshi)003:4150: so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis kun rdzob mthong
NK048(tshi)003:4151: ba'i phyir don dam yang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang
NK048(tshi)003:4152: / kun rdzob la brten nas zag pa 'phel ba
NK048(tshi)003:4153: ltar don dam la brten nas kyang zag pa 'phel
NK048(tshi)003:4155: don dam la dbye ba med pa ltar kun rdzob la'ang dbye ba med par thal bar dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4156: kun rdzob ji ltar mthong ba dang thos pa las
NK048(tshi)003:4157: btsal bar bya mi dgos pa bzhin don dam kyang
NK048(tshi)003:4159: des na gnas snang gcig tha dad du khas blang bar mi bya ste /
NK048(tshi)003:4161: 'du byed khams dang don dam mtshan nyid ni //
NK048(tshi)003:4162: gcig dang tha dad bral ba'i mtshan nyid de //
NK048(tshi)003:4163: gcig dang tha dad nyid du gang sems pa //
NK048(tshi)003:4164: de dag tshul min lta la zhugs pa yin //
NK048(tshi)003:4166: gnyis pa tshul des log rtog gzhan khegs par bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)003:4167: tshul des sangs rgyas sogs tshigs bcad gsum dang rkang ba gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:4168: gong du gnas snang gcig tha dad gang du yang
NK048(tshi)003:4169: khas mi len pa'i tshul des 'dir sangsa rgyas dang
NK048(tshi)003:4170: semsa can kyang gansa tshul dang snang tshul tsam yina
NK048(tshi)003:4171: gyi sems can rgyu dang sangs rgyas 'bras bu nyid
NK048(tshi)003:4172: du 'doda pa ni thega pa dman pa chung ngur
NK048(tshi)003:4174: des na gansa snang gnyis gciga dang tha dad gang
NK048(tshi)003:4175: du yang khas blangsa ba meda pa'i phyir na sems
NK048(tshi)003:4176: cana rnams ni sangsa rgyas yina na mtshan dpes brgyan
NK048(tshi)003:4177: pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du snang runga du yod dgos
NK048(tshi)003:4178: pa dang / lam sgom pa dang sgrub pa thams
NK048(tshi)003:4179: cad dona meda 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur dgos pa dang
NK048(tshi)003:4180: pa dang / / rgyu la 'bras bu gnas na
NK048(tshi)003:4181: zan za ba mi gtsang ba za bar khas lena
NK048(tshi)003:4182: dgos pa la sogas pa'i rigas pasa gnoda pa rnam
NK048(tshi)003:4183: pa kun tu rang lugs 'di la meda de /
NK048(tshi)003:4184: sems can gyi gansa tshul sangs rgyas ganga yina pa
NK048(tshi)003:4185: de yang sems can rnams rang snang glo bur gyi
NK048(tshi)003:4186: sgrib pa yisa rang rang sgrib pa'i phyir na sangs
NK048(tshi)003:4187: rgyas nyid du snang rung ma yin pas sangs rgyas
NK048(tshi)003:4188: su nye bar mi snang basa glo bur gyi sgrib
NK048(tshi)003:4189: pa de dang bral ba'i don du lam sgom pa
NK048(tshi)003:4190: dang / sgrub pa la 'abda par byed dgos pa
NK048(tshi)003:4191: ni rang gzhan gnyis kasa 'doda dgosa pa nyid de
NK048(tshi)003:4192: khyod rang gis kyang sems can rnams rang bzhin gyis
NK048(tshi)003:4193: rnam par dag par khas blang kyang lam rtsol byed
NK048(tshi)003:4194: dgos par 'dod pa ma yin nam de 'dra'i smra
NK048(tshi)003:4195: ba 'brel med kyis ci zhig bya ste dgos 'bras
NK048(tshi)003:4196: dang / med do // gsum pa rang la bden
NK048(tshi)003:4197: gnyis khas len nang 'gal gyi skyon med par bstan
NK048(tshi)003:4198: dang / med do // pa / bden gnyis 'gal ba sogs tshigs bcad drug gis bstan /
NK048(tshi)003:4199: rang lugs la me dang tsha ba bzhin du snang
NK048(tshi)003:4200: stong bdena pa gnyis phyogs su lhung ba'i 'gal ba
NK048(tshi)003:4201: cung zad kyang meda pa'i phyir na tha snyad du
NK048(tshi)003:4202: yod ces pa dang don dam du meda ces lta
NK048(tshi)003:4203: ba yi khasa lena de gnyis po'ang ji ltar 'gal
NK048(tshi)003:4205: de ma zad snang stong bden pa gnyis po phan
NK048(tshi)003:4206: tshun gciga pa'ang mina pa'i phyir na kun rdzob tu
NK048(tshi)003:4207: yod don dam du med ces pa'i khasa blang gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:4208: kyi rnam para bzhag pa'ang shin tu 'thad pa nyid
NK048(tshi)003:4209: yin no // de phyir ji srid snang stong bdena
NK048(tshi)003:4210: pa 'di gnyis snang stong so sora snang ba dang
NK048(tshi)003:4211: bacasa pa'i semsa kyi 'jug pa thams cad dbyings su
NK048(tshi)003:4212: ma nub par ji srid yod kyi bar de srid
NK048(tshi)003:4213: du snang stong bden pa de gnyis phan tshun ltos
NK048(tshi)003:4214: te bzhag pa tsam yin pa'i phyir na gcig yod
NK048(tshi)003:4215: gcig med mi srid pas snang stong gnyis po yod
NK048(tshi)003:4216: mnyam med mnyam yin pas rnam pa kun tu stobs
NK048(tshi)003:4217: mtshungsa pa nyid yin pas na gcig yod gcig med
NK048(tshi)003:4218: ces mtha' gciga kho nar khasa lena pa mina te
NK048(tshi)003:4219: yin no // / gcig tu bral la sogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4220: regs pas dngos kun bden par grub pa meda cesa
NK048(tshi)003:4221: bden stong gdar sha chod pas ngesa pa dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4222: kun tu tha snyad pa'i rigs pas ma brtags 'jig
NK048(tshi)003:4223: rten grags pa'i tha snyad las rgyu 'bras tshe snga
NK048(tshi)003:4224: phyi sogs bslu med du yod cesa rten cing 'brel
NK048(tshi)003:4225: 'byung gi snang cha ngesa pa gnyis resa 'joga gam
NK048(tshi)003:4226: rim gyis bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma gnyis kyis
NK048(tshi)003:4227: ni phyi nang gi dngos po kun gzhal ba'i tshe
NK048(tshi)003:4228: na tshad ma gnyis po rang rang so sosa rnyed
NK048(tshi)003:4229: don nam mthong dona de la snang stong ngam /
NK048(tshi)003:4230: kun rdzob dang don dam ste bden pa gnyis zhes tha snyad tsam du brjod do //
NK048(tshi)003:4231: bden pa de gnyis ngo bo gcig pa dang tha
NK048(tshi)003:4232: dad pa yang mina pa'i phyir na snang stong bden
NK048(tshi)003:4233: pa de gnyis phan tshun mi ltos pa'i mtha' gciga
NK048(tshi)003:4234: tu gang rung gciga spang nas gcig shos nyid ni
NK048(tshi)003:4235: zung du mi rung ste dper na me la mi
NK048(tshi)003:4236: ltos pa'i tsha ba tsha ba la mi ltos pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4237: mer bzung du mi rung ba bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)003:4238: des na bden pa de gnyis la so sor dpyod
NK048(tshi)003:4239: pa'i tshad ma sems byung shesa raba kyis snang stong
NK048(tshi)003:4240: yod med khasa len so sora phye ste smra ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:4241: dper brjod na / 'bras bu'i mathara thug sems dang
NK048(tshi)003:4242: sems byung gi gnyis snang mtha' dag 'gag pa'i ye
NK048(tshi)003:4243: shes chos kyi sku thob pa'i tshe na semas dang
NK048(tshi)003:4244: semsa byung gi gnyis snang ma lusa pa tha snyad
NK048(tshi)003:4245: dbang du 'gag ces khas len bya dgos pa dang
NK048(tshi)003:4246: gnas lugs dam pa'i dona nyid du gdod nas dag
NK048(tshi)003:4247: pas 'agga pa'ang meda do zhes khas len bya dgos
NK048(tshi)003:4249: gsum pa lung las dgag sgrub ji snyed bstan tshul
NK048(tshi)003:4250: gyi sgo nas mi 'gal bar don bsdu ba ni
NK048(tshi)003:4251: / mdo dang bstan bcos sogs tshigs bcad lngas bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:4252: rgyal ba'i bka' yum sher phyin dang bden pa gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:4253: sogs dang snying po bstan pa'i mdo la sogs pa
NK048(tshi)003:4254: dang bstan bcosa chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi
NK048(tshi)003:4255: dbu ma rigs pa'i tshogs dang chos dbyings bstod pa
NK048(tshi)003:4257: rgyal tshab sa bcu'i sems dpa' chen pos sher phyin
NK048(tshi)003:4258: dang rgyud bla ma la sogs pa'i gzhung kun na
NK048(tshi)003:4259: dgag pa dang sgrub pa'i rnam pa ji snyed cig
NK048(tshi)003:4260: gang bstan pa de dag las la la gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)003:4261: don dam pa'i dbang du byas nas gzhi lam 'bras
NK048(tshi)003:4262: bu'i chos thams cad stong pa'am med par khasa lena
NK048(tshi)003:4263: par gsungs te la la tha snyad snang tshul kun
NK048(tshi)003:4264: rdzob kyi dabnga du byas nas gzhi lam 'bras bu'i
NK048(tshi)003:4265: chos thams cad yod par gsungsa pa ste /
NK048(tshi)003:4266: de yang gnas lugs dona dam pa kho na'i dabnga
NK048(tshi)003:4267: du byas na lam lnga sa bcu dang sangsa rgyas
NK048(tshi)003:4268: dang semsa can la sogas pa mdor na gzhi lam
NK048(tshi)003:4269: 'bras bus bsdus pa'i chos thams cad gdod nas dag
NK048(tshi)003:4270: pas stong pa'am meda cesa som nyi mi dgos par
NK048(tshi)003:4271: smra bar rung moda kyi 'on kyang tha snyad snang
NK048(tshi)003:4272: tshul kun rdzob nyid la rnam pa kun tu ltos
NK048(tshi)003:4273: meda du med pa'am stong pa de gciga pu kho
NK048(tshi)003:4274: nara mi 'gyur te med pa'am stong pa nyid yin
NK048(tshi)003:4275: kyang snang tshul rten 'byung 'gags pa med pas gzhi
NK048(tshi)003:4276: lam 'bras bus bsdus pa'i chos 'khora 'adsa kyi snang
NK048(tshi)003:4277: ba'i cha 'di kun snang bar mngona sum bslu med
NK048(tshi)003:4278: nyid du grub cing yod pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)003:4279: snang tshul tha snyad tshad ma'i dbang du byas nasa
NK048(tshi)003:4280: sa lam dang sangas rgyas dang semsa cana la sogas
NK048(tshi)003:4281: pa gzhi lam 'bras bu'i snang ba rab 'byams thams
NK048(tshi)003:4282: cad mngon sum snang ba yoda cesa the tshom med
NK048(tshi)003:4283: par brjod par rigas moda kyi 'on kyang gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)003:4284: stong pa dona dam pa nyid la rnam pa kun
NK048(tshi)003:4285: tu ltos meda du yod pa'am snang ba de gciga
NK048(tshi)003:4287: snang ba rab 'byams thams cad mngon sum gyis yoda
NK048(tshi)003:4288: pa nyid yin kyang don la de ltar ma grub
NK048(tshi)003:4289: pas stong pa nyid yin par don dam dpyod pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4290: tshad mas ngesa nus pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)003:4291: des na yod med dam snang stong ngam kun rdzob
NK048(tshi)003:4292: dang don dam pa'i bden pa de gnyis dus nam
NK048(tshi)003:4293: du yanga chu dang brlan bzhin du gcig meda na
NK048(tshi)003:4294: gciga shos kyang yod pa srid pa ma yin zhing
NK048(tshi)003:4295: de bzhin du gcig yod na gcig shos kyang med
NK048(tshi)003:4296: pa mi srid par shes par bya ba nyid gnad
NK048(tshi)003:4297: kyi don to // gnyis pa gnyis ka stobs mtshungs bden pa'i rtsod spang ni /
NK048(tshi)003:4298: gnyis ka stobs mtshungs med sogs tshigs bcad bcus bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:4299: bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma so sos rnyed don
NK048(tshi)003:4300: snang stong ngam bden pa gnyis grub ka stobsa mtshungsa
NK048(tshi)003:4301: pa'am mgo mnyam pas bdena pa ste yang dag par
NK048(tshi)003:4302: gyur tshe / de ltar na dngosa po kun rdzob
NK048(tshi)003:4303: pa rnams mi stong par don dam par 'gyur ro
NK048(tshi)003:4304: gyur tshe / zhe na / bden pa gnyis ka'ang
NK048(tshi)003:4305: ye gdod ma nas rang bzhina gyi ma grub pas
NK048(tshi)003:4306: stong pa nyid du mnyam pa'am mtshungs pa yin pa
NK048(tshi)003:4307: gyur tshe / zhe na / dang / snang ba
NK048(tshi)003:4308: kun rdzob dang stong pa don dam pa'i yul gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:4309: po rang bzhin gyis sam dona gyis tha dada du
NK048(tshi)003:4310: grub pa nyid ma yin pas na gang snang ba
NK048(tshi)003:4311: de'i ngo bo stong pa yin pa'i phyir na dngos
NK048(tshi)003:4312: po rnams mi stong ba ga la yin te ma
NK048(tshi)003:4313: gyur tshe / zhe na / dang / yin la
NK048(tshi)003:4314: / bden pa gnyis ka mtshungsa para snang ba de'i
NK048(tshi)003:4315: phyir na yang snang stong bden pa gnyis ka'ang mtshungs
NK048(tshi)003:4316: par stong bar nges par grub pa yin te /
NK048(tshi)003:4317: gang snang ba nyid med na de stong ba'ang yin
NK048(tshi)003:4318: par ci yisa shes para 'gyur te mi 'gyur ba
NK048(tshi)003:4319: kho na ste / gang ma snang ba de stong par yang rtogs su mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)003:4320: desa na snang stong gnyis ka phan tshun mi 'agla
NK048(tshi)003:4321: bar ma zad phan tshun rgyu 'bras su ste stong
NK048(tshi)003:4323: rten 'byung stong par 'char zhing snang stong gang rung
NK048(tshi)003:4324: gciga yoda tshe gcig shos kyang me dang tsha ba
NK048(tshi)003:4325: bzhin 'bral mi shes par yod pa la gting nas
NK048(tshi)003:4326: ngesa pa'i shesa pa nam skyes par gyur pa de'i
NK048(tshi)003:4327: tshe na snang stong gnyis dus nam yanga ye nas
NK048(tshi)003:4328: 'du 'bral meda pa'i don la the tshom gyi d+r+wa
NK048(tshi)003:4329: ba ma lus pa chod pa'o //
NK048(tshi)003:4330: de'i phyir snang stong gnyis ganga la ganga gisa phan
NK048(tshi)003:4331: tshun ma khyab pa meda pa'i phyir gang snang ba
NK048(tshi)003:4332: de stong pa nyid yin pas khyab la gang stong
NK048(tshi)003:4333: pa de snang ba yin pas khyab pas na snang
NK048(tshi)003:4334: stong gnyis gang ltar gzhal kyang 'gal ba med pas
NK048(tshi)003:4335: de ltar bltar bden te gang snang ba de stong
NK048(tshi)003:4336: pa dang / stong pa de snang ba'i phyir te /
NK048(tshi)003:4339: gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:4340: stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no zhes gsungs so //
NK048(tshi)003:4341: de yang gzugs la sogs pa'i snang ba 'di rang
NK048(tshi)003:4342: stong para shesa pa yisa snang ba nyid bdena par
NK048(tshi)003:4343: grub pa med para stong par rtogsa pa dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4344: stong pa nyid gzugs sogs su snang bar ram snang
NK048(tshi)003:4345: ba yin par shes na yanga stong pa nyid rang
NK048(tshi)003:4346: bdena dngos su grub par yoda pa mi rtog ste
NK048(tshi)003:4347: zhes mi 'dzin pas stong pa'ang bden med du rtogsa
NK048(tshi)003:4348: par 'gyur ba de yi phyir snang stong 'adu 'bral
NK048(tshi)003:4349: meda pa'i zung 'jug tu mthong ba'i tshe na snang
NK048(tshi)003:4350: stong gnyis bdena dngos su grub para dus nam yanga
NK048(tshi)003:4351: slar mi ldog ste zhes dus nam yang bden dngos
NK048(tshi)003:4352: su tha dad par mi 'gyur bas der 'dzin par
NK048(tshi)003:4354: de ltar 'du 'bral med yang gzugs la sogs pa
NK048(tshi)003:4355: ganga snang ba de dang de yi gansa lugas ni
NK048(tshi)003:4356: stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir na ye nas stong
NK048(tshi)003:4357: pa nyid 'adu 'bral med pa nyid yin la /
NK048(tshi)003:4358: gzugs la sogs pa gang snang ba de spang ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:4359: pha rola lam gzhan du stong pa nyid 'adi'o zhes
NK048(tshi)003:4360: yan gara du cung zad tsam yang mi 'grub cing
NK048(tshi)003:4361: med pa'i phyir na gdod nas snang ba dang 'du
NK048(tshi)003:4363: mdor na ye nas gang snang ba de stong pa
NK048(tshi)003:4364: dang 'du 'bral med pa dang gang stong ba'ang snang
NK048(tshi)003:4365: ba nyid dang 'du 'bral med pa dbyer med dam
NK048(tshi)003:4367: snang stong bden pa gnyis po 'du 'bral med pas
NK048(tshi)003:4368: mgo mnyam pa'am mtshungs pa des na ji srid bden
NK048(tshi)003:4369: gnyis so sor dpyod pa'i tshad ma gnyis resa 'joga
NK048(tshi)003:4370: gisa rnyed don bdena pa gnyis so sor bsgom pa
NK048(tshi)003:4371: sems byung shesa raba ste gzung 'dzin can sems byung
NK048(tshi)003:4372: shes raba yin la gzung 'dzin gnyis snang can 'khor
NK048(tshi)003:4373: ba'i gnas skabsa 'di na semsa dang sems byung gi
NK048(tshi)003:4374: g.yo ba gzung 'dzin gyi rnam par rtog pa'i sgrib
NK048(tshi)003:4375: pa yis gzung 'dzin gnyis snang gi rnam par rtog
NK048(tshi)003:4376: pa'i spros pa shin tu phra ba dang yang bral
NK048(tshi)003:4377: ba'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shesa 'od gsal ba
NK048(tshi)003:4378: nyid nye bar mi snang zhing rtogs par mi nus
NK048(tshi)003:4379: pa'i phyir na ji skad bstan pa'i snang stong bden
NK048(tshi)003:4380: pa gnyis la so sor dpyad pa'i shes rab 'khrul
NK048(tshi)003:4381: pa'i dri ma med pa'i tshad ma gnyis gcig spang
NK048(tshi)003:4382: gcig blang med para mgo mnyam du bzung ba bya
NK048(tshi)003:4383: dgos pa ste / de'i rgyu mtshan 'di ltar gang
NK048(tshi)003:4384: gi tshe bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma gnyis las
NK048(tshi)003:4385: gang rung gciga ma tshanga ba'am med par gyur na
NK048(tshi)003:4386: rgyu bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma de gnyis lasa
NK048(tshi)003:4387: legs par byung ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4388: zung 'jug gi ye shesa nyid ngesa para mi skye
NK048(tshi)003:4389: zhing mi 'byung ste rgyu ma tshang ba'i phyir dper
NK048(tshi)003:4390: na gtsubsa shinga dang gtsubsa gtan gyi shing gnyis las
NK048(tshi)003:4391: dgos pa ste / / ganga runga dang bral ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:4392: me ni yang dag par 'byung ba mina pa bzhina
NK048(tshi)003:4393: dgos pa ste / / no // des na thabas snang ba'i cha dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4394: shes rab stong pa nyid kyi cha ya bral te
NK048(tshi)003:4395: phyogs so sor lhung ba dag thabs shes zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)003:4396: yanga dag pa'i lam nyid mina no zhesa rgyal ba
NK048(tshi)003:4397: mchog gis mdo rgyud dang brgyud 'dzina mkhas grub rnams
NK048(tshi)003:4398: kyi bstan bcos mchog rnams las yang dang yang du
NK048(tshi)003:4399: gsungs par mdzad pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:4400: gsum pa bden pa gnyis su phye ste khas len
NK048(tshi)003:4401: dang bcas pa bstan pa'i dgos 'bras bstan pa ni
NK048(tshi)003:4402: / rgyu gnyis 'di spangs sogs tshigs bcad brgyad dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:4403: des na rgyu bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma 'di
NK048(tshi)003:4404: gnyis ma tshogs par gang rung spangsa pa'am bral na
NK048(tshi)003:4405: 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i zung 'jug gi ye
NK048(tshi)003:4406: shes che ste chen po rang rgyud la skye zhing
NK048(tshi)003:4407: 'byung ba'i thabs sam rgyu gazhana ci yang mi srid
NK048(tshi)003:4408: pas rgyu de la brten dgos pa yin la /
NK048(tshi)003:4409: de lta na'ang zab zhi spros pa dang bral ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:4410: zung 'jug ye shesa ranga gi ngo bo ni gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:4411: snang gi bloo gang gis bsam pa dang ngag gi
NK048(tshi)003:4412: brjod pa'i yul las 'adsa pa'i phyir na gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)003:4413: ngo sprod kyi brda thabs sna tshogs dang tshiga tsam
NK048(tshi)003:4414: dag gisa mtshona para byas te ston par byed pa
NK048(tshi)003:4415: ni dper na mdzub mos zla ba ston par byed
NK048(tshi)003:4416: par ji lta ba bzhin lasa ye shes rang gi
NK048(tshi)003:4417: ngo bo dngosa su ljen cer du sus kyang bstan
NK048(tshi)003:4418: para mi nus pasa na gsang basngagasa su gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)003:4419: kyi ye shes ngo sprod pa'i brda thabs man ngag
NK048(tshi)003:4420: de la tshiga dbang rin po che zhesa brda tha
NK048(tshi)003:4422: rdo rje'i snying po'i rgyud la sogs pa zab pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4423: rgyud sde rin po che rnams su yang dbyings ye
NK048(tshi)003:4424: zung 'jug gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de nyid
NK048(tshi)003:4425: tshig dang brda thabas sna tshogs kyi sgo nasa bstan
NK048(tshi)003:4427: de'i phyir 'jiga rten las 'adsa pa'i ye shesa zab
NK048(tshi)003:4428: zhi spros pa dang bral ba'i zung 'jug 'od gsal
NK048(tshi)003:4429: ba de nyid de ltar brda thabs dang tshig gazhana
NK048(tshi)003:4430: la ma ltos par rang gi ngo bo 'adi'o zhes
NK048(tshi)003:4431: ljen cer du gnyis snang can gyis blo gang gis
NK048(tshi)003:4432: kyang dngos su gzung bar nus pa ma yin pasa
NK048(tshi)003:4433: na bdena gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma lam gyi dbu
NK048(tshi)003:4434: ma nyid bstan pa yin la /
NK048(tshi)003:4435: de ltar lam gyi dbu ma bdena gnyis res 'jog
NK048(tshi)003:4436: gi tshul gyis dpyad cing bsgom pa'i 'bras bu dngos
NK048(tshi)003:4437: gzhi mnyam bzhag gi dbu ma bden gnyis dbyer med
NK048(tshi)003:4438: zung 'jug gi ye shes mngon sum nyid du grub
NK048(tshi)003:4439: cing mthong bar nus pa des na bden pa gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:4440: kyi gnas lugs sam yin lugs tshad ma gnyis kyis
NK048(tshi)003:4441: gtan la 'beb pa'i tshe na snang stong bden pa
NK048(tshi)003:4442: gnyis las snang ba kun rdzob dagga bya dang stong
NK048(tshi)003:4443: pa don dam 'gog byed kyi tshul du bden pa
NK048(tshi)003:4444: gnyis res 'joga lta bura bstan par mdzad pa yin
NK048(tshi)003:4445: pa de yi 'bras bu bden gnyis dbyer med bsal
NK048(tshi)003:4446: bzhag dang bral ba'i zung 'jug gi ye shesa nyid
NK048(tshi)003:4447: rdo rje theg pa'i rgyud sder bde ba chen po
NK048(tshi)003:4449: rdzogs pa chen po sogs pa mtshan gyi rnam grangsa dang brda thabs du mas bsten par mdzad do //
NK048(tshi)003:4450: des na gnas lugs gtan la dbab pa'i dbu ma'i gzhung lugsa mang po dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4451: bstan bcos ji snyed pa thamsa cada 'khor 'das kyis
NK048(tshi)003:4452: bsdus pa'i chos thams cad kun rdzob dang don dam
NK048(tshi)003:4453: pa'i bden pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis gtan la phar
NK048(tshi)003:4454: cing rnam para bazhaga par mdzad pa yin te /
NK048(tshi)003:4455: 'di ltar snang stong sogs bden pa gnyis dpyod pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4456: tshad ma gnyis la yang dag par ma brten para
NK048(tshi)003:4457: bden gnyis dbyer med zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes
NK048(tshi)003:4458: nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par
NK048(tshi)003:4459: mi 'gyur te mi rtogs pas na /
NK048(tshi)003:4460: kun mkhyen rgyal basa chos kyi sgo gang ji snyed
NK048(tshi)003:4461: cig gsungsa pa yanga 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi bden
NK048(tshi)003:4462: pa dang dam pa'i don gyi bden pa ste bdena
NK048(tshi)003:4463: pa de gnyis po la yang dag par brten pa
NK048(tshi)003:4465: de yi phyir na bdena pa gnyis so so ru
NK048(tshi)003:4466: dpyad pa yi tshad ma yod med kyi khas lena
NK048(tshi)003:4467: dang bcas pa de la lam gyi dbu ma zhes
NK048(tshi)003:4468: brjod de / 'bras bu'i dbu ma mnyam bzhag ye
NK048(tshi)003:4469: shes kyi ming rgyu nyid la brtagsa pa yisa bden
NK048(tshi)003:4470: gnyis res 'joga rgyu'am lam gyi dbu ma chung ngu
NK048(tshi)003:4472: de la yang tha snyad kun rdzob tu yod ces pa'i khas len yod par ma zad /
NK048(tshi)003:4473: don dam du yang don pa nyid na phung po
NK048(tshi)003:4474: khams dang skye mched la sogs pa don dam dpyod
NK048(tshi)003:4475: byed kyis rnam para dpyad pa'i stong pa nyid dagga
NK048(tshi)003:4476: bya bden grub sel ba'am bcad pa'i meda par dgag
NK048(tshi)003:4477: pa rkyang ba tsam nyid yin pas dgag bya de
NK048(tshi)003:4478: la ltos nasa bden grub bam don dam par meda
NK048(tshi)003:4479: cesa pa'i khasa lena kyang ni nges par yod pa
NK048(tshi)003:4480: yina no // bzhi pa rgyu'am lam gyi dbu ma'i
NK048(tshi)003:4481: khas len de yang don dam rang lugs su byas
NK048(tshi)003:4482: nas kun rdzob gzhan ngor skyel nas lung rigs kyis
NK048(tshi)003:4484: rgyu'am lam gyi sogs tshigs bcad drug gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:4485: de ltar rgyu'am lam gyi dbu ma des bden gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:4486: so sor dpyad pa'i tshad mas dngos po rnams don
NK048(tshi)003:4487: dam par stong pa'am med do zhes pa dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4488: tha snyad kun rdzob tsam du snang ba'am yod zhes
NK048(tshi)003:4489: bdena pa gnyis so so la ltos te ji ltar
NK048(tshi)003:4490: khas blang pa de gnyis ka'nga dbu ma pa dang
NK048(tshi)003:4491: de ranga gi lugas nyid yina gyi gzhan du doma
NK048(tshi)003:4492: dam par med pa'am stong par khas len pa ranga
NK048(tshi)003:4493: lugs su byas nasa kun rdzob tu yod ces pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4494: khas len rnams gazhana 'jig rten rgan po'i ngora 'jog
NK048(tshi)003:4495: pa'am skyel ba 'di 'thad cing rigs pa mina te
NK048(tshi)003:4496: / gal te yin na de 'dra'i dbu ma de
NK048(tshi)003:4497: yi rang lugsa de don dam pa stong pa phyang
NK048(tshi)003:4498: chad rkyang rkyang po kho na ru gyur nasa kyang
NK048(tshi)003:4499: gzhi lam 'bras bu'i snang ba kun rdzob thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:4500: kun med pa la yod par 'dzin pas 'khrul ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:4501: snang ba spang bya kho na yin pas med do
NK048(tshi)003:4502: zhes gzhi lam 'bras bu'i snang ba thams cad la
NK048(tshi)003:4503: skur ba mi bzad pa 'debas shing de 'dra'i lam
NK048(tshi)003:4504: de mthar phyin te sangs rgyas pa'i tshe sgrib pa
NK048(tshi)003:4505: thams cad dang bral ba'i dbyings de yang snang stong
NK048(tshi)003:4506: ya bral bas stong pa phyang chad 'ab'a zhiga tsam
NK048(tshi)003:4507: lhag mara lus pa'am chad stong nam mkha' lta bur
NK048(tshi)003:4508: gyur nas 'bras chos kyi yon tan mkhyen pa gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:4509: sogas ci yang meda par 'doda pa khyod ni theg
NK048(tshi)003:4510: dman pas nyan ranga ranga lam gyis phung po lhag
NK048(tshi)003:4511: ma meda par bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du
NK048(tshi)003:4512: ci yang med pas myang 'das sam /
NK048(tshi)003:4513: mya ngan las 'adsa par 'dod pa ji lta ba
NK048(tshi)003:4514: bzhina du de 'dra'i dbu ma'i rang lugs 'dod pa
NK048(tshi)003:4515: 'dira yanga theg chen gyi myang 'das mngon par rdzogs
NK048(tshi)003:4516: par sangs rgyas kyang mkhyen gnyis kyi ye shes sogs
NK048(tshi)003:4517: 'bras chos kyi yon tan rnams snum zad pas mar
NK048(tshi)003:4518: me rgyun chad pa ltar ci yang med par 'gyur
NK048(tshi)003:4519: na theg dman pas 'dod pa dang don la khyad
NK048(tshi)003:4520: par rdul tsam yang meda pa'i phyir na shin tu
NK048(tshi)003:4521: mi 'thad cing der ma zad zung 'juga gi dbyings
NK048(tshi)003:4522: sam snang stong gnyis su med pa'i 'bras chos kyi
NK048(tshi)003:4523: ye shes meda para skur ba shin tu mi bzad
NK048(tshi)003:4524: pa 'debas pas chad stong nam mkha'a dang 'dra ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:4525: yid can khyod ni mnyam med sh+aakya seng ge yi
NK048(tshi)003:4526: bstan pa'i snying po snang stong zung 'jug gi rkun
NK048(tshi)003:4527: po nges don zab mo'i dam pa'i chosa 'jiga par
NK048(tshi)003:4528: byed pa'i skyes bur kun mkhyen rgyal basa mdo rgyud
NK048(tshi)003:4529: du ma nas gsal bar gsungsa pa'i lung rnams kyis
NK048(tshi)003:4530: shin tu pham par byas shing yang dag pa'i rigas
NK048(tshi)003:4531: pasa kyang ni stong bden gnyis 'gal bar rtog pas
NK048(tshi)003:4532: snang stong ya bral ba'i stong pa phyang chad de
NK048(tshi)003:4533: 'dra'i rang lugsa 'dod pa dag tha snyad yang dag
NK048(tshi)003:4534: pa'i tshad ma'i rnyed don yoda pa la meda par
NK048(tshi)003:4535: shin tu skur ba'i tshul can yina para bden gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:4536: dpyod pa'i tshad ma yang dag pa'i lam gyis nges
NK048(tshi)003:4537: shesa mi shig pa'i rdo rje'i mes snang stong ya
NK048(tshi)003:4538: bral zhing skur 'debs phyang chad stong pa'i lta ngana
NK048(tshi)003:4539: gyi ri bo rtsa spur bzhin du bsregs nas lhag
NK048(tshi)003:4540: med du brlag para nus pas na rigs pas gnod
NK048(tshi)003:4541: pa bzlog med du 'bab par shes par bya'o //
NK048(tshi)003:4542: gsum pa tshul des mdo sngags kyi lam gnad bstan pa la gsum /
NK048(tshi)003:4543: mdo sngags kyi lam gnad thun mong du spyir bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)003:4544: mdo sngags kyi lam gnad dang lta ba'i khyad par bye brag tu bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)003:4545: tshul des gzhan yang mtshon tshul bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)003:4551: des na dbu ma'i sogs tshigs bcad bzhis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:4552: des na gnas lugs gtan la dbab pa'i dbu ma'i
NK048(tshi)003:4553: gzhung bka' dang bstan bcos kun tu snang stong bden
NK048(tshi)003:4554: pa gnyis la so sor dpyod pa'i tshad mas drangs
NK048(tshi)003:4555: pa'i shes rab rgyu yi dbu ma nyid rigas pasa
NK048(tshi)003:4556: tshul bzhin du dpyad cinga yang dag par ma grub
NK048(tshi)003:4557: para gyur pa de srid du zung 'jug 'bras bu'i
NK048(tshi)003:4558: dbu ma'am 'bras bu'i mnyam bzhag gi ye shes bden
NK048(tshi)003:4559: gnyis zung du 'jug pa nyid mi 'grub pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)003:4560: na re zhig dngos po'i chos thams cad kyi gnas
NK048(tshi)003:4561: lugs snang stong bden pa gnyis kyi tshul du ni
NK048(tshi)003:4562: bden gnyis dpyod pa'i rigas pa yang dag pasa gtan
NK048(tshi)003:4563: la phab par mdzad na yanga 'bras bu gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)003:4564: bdena pa dbyer meda dam snang stong zung 'jug spros
NK048(tshi)003:4565: bral mnyam pa nyid du grub cing rtogs pa ni
NK048(tshi)003:4566: rgyu dang 'bras bu mdo sngags kyi theg pa'i dgongs
NK048(tshi)003:4567: bcud zab mo'i gnad dam pa yin par shes par
NK048(tshi)003:4568: bya'o // de yi phyir na 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag
NK048(tshi)003:4569: zung 'jug gi ye shesa de dang rjes su mthun
NK048(tshi)003:4570: par gtan la dbab cing bsgom pa de daga gis
NK048(tshi)003:4571: ni bden gnyis res 'joga gi bsgom pa'i tshul gyis
NK048(tshi)003:4572: mtha'a gnyis rim gyis spang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' gang
NK048(tshi)003:4573: la yang mi gnas pas blo lasa 'das pa'i zung
NK048(tshi)003:4574: 'jug gi ye shes su la zlo ba'i phyir na
NK048(tshi)003:4575: dbu ma yina la chen po'ang yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:4576: de lta na ji srid res 'joga gi bden gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:4577: bsgom pa'i tshul gyis ni nam zhig res 'jog dang
NK048(tshi)003:4578: bral ba'i zung 'jug gi ye shesa de la dngos
NK048(tshi)003:4579: su ma rega para de srid du rgyal ba kun
NK048(tshi)003:4580: gyi dgongas pa'i bcud dam mthil mathara thug pa'i zung
NK048(tshi)003:4581: 'jug gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dbu ma chen
NK048(tshi)003:4584: gtsubs shing gtsubs pa'i sogs tshigs bcad bcu bzhi dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:4585: dper na gtsubsa shing dang gtsubs brten gyi shing gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:4586: ya ma bral bar gtsubsa pa'i stobs las byung ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:4587: me yis rang gang las byung ba'i shing gnyis kyang
NK048(tshi)003:4588: lhag med du bsreg pa bzhina du snang stong bdena
NK048(tshi)003:4589: gnyis so sor dpyod pa'i tshad ma gnyis kyi shes
NK048(tshi)003:4590: raba dri ma meda pa zung du tshogs pa'i stobs
NK048(tshi)003:4591: kyis byung ba'am drangsa pa yi bden gnyis sam snang
NK048(tshi)003:4592: stong gnyis su med par zung du 'jug pa'i ye
NK048(tshi)003:4593: shesa kyis mes yoda pa dang meda pa yin pa
NK048(tshi)003:4594: dang mina pa la sogs pa mtha' bzhi'i spros pa
NK048(tshi)003:4595: gnyis snang gi rgyu ba mtha' dag ma lus pa
NK048(tshi)003:4596: kun nye bar zhi ba'i 'aphagas pa'i mnyam bazhaga yul
NK048(tshi)003:4597: dang yul can gnyis su med pa'i ye shesa nyid
NK048(tshi)003:4598: la bden gnyis zung 'jug chen po 'bras bu'i dbu
NK048(tshi)003:4599: mara zhes tha snyad du brjod ces bazhaga pa yin
NK048(tshi)003:4600: la de 'dra'i bdena pa gnyis snang stong so so'i
NK048(tshi)003:4601: phyogs su ma lhung zung 'jug gnyis su med pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4602: ye shes de la rjes thoba shan 'byed pa'i shesa
NK048(tshi)003:4603: rab kyis bden gnyis sam thabs shes sam dbyings ye'am
NK048(tshi)003:4604: / snang stong zung du 'jug pa zhesa ming ngam
NK048(tshi)003:4605: brda tsam gyis sgo nasa tha snyad du rnam par
NK048(tshi)003:4606: bzhag cing bstan moda kyi dngos su na sgra rtog
NK048(tshi)003:4607: gi yul las 'das pa'i 'phags pa'i mnyam bazhaga gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:4608: su med pa'i zung 'jug ye shesa chena po'i ngora
NK048(tshi)003:4609: snang ba dang stong ba dang zung 'jug gi ngo
NK048(tshi)003:4610: bo ni 'di dang 'di zhes so sor ci yang
NK048(tshi)003:4611: dmigas su yoda pa ma yina te snang ba kun
NK048(tshi)003:4612: rdzob tha snyad dpyod pa'i tshad ma'i yul lam rnyed
NK048(tshi)003:4613: / don dang / stong pa dona dam dpyod pa'i tshad ma'i yul lam rnyed don dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4614: zung 'jug snang stong de gnyis rnam dbyer med pas 'dres pa'i cha yin la /
NK048(tshi)003:4615: de rnams ni gzhan sel gyi sgra dang rtog pa'i yul nyid yina pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)003:4616: de yi phyir na sgra rtog gi tha snyad de
NK048(tshi)003:4617: dag lasa 'adsa pa'i 'phags pa'i mnyam gzhag dngos ni
NK048(tshi)003:4618: so so ranga gi rig pa gnyis su med pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4619: ye shesa tsam nyid las mnyam bzhag snang bacasa dang
NK048(tshi)003:4620: snang meda la sogas pa'i tha snyad thams cad kyang
NK048(tshi)003:4621: snang stong so so'i phyogs su chad cing sgra rtog
NK048(tshi)003:4622: gi yul yin pa'i phyir na gang du ji skad
NK048(tshi)003:4623: bstan pa de bzhina du 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag gi
NK048(tshi)003:4624: ye shes chen po'i ngor rigas pasa yang dag par
NK048(tshi)003:4625: mi 'grub bo ste 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
NK048(tshi)003:4626: des na ji srid snang stong so sor snang ba
NK048(tshi)003:4627: dang bcas pa'i res 'joga gi bden pa gnyis yang
NK048(tshi)003:4628: dag par bsgom pa ni gnyis snang can sems byung
NK048(tshi)003:4629: shesa rab ste nam zhiga na res 'joga gi bden
NK048(tshi)003:4630: pa gnyis bsgom pa meda para yanga 'phags pa'i mnyam
NK048(tshi)003:4631: bzhag zung 'jug gnyis su med pa'i ye shesa mngon
NK048(tshi)003:4632: sum du mthong ba'am thoba pa'i tshe na phung po
NK048(tshi)003:4633: dang khams la sogs pa'i dgag bya rnams don dam
NK048(tshi)003:4634: rnam par dpyad pa'i tshad ma rnams kyis rang bzhin
NK048(tshi)003:4635: med par bacada pa'am gtan phab pa'i meda dgag snang
NK048(tshi)003:4636: ba spang ba'i stong rkyang chu shing lta bu snying
NK048(tshi)003:4637: po med lasa yang dag par 'adsa te stong pa
NK048(tshi)003:4638: 'goga byed dang snang ba dagga bya yi tshul du
NK048(tshi)003:4639: snang stong gnyis ris chad du so sora mi snang
NK048(tshi)003:4640: bar gnyis snang thams cad nub na yang snang cha
NK048(tshi)003:4641: 'gags pa med pa'i thabs kyi rnam pa kun dang
NK048(tshi)003:4642: ldan pa yi rnam pa kun gyi mchoga ldan gyi
NK048(tshi)003:4643: stong nyid spros bral chen po zhes dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4644: spros bral dbu ma chen po zhes dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4645: bden gnyis dbyer med dam zung 'jug zhes dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4647: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4648: lhan skyes phyag rgya chen po dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4649: 'od gsal rdzogs pa chen po sogas mtshon byed barda'am
NK048(tshi)003:4650: matshana gyi rnam grangsa manga po mang'a ba yi zung
NK048(tshi)003:4651: 'jug gnyis su med pa'i gnas lugs de semas dang
NK048(tshi)003:4652: sems byung las 'adsa pa'i gnyis su med pa'i ye
NK048(tshi)003:4653: shesa yina pa'i phyir na gzung 'dzin gnyis snang can
NK048(tshi)003:4654: gyi sems sam rtogsa pa gazhana rnams kyis te rtog
NK048(tshi)003:4655: pa gang gis kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste
NK048(tshi)003:4656: / smra bsam brjod med shes rab pha rol phyin zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
NK048(tshi)003:4657: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes de ni sgra
NK048(tshi)003:4658: dang rtog pa gang gi yul mina pa'i phyir meda
NK048(tshi)003:4659: dagga snang ba spang ba'i stong pa phyang chad dang
NK048(tshi)003:4660: ma yin dgag rang gi ngo bos mi stong pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4662: snang stong so so ba blos zung du sbyar ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:4663: tha gu dkar nag bsgril ba lta bu'i zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)003:4664: la sogas pa dang gcig dang tha dad pa dang
NK048(tshi)003:4665: ni / snang ba dang stong pa la sogas gang
NK048(tshi)003:4666: gi phyogs su ltung ba'am ris su chad pa meda
NK048(tshi)003:4667: ni / pa ste / rgya gang du ma chad
NK048(tshi)003:4668: phyogsa gang du'ang ma lhung bas spros pa thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:4669: dang bral ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rang
NK048(tshi)003:4670: bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na ma skyes mi 'gag
NK048(tshi)003:4673: de ni khas lena yoda meda dam yod med snang
NK048(tshi)003:4674: stong la sogs pa'i khas len thams cad lasa 'das
NK048(tshi)003:4675: kyang ci yang dran med thom me ba gnyid thug
NK048(tshi)003:4676: dang brgyal ba la sogs pa lta bu ma yin
NK048(tshi)003:4677: par mthar 'dzin gyi lta ba ngan pa'i smag thams
NK048(tshi)003:4678: cad sel nus pa'i chos kyi dbyings e wam ste
NK048(tshi)003:4679: stong pa'i ye shes dbyings dang gsal ba'i ye shes
NK048(tshi)003:4680: bde ba chen po gnyis 'du 'bral med pas dbyer
NK048(tshi)003:4681: med zung du zhugsa pa yi ranga byung gi ye
NK048(tshi)003:4682: shesa rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi so so rang rig
NK048(tshi)003:4683: pa'i ye shes kyis mthong ba med pa'i tshul gyis
NK048(tshi)003:4684: mthong zhing gansa pa meda pa'i tshul gyis gnas shing
NK048(tshi)003:4685: snang ba med pa'i tshul gyis snang ba ste /
NK048(tshi)003:4686: so so rang rig ye shes spyod yul ba //
NK048(tshi)003:4688: de ltar na yod med yin min stong dang mi
NK048(tshi)003:4689: stong la sogs pa'i khas lena thams cad lasa 'adsa
NK048(tshi)003:4690: pa'i gnas lugs snang stong gnyis su med pa'i chos
NK048(tshi)003:4691: kyi dbyings nyid rang gi ngo bos mi stong bar
NK048(tshi)003:4692: sgro 'dogs pa dang dbyings dang gnyis su med pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4693: 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba nyid med
NK048(tshi)003:4694: par skur pa 'debs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:4695: gnas lugs dam pa'i dona zung 'jug gnyis su med
NK048(tshi)003:4696: pa'i 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba nyid
NK048(tshi)003:4697: med par skur pa 'debs pa thams cad dang bral
NK048(tshi)003:4698: ba'i gnas lugs dam pa'i don zung 'jug gnyis su
NK048(tshi)003:4699: med pa'i ye shes dbyings dang riga pa'am dbyings dang
NK048(tshi)003:4700: ye shes ye nas 'adu 'bral med pa'i gnas tshul
NK048(tshi)003:4701: zab mo de kho na nyid rang gi ngo bo
NK048(tshi)003:4702: ni ljen cer du 'di zhes rtags gtan tshigs dpe
NK048(tshi)003:4703: dang sgra rtog gang gis mtshona zhing brjod du meda
NK048(tshi)003:4704: pas shin tu smra bsam brjod pa las 'das par
NK048(tshi)003:4705: 'doda pa'o // de lta na'ang 'ona kyang phyi rol
NK048(tshi)003:4706: pa'i 'dod pa'i bsam mina gyi byed po ltar gang
NK048(tshi)003:4707: zag su yis kyang rtogsa su meda pa nyid ni
NK048(tshi)003:4708: 'doda pa'o // ma yina te / 'di ltar dri
NK048(tshi)003:4709: ma meda pa'i lung gi snang ba la brten te
NK048(tshi)003:4710: 'doda pa'o // ma yina te / / rigas pa
NK048(tshi)003:4711: dri ma med pasa dpyad pa yisa rab tu drangsa
NK048(tshi)003:4712: pa'i 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag zung 'jug gnyis su med
NK048(tshi)003:4713: pa'i ngo bo rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi so sora
NK048(tshi)003:4714: rang riga pa'i ye shes kyi rjes las thob pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4715: dag pa'i ye shes kyis ngesa pa'i shesa pa chos
NK048(tshi)003:4716: kyi dbyings snang stong 'du 'bral med pas bsal bzhag
NK048(tshi)003:4717: med pa'i gnas lugs nyid ji lta bar gsal bar
NK048(tshi)003:4718: byed pa'i mar me ni the tshoma gyi smag thams
NK048(tshi)003:4719: cad dang bral ba daga rnal 'byor pa rnams la
NK048(tshi)003:4720: mngona sum du snang ba nyid yod pa'i phyir ro
NK048(tshi)003:4721: 'doda pa'o // ma yina te / / // gsum pa ni /
NK048(tshi)003:4722: mdo lam thabs dang sogs tshigs bcad gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:4723: mdo lam nas thabas snang ba'i cha dang shesa raba
NK048(tshi)003:4724: stong pa'i cha gnyis phan tshun gcig la gciga gi
NK048(tshi)003:4725: rtsis zina pa'i rgyas gdab pas 'du 'bral med para
NK048(tshi)003:4726: byed kyi rdo rje'i theg pa sngags kyi lam zab
NK048(tshi)003:4727: mo 'dira ni thabas snang ba dang shesa rab stong
NK048(tshi)003:4728: pa nyid gnyis ye nas 'adu 'bral meda para mngon
NK048(tshi)003:4729: sum myong bas rtogsa shing gomsa par byed pa'i khyad
NK048(tshi)003:4730: par tsam nyid las don rang gi ngo bo snang
NK048(tshi)003:4731: stong zung du zhugs pa'i spros bral dbu ma chena
NK048(tshi)003:4732: po dang dbyings ye gnyis su med pa'i 'oda gasla
NK048(tshi)003:4733: rdzogas pa chen po gnyis zung 'jug gnyis su med
NK048(tshi)003:4734: pa'i ye shes su don gciga la mtshon byed kyi
NK048(tshi)003:4735: mtshan nam ming gi rnam grangsa tsam yin te /
NK048(tshi)003:4736: de lasa lhag pa'am mchog tu 'phags pa'i lta ba
NK048(tshi)003:4737: gzhan med de ganga gi phyir na snang stong bden
NK048(tshi)003:4738: gnyis res 'joga tu yod pa dang med pa dang
NK048(tshi)003:4739: gnyis ka dang gnyis min la sogs pa'i 'dzina stongs
NK048(tshi)003:4740: ci yang meda pas mtha' bzhi'i spros pa kun dang
NK048(tshi)003:4741: bral ba'i phyir te 'dzin stangs kun dang bral ba
NK048(tshi)003:4742: de lasa gzhan du gyur pa'i lta ba zhig gal
NK048(tshi)003:4743: te yod par gyur na de nyid 'dzin stang gi
NK048(tshi)003:4744: spros pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir
NK048(tshi)003:4746: mdo sngags kyi lam gnad dang lta ba'i khyad par bye brag tu bstan pa ni /
NK048(tshi)003:4747: 'on kyang mdo las sogs tshigs bcad phyed dang lngas bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:4748: de ltar na mdo sngags kyi lta ba nyid chos
NK048(tshi)003:4749: kyi dbyings snang stong zung 'jug spros pa dang bral
NK048(tshi)003:4751: 'ona kyang mdo lasa bden gnyis sam snang stong ngam
NK048(tshi)003:4752: thabs shes zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi dona
NK048(tshi)003:4753: gang zhig bden gnyis dpyod pa'i gtan tshigs kyis dpyad
NK048(tshi)003:4754: pasa rjes dpag gis gtan la phab cing bsgom pa
NK048(tshi)003:4755: nyid rdo rje'i theg mchog gsang ba bla na med
NK048(tshi)003:4756: pa'i sngagsa lugs su rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so
NK048(tshi)003:4757: so rang rang gi rigas pa'i ye shes kyi dbyingsa
NK048(tshi)003:4758: su 'du 'bral med pa'i zung 'jug gi ye shes
NK048(tshi)003:4759: nyid thad kar / skad cig gis btsan thabs su
NK048(tshi)003:4760: nyams su myong basa mngon sum gyis grub pa yina
NK048(tshi)003:4761: pas ches zab cing khyad par du 'phags pa nyid
NK048(tshi)003:4762: nyid thad kar / yin no // don de yi
NK048(tshi)003:4763: phyir na yang snang stong bden gnyis zung du 'jug
NK048(tshi)003:4764: pa'i dbu ma zhes pa 'di la yanga bdena gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:4765: so sora dpyod pa yi tshad ma sems byung shesa
NK048(tshi)003:4766: raba rgyu'am lam gyi dbu ma dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4767: tshad ma gnyis po desa drangsa pa yi snang stong
NK048(tshi)003:4768: bdena pa gnyis rnam dbyer med par ro gacaga pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4769: dngos gzhi 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag gi ye shes zung
NK048(tshi)003:4770: 'jug 'bras bu'i dbu ma dang gnyis po yang rim
NK048(tshi)003:4771: par rgyu dang 'bras bu'am rnam shes dang ye shes
NK048(tshi)003:4773: de bzhin du mdo dang sngagsa kyi lta ba ste zhes /
NK048(tshi)003:4774: mdo sngags kyi lta ba'i khyad par yang rjes dpag
NK048(tshi)003:4775: dang mngon sum mam rnam shes dang ye shes kyi
NK048(tshi)003:4776: gnas skabs sam rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul gyis snga
NK048(tshi)003:4777: ma las phyi ma gong nas gong du khyad par
NK048(tshi)003:4778: 'phags pa ste / snga ma gnyis snang can sems
NK048(tshi)003:4779: byung shesa raba kyi cha yina la phyi ma sems
NK048(tshi)003:4780: las 'das pa'i zung 'jug gnyis su med pa'i ye
NK048(tshi)003:4781: shesa kho na yina pas so //
NK048(tshi)003:4782: de yi phyir na phyi ma 'di la ni stong nyid spros bral chen po dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4783: lhan skyes phyag rgya chen po dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4784: 'od gsal rdzogs pa chen po sogs chen po'i sgra
NK048(tshi)003:4785: yis snga ma las khyad par du 'phags par basngagasa
NK048(tshi)003:4786: shing bstan par mdzad pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:4787: gsum pa tshul des gzhan yang mtshon pa'i tshul bstan pa ni /
NK048(tshi)003:4788: gnas lugs la yang tshigs bcad gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:4789: de phyir mdo rgyud bstan bcos las gansa lugs zhes
NK048(tshi)003:4790: gang ji snyed cig gsungs pa la yanga gong du
NK048(tshi)003:4791: dbu ma la yang gnyis su dbye bar byas pa
NK048(tshi)003:4792: de bzhina du phung khams skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4793: snang ba'i dngosa po kun stong pa'i gansa lugas med
NK048(tshi)003:4794: dgag dang / snang stong bdena gnyis dbyer med pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4795: gansa lugas zung 'jug gi ye shes gnyis la gnas
NK048(tshi)003:4796: lugs zhes brjod byed kyi ming gcig yin na yang
NK048(tshi)003:4797: brjod bya'i don la ni ngo bo stong pa'i dbyings
NK048(tshi)003:4798: dang ye nas 'du 'bral med pa'i rang bzhin gsal
NK048(tshi)003:4799: ba'i snang ba nyid spang ba'i stong pa phyang chad
NK048(tshi)003:4800: dgag dang / dang / ma spang ba'i snang stong
NK048(tshi)003:4801: zung 'jug gi khyad para ganma dang sa yi mtho
NK048(tshi)003:4802: dman bzhina du mchis shing yod pa nyid yin no
NK048(tshi)003:4803: dgag dang / dang / // de bzhin du chosa
NK048(tshi)003:4804: nyid de bzhin nyid ces pa la yang dngos po
NK048(tshi)003:4805: stong pa'i chos nyid med dgag dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4806: bden gnyis dbyer med pa'i chos nyid zung 'jug gi ye shes gnyis dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4807: chos kyi dbyings zhes pa la'ang dngos po stong pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4808: med dgag dang bden gnyis dbyer med pa'i zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)003:4810: stong nyid la'ang stong nyid med dgag dang stong nyid zung 'jug gnyis dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4811: spros bral la'ang stong pa phyang chad dam stong rkyang spros bral dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4812: bden gnyis dbyer med dam snang stong zung 'jug gi spros bral gnyis dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4813: 'goga pa'i mtha' la'ang med dgag stong rkyang dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4814: snang stong zung 'jug gi 'gog pa gnyis dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4815: dona dam la'ang med dgag rnam grangs pa dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4816: zung 'jug rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam gnyis dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4820: chos dbyings ye shes sogs la'ang med dgag stong rkyang gi dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4821: snang stong zung 'jug gi ste gnyis re gnyis re
NK048(tshi)003:4822: yod kyang rjod byed kyi ming dam sgra gcig nyid
NK048(tshi)003:4823: mtshungs par 'jug kyang brjod bya'i don la med dgag
NK048(tshi)003:4824: stong rkyang dang snang stong zung 'jug gi khyad par
NK048(tshi)003:4825: ram mthar thug pa dang ni nyi tshe ba'i khyad
NK048(tshi)003:4826: para gnam sa'i mtho dman bzhin du shin tu che
NK048(tshi)003:4827: ba'i phyir na rgyu dang 'bras bu'am /
NK048(tshi)003:4829: rjes thob dang mnyam bzhag gam /
NK048(tshi)003:4830: rnam shes dang ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi skabsa
NK048(tshi)003:4831: so sora phye nas lung rigs dri ma med pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4832: sgo nas ma nora ma 'khrul bar legs par bshad
NK048(tshi)003:4833: par bya ste / dper na sin+d+ha pa yi sgra
NK048(tshi)003:4834: gnas skabs so so la ltos nas 'jug pas de
NK048(tshi)003:4836: dper na sin+d+ha pa 'on cig ces pa yang dmag la 'gro tshe shing rta dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4837: chu la brgal tshe gru la 'jug cing go dgos pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)003:4838: mnyam rjes shan ma 'byed pa'i khas len gyi /
NK048(tshi)003:4839: so ma nyi'i d+r+wa bar 'phyan pa'i rmongs pa'i smag /
NK048(tshi)003:4840: dpyis 'byin ye shes nyi ma lam me ba /
NK048(tshi)003:4841: rdo rje'i rig sngags mchog 'di e ma ho /
NK048(tshi)003:4842: zhes bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
NK048(tshi)003:4843: gsum pa yi rangs shing bsdus te gdams pa la gsum /
NK048(tshi)003:4844: yi rangs shing gus pas bstod cing ngo mtshar chos
NK048(tshi)003:4845: kyi sgron me gzhan la gsal bar mdzad par bskul
NK048(tshi)003:4847: chos mchog 'dzin cing shod pa'i snod bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)003:4848: bsdus te snying po'i gdams pa dngos so //
NK048(tshi)003:4850: de ltar zab mo'i sogs tshigs bcad bcus bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:4851: de ltar shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'i don zab mo'i gnas la ji skad bstan pa'i /
NK048(tshi)003:4852: dri ba rnam pa bdun po zab rgyas sam zab
NK048(tshi)003:4853: pa dang rgya che ba'i dona cana rnams de ltar
NK048(tshi)003:4854: lung rigs dri ma med pas legs par bshad pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4855: tshiga rnams kyis yang dag par bkrol ba'i tshe na
NK048(tshi)003:4856: thol byung sdom bu pa'i dri ba po de yanga
NK048(tshi)003:4857: zab mo shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'i gnas bdun
NK048(tshi)003:4858: po'i don la nges pa'i shes pa the tshom gyi
NK048(tshi)003:4859: smag dang bral bar gyur te dga' mgu yi rang
NK048(tshi)003:4860: nas lus gus pa dang bcas te ngaga gisa 'di
NK048(tshi)003:4861: skad du kye ma zhes skyo ba'i nyams kyis dper
NK048(tshi)003:4862: na khron pa'i chu mig chung ngu la gnas pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4863: rus sbal gyis chu mig chung ngu de rgya mtsho
NK048(tshi)003:4864: chena por barlomasa pas mchog tu snyems pas khengs par
NK048(tshi)003:4865: gyur pa yang gzod rgya mtsho chen po mthong bas
NK048(tshi)003:4866: bsnyil zhing brgyal te shi bar gyur pa bzhina du
NK048(tshi)003:4867: rang la ma grags pa'i gzhan gzhung mdo rgyud zab
NK048(tshi)003:4868: mo'i chosa kyi tshul rgya mtsho chena po'i 'jingas lta
NK048(tshi)003:4869: bu rang gis ji bzhin ma mthong zhing ma rtogs
NK048(tshi)003:4870: par rang gzhung tshur mthong gi bzheda pa khron pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4871: chu mig lta bu mchog tu rloms shing snyems pas
NK048(tshi)003:4872: dregsa pa'i ro rab tu myong ba dang ldana pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4873: badga caga rnams kyi mchog tu rlobs pa'i khengsa pa
NK048(tshi)003:4874: khyed gsungs ngo mtshar zab mo'i gtam 'disa rmang med
NK048(tshi)003:4875: du bsnyil bar mdzad pa 'di ni shin tu yi
NK048(tshi)003:4876: rangs shing gus pa'i gnas mchog tu gyur pa'o //
NK048(tshi)003:4877: de phyir shin tu zab pa dang rgya che bas
NK048(tshi)003:4878: ngo mtshar gtam gyi 'byung gnas kun mkhyen gnyis pa
NK048(tshi)003:4879: ronga zom ma h+aa pan+di ta chos bzang dang rgyal
NK048(tshi)003:4880: ba'i dbang po kun mkhyen klong chen rab 'byams zhes
NK048(tshi)003:4881: mtshan snyan gyi gdugs dkar po sa gsum na mngon
NK048(tshi)003:4882: par mtho zhing gragsa pa rje btsun ngag gi dbang
NK048(tshi)003:4883: po ngur smrig gar gyis rol par bstan pa'i 'jam
NK048(tshi)003:4884: dapala dgyes pa'i zlos gar 'aphagas mchog rnam pa gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:4885: kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rgya
NK048(tshi)003:4887: thun mong ma yin pa'i mdo rgyud sna tshogas pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4888: nges don zab mo'i nora bu'i chosa mdzoda rab tu
NK048(tshi)003:4889: mang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mang'a ba las
NK048(tshi)003:4890: legs par 'khrungs pa'i chos tshul zab mo'i dgongs 'grel
NK048(tshi)003:4891: nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po lta
NK048(tshi)003:4892: bu da ltar mngon sum du bzhugs pa de dag
NK048(tshi)003:4893: rnams spangsa nas de dag la bskrun na gazhana gyi
NK048(tshi)003:4894: gzhung lugsa nor bu 'ching bura re zhing mchod pa
NK048(tshi)003:4895: barlomasa pa rnams 'khrul ba'i gzhan dbang gis thun mong
NK048(tshi)003:4896: min pa'i nges don zab mo'i nor bu rin po
NK048(tshi)003:4897: che mchog gi bgo skal las re zhig rang rang
NK048(tshi)003:4898: phyi bshol du gyur pa ni kye ma 'o dman
NK048(tshi)003:4900: des na bden pa gnyis kyi chosa kyi tshul shin
NK048(tshi)003:4901: tu bzang por bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma yang
NK048(tshi)003:4902: dag pa'i rigas pasa rnam par dpyad pas nges pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4903: shes pa the tshom gyi smag thams cad dang bral
NK048(tshi)003:4904: ba mchog tu rnyed pa'i bsam pa cana nam blo
NK048(tshi)003:4905: gros can lung dang rigs pa zab mo la dbang
NK048(tshi)003:4906: 'byor ba rnams ni dus rtag tu mdo rgyud nges
NK048(tshi)003:4907: don zab mo las blo phyir bzlog pa'i bdud dang
NK048(tshi)003:4908: phas kyi rgol ba gang gis kyang mi tshugs shing
NK048(tshi)003:4909: bar chad byed pa meda pas g.yul las mchog tu
NK048(tshi)003:4910: rnam par rgyal te log smra tshar gcod pa dang
NK048(tshi)003:4911: / skal ldan rjes su 'dzin pa la gzhan las
NK048(tshi)003:4912: mchog tu 'phags shing 'gran zla kun dang bral ba
NK048(tshi)003:4914: de yi phyir na tshur mthong byis pa'i ri dwags
NK048(tshi)003:4915: sus kyang bzod par dka' ba'i mdo rgyud zab mo'i
NK048(tshi)003:4916: bden gnyis dpyod pa'i rigas lam seng ge'i sgra bo
NK048(tshi)003:4917: che ji skad bstan pa rab tu bsgragsa pasa dpal
NK048(tshi)003:4918: ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes sam o rgyan mtsho skyes
NK048(tshi)003:4919: rdo rje'i bstan pa'i ringa lugas snga 'gyur gyi mdo
NK048(tshi)003:4920: rgyud zab mo'i khyad para mchoga la gzhan drings mi
NK048(tshi)003:4921: 'jog pas yid chesa zab mo rnyed par gyur cinga
NK048(tshi)003:4922: rang mthong gi mdo rgyud dgongs 'grel phyogs res khengs
NK048(tshi)003:4923: shing dregsa pasa mchog tu bsnyems pas gzhan phyogsa kyi
NK048(tshi)003:4924: grub mthar sun 'byin spro bar byed pa gzhan dag
NK048(tshi)003:4925: sus kyang mi bzlog pa'am mi 'phrog pa'i tshad ma
NK048(tshi)003:4926: bden gnyis dpyod pa'i shes rab kyi ral gri'i yu
NK048(tshi)003:4927: ba mchog la yang dag par brten pa'i skal ba
NK048(tshi)003:4928: bzang po'i go skabsa gzhan pa de dag la gnang
NK048(tshi)003:4929: zhing sbyin para mdzoda cig dang /
NK048(tshi)003:4930: zab mo'i chos kyi phongs rgud dang bral zhing mdo
NK048(tshi)003:4931: rgyud nges don mchog la nges pa rnyed pa'i skal
NK048(tshi)003:4933: des na mdo sngags kyi chosa tshul thun mong pa
NK048(tshi)003:4934: mang du thos pa ro bcud zhim mngar ldan pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4935: bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba'i thun
NK048(tshi)003:4936: mong ma yin pa'i mdo rgyud zab mo'i dgongs dona
NK048(tshi)003:4937: phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni bdud
NK048(tshi)003:4938: rtsi'i rgya mtsho de yi yang snying por gyur pa
NK048(tshi)003:4939: yid bzhin gyi nora bu dbang gi rgyal po bzhina
NK048(tshi)003:4940: du gnas pa de daga rang dang gzhan gyi gang
NK048(tshi)003:4941: zag gi snying na nges par gansa shing bzhugs par
NK048(tshi)003:4942: gyur na de nyid ltar snang la mchog dman bzang
NK048(tshi)003:4943: ngan ci 'drar snang yang rung rang mthong gis snyems
NK048(tshi)003:4944: pa med par 'bad rtsol brgya phrag dag gis gus
NK048(tshi)003:4945: pa mchog gis blang bar bya ste /
NK048(tshi)003:4946: zab mo'i don gyis dbul na gang zag su yang
NK048(tshi)003:4947: ltar snang ci tsam bzang yang mi phan pas gang
NK048(tshi)003:4948: zaga la mi rton chos la rton dgos pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)003:4949: na grags snyan gyis rjes su 'brang bar mi bya
NK048(tshi)003:4950: bar nges don zab mo'i don la rton pas brtson
NK048(tshi)003:4951: pas 'bad pa rnal 'byor du bya dgos so //
NK048(tshi)003:4952: de yi phyir na thun mong ma yin pa'i mdo
NK048(tshi)003:4953: rgyud nges don zab mo'i dgongs don nyid thun mong
NK048(tshi)003:4954: gi mdo sngags rigs gnas dang bcas pa mang du
NK048(tshi)003:4955: thos shing lung rigs mang du smra basa kyang rang
NK048(tshi)003:4956: gar rtogs pa min la der ma zad sngon bsags
NK048(tshi)003:4957: skyes thob kyi shes rab che zhing da ltar sbyangs
NK048(tshi)003:4958: brtson mi dman pas blo gros zaba zab mo ltar
NK048(tshi)003:4959: snang ba rnams kyis gtan tshigs kyis dpyad pasa kyang
NK048(tshi)003:4960: mi rigsa pa'am mi rtogs pa'i nges pa'i mdo rgyud
NK048(tshi)003:4961: zab mo'i dgongs don sa 'oga na gnas pa'i yid
NK048(tshi)003:4962: bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gter bzang po
NK048(tshi)003:4963: dang 'dra ba ltar snang ji 'drar gnas kyang gang
NK048(tshi)003:4964: zag gang gisa 'di nyid rang gis 'dzina cing gzhan
NK048(tshi)003:4965: la spel ba de ni tshogs bsags sgrib pa dag
NK048(tshi)003:4966: pa'i blo gros mchog dang ldan pas gzhan las khyad
NK048(tshi)003:4967: par du 'phags pa'i skyes bu dam pa nyid du
NK048(tshi)003:4968: 'bras bu'i rtags kyis shes shing rtogs nus pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)003:4969: na dus rtag tu de la gus pa mchog gis
NK048(tshi)003:4970: brten cing mnyes par byas te gdams pa'i bdud rtsi
NK048(tshi)003:4971: rab tu myong bar bya dgos so //
NK048(tshi)003:4972: des na mdo rgyud snying po'i dgongs don zab mo
NK048(tshi)003:4973: ji bzhin rtogs pa'i blo gros kyi gter zab mo
NK048(tshi)003:4974: 'bum phrag nora bu'i snod mchog nyid du phyogs rer
NK048(tshi)003:4975: zhen pa'i badga gi blo 'di yang zaba cing yangas
NK048(tshi)003:4976: pa rgya mtsho chen po'am cher bsgrubsa pa'i zab mo'i
NK048(tshi)003:4977: gadmas pa'i legas byas mchog slong ba'i dus la bab
NK048(tshi)003:4978: par rigas nasa klu yi dbang po blo gros mchog
NK048(tshi)003:4979: gi mthu dapala gyi byung ba'i zab rgyas kyi gdams
NK048(tshi)003:4980: pa'i rgya mtshor gus pa chen pos dag'a mgu yi
NK048(tshi)003:4981: rangs bzhina du legs par 'thungs shing tshim par bya'o
NK048(tshi)003:4982: // ganga gi thugs gnyis su med pa'i blo gros
NK048(tshi)003:4983: zab mo'i mthu las babsa pa'i legas par bshad pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:4984: zab rgyas kyi gdams pa chu klung bzang po dag
NK048(tshi)003:4985: gisa de nyid gang las byung ba'i rnam par dpyod
NK048(tshi)003:4986: pa'i blo gros zab cing rgya che ba yi rgya
NK048(tshi)003:4987: mtsho zab cing khyon yangsa para ngesa par rtogsa par
NK048(tshi)003:4988: // 'gyur la / de 'dra'i blo gros mchog rgya
NK048(tshi)003:4989: mtsho chen po lta bu de yi 'byung gansa klu
NK048(tshi)003:4990: yi dabnga po'am rgyal po lta bu ni snga 'gyur
NK048(tshi)003:4991: riga 'dzina brgyud pa'i zhal lung mdo rgyud man ngag
NK048(tshi)003:4992: zab mo nyid du nges par rtogsa par yang 'gyur
NK048(tshi)003:4993: // 'gyur la / ro // de na thun mong
NK048(tshi)003:4994: min pa'i mdo rgyud man ngag zab mo'i dgongs don
NK048(tshi)003:4995: nam mkha'a lta bu pha mtha'a dang bral ba blo
NK048(tshi)003:4996: gros chen po'i hub kyis te hub gcig gis skad
NK048(tshi)003:4997: cig nyid du 'dren cinga zos pa'i dgongs bcud zab
NK048(tshi)003:4998: mo snying la kun du phan pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgya
NK048(tshi)003:4999: mtsho chen po'i dpyid dpal nyid du lena pa'i mthu
NK048(tshi)003:5000: chen po blo la myur du thob par mdzad pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:5001: ngo mtshar rmad byung ba thun mong ma yin pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:5002: mdo rgyud man ngag zab mo'i chos kyi sgron me
NK048(tshi)003:5003: bzang po mchog tu 'bar ba skal bzang dam pa
NK048(tshi)003:5004: rnams la gsal zhing snang bar mdzoda cig ces bskul
NK048(tshi)003:5007: de skad zer zhing sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:5008: gong du bstan pa de skad zer zhing gus pa
NK048(tshi)003:5009: mchog gis btud de gnas pa'i tshe gzu bor gnas
NK048(tshi)003:5010: pa'i drang srong mchog de yisa dri ba po de
NK048(tshi)003:5011: la yanga blo gros chung zhing zaba pa min pa
NK048(tshi)003:5012: nyid blo gros che zhing zaba rgyas su bsgrub par
NK048(tshi)003:5013: byed pa gonga du ji skad bstan pa dag gi
NK048(tshi)003:5014: don rnams bsdus nas 'di ltar gdamsa te /
NK048(tshi)003:5015: de la yang dang po chosa mchog mdo rgyud zab
NK048(tshi)003:5016: mo senga ge'i 'o ma lta bu 'di ni blo
NK048(tshi)003:5017: gros zab mo'i snod bazanga po rin chen gser snod
NK048(tshi)003:5018: mchog lta bu kho nasa 'dzina cing snod gazhana phal
NK048(tshi)003:5019: pa gang du ji ltar 'bad kyang mi gansa par
NK048(tshi)003:5020: snod kyang 'chags la bcud kyang zag nas chud za
NK048(tshi)003:5021: ba ltar blo gros dman pa dag gis ji ltar
NK048(tshi)003:5022: 'bad kyang mdo rgyud man ngag zab mo'i don blo
NK048(tshi)003:5023: la mi shong zhing mi rtogs pas 'dzin par mi
NK048(tshi)003:5024: nus pas chud gzan par 'gyur la /
NK048(tshi)003:5025: chos mchog mdo rgyud man ngag zab mo'i don 'di
NK048(tshi)003:5026: shonga zhing 'dzin pa'i snod ni blo gros bzang po
NK048(tshi)003:5027: zab cing rgya che ba 'di kho na yin no
NK048(tshi)003:5028: // gsum pa bsdus te snying po'i gdams pa dngos ni /
NK048(tshi)003:5029: a ni ma skyes sogs tshigs bcad lnga dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:5030: de la gong gi don ji ltar bsdus te gdams na /
NK048(tshi)003:5031: mdo rgyud thams cad kyi gnad dril ba'i man ngag zab 'di la /
NK048(tshi)003:5032: a zhes pa'i yi ge 'di ni skye ba med
NK048(tshi)003:5033: pas med dgag yid bzhin du rang snang ba ste
NK048(tshi)003:5034: / des na bden pa gnyis char mi skye bar
NK048(tshi)003:5035: bstan pas skye ba med pa'i sgo mtshon byed yin
NK048(tshi)003:5036: pas ma skyes pa'i chosa kyi sgo zhes bya'o //
NK048(tshi)003:5037: de bzhin du ra zhes pa 'di ni rdul med
NK048(tshi)003:5038: pas mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa la rang don du
NK048(tshi)003:5039: srid pa dang zhi ba la dga' ba'i yid kyi
NK048(tshi)003:5040: chags rdul med par 'jug dgos pa'i sgo mtshon byed
NK048(tshi)003:5041: yin pas rdul dang bral ba'i sgo zhes bya'o //
NK048(tshi)003:5042: pa zhes pa 'di ni mnyam bzhag yang dag pa
NK048(tshi)003:5043: la 'dzin stangs ci yang med kyang dran med mun
NK048(tshi)003:5044: pa 'thums po lta bu lhag mthong gi snang ba
NK048(tshi)003:5045: dang bral ba'ang min pas don dam mthar thug mthong
NK048(tshi)003:5046: ba'i sgo mtshon byed yin pas dona dam snang ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:5047: sgo zhes bya'o // tsa zhes pa 'di ni dpyad
NK048(tshi)003:5048: pa yang dag pas mtha' bzhi'i spros pa nye bar
NK048(tshi)003:5049: zhi ba'i nges shes zab mos drangs pa'i mnyam par
NK048(tshi)003:5050: 'jog pa khyad par can yin pas rnam par rtog
NK048(tshi)003:5051: pa'i 'gyur ba'am blos byas kyi 'chi 'pho med par
NK048(tshi)003:5052: mnyam pa nyid chos kyi skur gnas pa'i sgo mtshon
NK048(tshi)003:5053: byed yin pas 'chi 'pho skye ba meda pa'i sgo
NK048(tshi)003:5054: sgo zhes bya'o // zhes bya'o // na zhes pa
