NK048(tshi)003:5055: 'di ni bden pa gnyis la gtso che chung rnam
NK048(tshi)003:5056: pa kun tu med de snang stong gnyis 'bral mi
NK048(tshi)003:5057: shes pa'i phyir me dang tsha ba bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)003:5058: de gnyis tha snyad du ni mgo mnyam ste tha snyad sgra rtog gi yul yin pas so //
NK048(tshi)003:5059: don dam par de gnyis dbyer med pa'i gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)003:5060: ni sgra rtogs gi lam las 'das pa na ming
NK048(tshi)003:5061: dang bral te bsam gyis mi khyab par ston pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:5062: sgo mtshon byed yin pas ming dang bral ba nyid
NK048(tshi)003:5064: d+h+ai zhes pa 'di ni de 'dra'i snang stong bden
NK048(tshi)003:5065: pa dbyer med pa'i don zab mo nyid chos can
NK048(tshi)003:5066: rdul phran lta bu gcig gi steng du da lta
NK048(tshi)003:5067: nas gtan la phab ste chos thams cad mnyam pa
NK048(tshi)003:5068: nyid tshur mthong las 'das pa'i don zab mo shes
NK048(tshi)003:5069: shing rtogs na yang mthun snang gi blta bya'i snang
NK048(tshi)003:5072: don dam spros bral khas len med pa'i tshul dang /
NK048(tshi)003:5073: tha snyad khas len yod pa'i tshul dang /
NK048(tshi)003:5074: de gnyis mi 'gal bar sbyar nas tha snyad kyi
NK048(tshi)003:5075: khas len tshul mthong gi rnam bzhag phar phyin theg
NK048(tshi)003:5076: pa nas sngags rdo rje theg pa'i bar du shes
NK048(tshi)003:5077: pa'i sgo'am mtshan byed yin pas blo gros zab mo'i
NK048(tshi)003:5078: sgo zhes bya'o // de la dri ba dang po dngos gzhi snang stong zung 'jug gi tshul /
NK048(tshi)003:5079: gnyis pas de nyan rang sogs kyi spyod yul min pas zab par bstan no //
NK048(tshi)003:5080: gsum pas zung 'jug de ji ltar sgom tshul /
NK048(tshi)003:5081: bzhi pas bsgom pa de rgyud la ji ltar skyed tshul /
NK048(tshi)003:5082: lnga pas zab mo'i rtogs pa rgyud la skyes pa'i ngor bden gnyis ji ltar 'char tshul dang /
NK048(tshi)003:5083: drug pa de'i ngor chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'char tshul gnyis /
NK048(tshi)003:5084: bdun pas rang gis rtogs pa bzhin gzhan la zab mo'i lta ba 'doms tshul bstan to //
NK048(tshi)003:5085: de ltar rgyal bas gsung ba'i rgyu 'bras theg pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:5086: mdo 'gags thams cad der 'dus pa yin pas 'di'i
NK048(tshi)003:5087: gnad don tshul bzhin du shes par gyur na mdo
NK048(tshi)003:5088: sngags rgya mtsho'i 'gags mdud khrol pas rang gis rtogs
NK048(tshi)003:5089: pa dang gzhan la 'doms pa'i spobs pa'i gter chen
NK048(tshi)003:5090: po brgyad kyi sgo 'byed pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:5091: des na yi ge'i sgo re re las phyogs dus
NK048(tshi)003:5092: kyis bsdus pa'i chos tshul tshad med pa go zhing
NK048(tshi)003:5093: rtogs pa ni brda' zhes bya ba yin la /
NK048(tshi)003:5094: don gcig las brtsams te don kun bskal ba nas
NK048(tshi)003:5095: bskal par brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur bas blo
NK048(tshi)003:5097: don gcig gi nang du chos kun 'du zhing don
NK048(tshi)003:5098: gcig gis kyang chos kun ston par nus pa ni
NK048(tshi)003:5100: yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge kun bsdu
NK048(tshi)003:5101: zhing mnyam pa nyid du nges pa'ang yin la thams
NK048(tshi)003:5102: cad bsdoms nas mnyam pa nyid zung 'jug gi ye
NK048(tshi)003:5103: shes gcig nyid gtan la phabs pa'ang yin no //
NK048(tshi)003:5104: de ni chos kyi gter 'don pa'i man ngag zab
NK048(tshi)003:5105: mo yang yin te yi ge'i sgo a la sogs
NK048(tshi)003:5106: pa drug po de daga re rera yanga bdena pa
NK048(tshi)003:5107: gnyis gnyis kyi tshul gyis snang stong bden gnyis dbyer
NK048(tshi)003:5108: med zung 'jug skye 'gags dang bral bar dmigas nasa
NK048(tshi)003:5109: su ste / 'di ltar yi ge a lta bu
NK048(tshi)003:5110: rjod byed dang ma skye bas lta bu brjod bya'i
NK048(tshi)003:5111: don dag kyang gdod ma nas skye ba med pa
NK048(tshi)003:5112: yin pas mnyam pa nyid yin la mnyam pa nyid
NK048(tshi)003:5113: kyi mnyam pa nyid la brjod du med de nam
NK048(tshi)003:5114: mkha' la nam mkhas ri mo bris pa bzhin te
NK048(tshi)003:5115: su ste / / de lta na'ang brjod med brjod
NK048(tshi)003:5116: pa kun gyi rgyu mchog yin pas bskal pa nas
NK048(tshi)003:5117: bskal bar brjod kyang chos kyi dbyings la bri gang
NK048(tshi)003:5118: ngam zad 'phel yong ye med cing chos thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:5119: brjod pa tsam du shes pa ni don dam par
NK048(tshi)003:5121: de bzhin du brjod byed ra dang brjod bya rdul dang bral ba /
NK048(tshi)003:5122: brjod byed pa dang brjod bya don dam 'od gsal /
NK048(tshi)003:5123: brjod byed tsa dang brjod bya 'chi 'pho med pa /
NK048(tshi)003:5124: brjod byed na dang brjod bya ming dang bral ba /
NK048(tshi)003:5125: d+h+aihlta bu brjod byed zung 'jug gnyis su med pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:5126: ye shes zab mo lta bu brjod bya'i don de
NK048(tshi)003:5127: dag kyang re re bzhin du rjod byed dang brjod
NK048(tshi)003:5128: bya gnyis skye ba med pas mnyam pa nyid yin
NK048(tshi)003:5129: pas gang gis gang zhig brjod de rjod du med
NK048(tshi)003:5130: par ye nas gnas pa'i gnad kyis bskal bar brjod
NK048(tshi)003:5131: kyang bri gang bral ba'i chos kyi dbyings zad 'phel
NK048(tshi)003:5132: med cing / chos thams cad ming ngam brjod pa
NK048(tshi)003:5133: tsam du shes pa ni don dam par dmigs pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:5134: med cing / sgo'o // de ltar mnyam pa nyid
NK048(tshi)003:5135: las ma g.yos mi g.yo g.yo bar mi 'gyur bzhin
NK048(tshi)003:5136: du a las gyur pa'i yi ge skye gnas a
NK048(tshi)003:5137: nyid mgrin rkan spyi bo mchu'i gnas lngar byed rtsol
NK048(tshi)003:5138: gyis bsgyur ba'i ngor snang ba yin /
NK048(tshi)003:5140: lnga pa can a ra pa tsa sogs 'di dag dang yi ge gzhan rnams kyis kyang /
NK048(tshi)003:5141: kun byang gis bsdus pa'i chos kun shes shing go
NK048(tshi)003:5142: bar byed pa ni rten 'byung bslu med tsam ste
NK048(tshi)003:5143: / shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho
NK048(tshi)003:5144: 'phrul chen po kun tu nye bar ston pa'o zhes
NK048(tshi)003:5145: shes pa kun rdzob la dmigs pa'i sgo ste /
NK048(tshi)003:5146: de gnyis dbyer med zung du chud pa yi ngang
NK048(tshi)003:5147: nas blo gros kyi gter la sogs pa'i spobs pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:5148: gter chen po brgyad kyi sgo myur du 'byed pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:5149: rgyu sgyu ma'i ste sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge
NK048(tshi)003:5150: 'dzina mchog tu gyur pa bsgrub par byas na mdo
NK048(tshi)003:5151: rgyud man ngag zab cing rgya che ba pha mtha'
NK048(tshi)003:5152: meda pa'i rgya mtsho chena po'i chu nyid blo gros
NK048(tshi)003:5153: zab myur gyi hub kyis te hub gcig gis lto
NK048(tshi)003:5154: bar 'dren nus pa'i snying ga'i nora bu gnyis su
NK048(tshi)003:5155: med pa'i ye shes dri ma meda pa la gzungsa
NK048(tshi)003:5156: dang spobas pa blo yi dpal phun sum tshogs pa
NK048(tshi)003:5157: nyid du rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
NK048(tshi)003:5158: de ltar snang stong zung 'jug zab mo'i don la
NK048(tshi)003:5159: rang byan chud pa'i sgo nas mtha'a bzhi'i spros pa
NK048(tshi)003:5160: thams cad khegas pa'i zab mo'i nges shesa kyi lam
NK048(tshi)003:5161: nasa chos thams cad kyi yin lugsa ji lta ba
NK048(tshi)003:5162: bzhin gshisa su sona pa yi gnas lugs sems dang
NK048(tshi)003:5163: sems byung gi blo lasa rab tu 'adsa pa yi
NK048(tshi)003:5164: / dbyings ye gnyis su med pa'i 'oda gasla gnyug
NK048(tshi)003:5165: ma'i dbyingsa nges pa don gyi 'ajama dapala rig stong
NK048(tshi)003:5166: dbyer med 'od gsal rdzogsa pa chena po'i ngang du
NK048(tshi)003:5167: ma bcos par mnyam par zho gcig dang /
NK048(tshi)003:5168: mtha' bral lta ba'i rgyal po rig stong dbyer med
NK048(tshi)003:5169: 'od gsal rdzogs pa chen po kun mnyam yangsa pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:5170: klong chen por ji bzhin mnyam para bzhag pa'i bdena
NK048(tshi)003:5171: dona 'od gsal rdzogs pa chen po'i chos nyid mngon
NK048(tshi)003:5172: sum du mthong ba lasa yod med la sogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:5173: mtha' bzhi'i 'dzin stangs kyi blo ngana muna pa'i snang
NK048(tshi)003:5174: ba thams cad kun ngang gisa dwangs shing 'aggas pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:5175: 'oda gsal ba'i mkhyen gnyis ye shes kyi nyi ma
NK048(tshi)003:5176: khong nas 'achara bar gyur te ji lta dang ji
NK048(tshi)003:5177: snyed kyi dgongs pa ye shes kyi klong rdol te
NK048(tshi)003:5178: mgrin pa'i rtsa 'khor gsungs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i sprin
NK048(tshi)003:5179: du dwangs pas 'chad rtsod rtsom pa gang la yang
NK048(tshi)003:5180: thogs pa med pas sus kyang mi 'phrog pa'i rnam
NK048(tshi)003:5181: dpyod 'gran zla thams cad dang bral ba la dbang
NK048(tshi)003:5182: 'byor bar gdon mi za ba kho na yin no
NK048(tshi)003:5183: // bzhi pa ji ltar bstan pa'i don bsdu ba ni /
NK048(tshi)003:5184: gzung gnas dpyod pa sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:5185: gang la 'dri ba'i gnas brtsom pa po rang gi
NK048(tshi)003:5186: blo phyogs su ma lhung ba'i gzur gnas te gzu
NK048(tshi)003:5187: bor gnas pa'i rnam par dpyod pa drang po nyid
NK048(tshi)003:5188: mkhas pa'i drang srong chen po nyid du bkod pa
NK048(tshi)003:5189: ste / gang gis 'dri ba po yang rang gi
NK048(tshi)003:5190: blo zab mo'i gnas la 'gal 'du'i dogs pa thol
NK048(tshi)003:5191: byung gi rnam par rtog pa de nyid sdom bu
NK048(tshi)003:5192: pa rtog ge'i brgal brtags byed pa por bkod de
NK048(tshi)003:5193: ste / brjod nas / drang srong de la sdom
NK048(tshi)003:5194: bu pa des dris shing brgal lan gyis tshul gyis
NK048(tshi)003:5195: ni shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'i ganda zab mo
NK048(tshi)003:5196: rgyal srid rin po che sna bdun gyi grangs dang
NK048(tshi)003:5197: ldan pa rab tu gsal bas legs par bshad pa
NK048(tshi)003:5198: ste / brjod nas / yin no // de yang
NK048(tshi)003:5199: blo gros na tshod ma smin pas chung ba rtog
NK048(tshi)003:5200: ge ba bdag 'dra yisa skyes sbyangs blo mchog mnga'
NK048(tshi)003:5201: bar grags pa'i chen po rnams kyang som nyi'i dra
NK048(tshi)003:5202: bar 'phyan pa'i gnas shin tu zab cing rtogs par
NK048(tshi)003:5203: dka' ba rtog ge'i rigs mdung 'bum gyis mi phigs
NK048(tshi)003:5204: pa'i rab tu barlinga ba'i dona de rnams blo gros
NK048(tshi)003:5205: chen po mnga' ba'i 'aphagas pa'i gang zag mchog rnams
NK048(tshi)003:5206: kyis thugsa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes zab pa
NK048(tshi)003:5207: dang rgya che ba'i mkhyen pa'i gter gsang ba zab
NK048(tshi)003:5208: mo nas kyang yang dag par blang pa ji ltar
NK048(tshi)003:5209: ba bzhina tu gzur gnas dam pa yongs kyi dpyid
NK048(tshi)003:5210: dpal du 'di na legs par bkoda par byas pa
NK048(tshi)003:5211: ste / brjod nas / yin no // yin no
NK048(tshi)003:5212: // gsum pa tha mar dge ba 'jug gi don
NK048(tshi)003:5213: ste / brjod nas / yin no // yin no
NK048(tshi)003:5214: // la gsum / lhag bsam shes rab kyis go
NK048(tshi)003:5215: ste / brjod nas / yin no // yin no
NK048(tshi)003:5216: // la gsum / phyes pa dang / gzhan phan
NK048(tshi)003:5217: snying rjes ji ltar brtsam pa'i mdzad byang dang /
NK048(tshi)003:5218: tshul 'dir brtan na theg pa mchog gi lam bzang rnyed pas brten par gdams pa'o //
NK048(tshi)003:5220: de skad smras pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:5221: de skad zab don yang dag par smras pa'i legas
NK048(tshi)003:5222: par bshad pa'i 'brug sgra snyan par sgrogs pa dang
NK048(tshi)003:5223: bcas pa'i chosa kyi char rab tu bzang po 'bab
NK048(tshi)003:5224: par rgyal ba'i sras po mkhas mchog bye basa zab
NK048(tshi)003:5225: mo'i dgongs don yang dag par bgrod pa'am rtogs par
NK048(tshi)003:5226: 'dod cinga yid dad pas dag'a bzhina gyis mnyan cing
NK048(tshi)003:5227: sems pasa don chen po thoba par semsa pa'i lhag
NK048(tshi)003:5228: pa'i bsam pa yisa gang zhig dris pa rnams la
NK048(tshi)003:5229: dga' spro yi rangs pa'i tshul gyis lan gyi khyad
NK048(tshi)003:5230: par zab mo'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char chen po'i
NK048(tshi)003:5231: go skabsa 'di nyid legs par dbye bar byas so
NK048(tshi)003:5233: de phyir de bas sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:5234: gang mdo rgyud zab mo'i dgongs don ji bzhin rnyed
NK048(tshi)003:5235: pa'i lam dngos yang dag par mthong ba'i mig tu
NK048(tshi)003:5236: gyur pa bden pa gnyis kyi de kho na nyid
NK048(tshi)003:5237: dpyod pa'i tshad ma'i lam nas nges pa'i shes pa
NK048(tshi)003:5238: zab mo the tshom gyi smag thams cad dang bral
NK048(tshi)003:5239: ba nyid dgongs pa yin pa de yi phyir na
NK048(tshi)003:5240: tshad ma dang bral na nges shes zab mo mi
NK048(tshi)003:5241: rnyed pas lam gyi gzugs brnyan du 'gyur ba de
NK048(tshi)003:5242: lta basa na / dpal chos kyi grags pa dang
NK048(tshi)003:5243: dpal ldan zla ba'i ring lugs bzhin bden gnyis so
NK048(tshi)003:5244: sor dpyod pa'i tshad ma dang mthar thug bden gnyis
NK048(tshi)003:5245: dbyer med zung 'jug nges pa'i tshad ma'i mig bzang
NK048(tshi)003:5246: po dpyad gsum gyis sbyangs shing bgrad de mdo rgyud
NK048(tshi)003:5247: zab mo'i gnas la gzhan dring mi 'jog par yang
NK048(tshi)003:5248: dag par bzhugs dgos pa'i tshul de ltar yanga dang
NK048(tshi)003:5249: yanga du mdo rgyud zaba rgyas kyi dona rtogs par
NK048(tshi)003:5250: 'dod cing semas pa'i blo ldan gzu bor gnas pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:5251: skal bzang du ma'i dona du yanga zab rgyas kyi
NK048(tshi)003:5252: don la ji bzhin rtog pa'i yid kyi me longa
NK048(tshi)003:5253: dri ma med pa'i ngosa la ji ltar shar ba
NK048(tshi)003:5254: bzhina du rnam dpyod blo yi rtsed 'jo'i rola basa
NK048(tshi)003:5255: d+h+aiming cana gyis te blo gros dri med kyis legs
NK048(tshi)003:5256: par yang dag par spel ba'o //
NK048(tshi)003:5258: bde gshegs chos tshul sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)003:5259: bde bar gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
NK048(tshi)003:5260: kyi bka' mdo rgyud kyi chosa tshul zaba mo nam
NK048(tshi)003:5261: mkha'i mtha'a dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa thams cad
NK048(tshi)003:5262: rnam pa kun tu sgra rtog gi brjod para mi
NK048(tshi)003:5263: nus shing zad par yang mi 'gyur kyang mdo rgyud
NK048(tshi)003:5264: zab mo'i gnad la ngesa pa'i shes pa zab mo
NK048(tshi)003:5265: the tshom gyi smag thams cad dang bral ba'i snang
NK048(tshi)003:5266: ba mchog tu gsal bar byed pa'i rina po che
NK048(tshi)003:5267: yi sgron me 'dir yang dag par brten na mdo
NK048(tshi)003:5268: rgyud theg mchoga zab mo'i lam bazanga po rang gis
NK048(tshi)003:5269: ji bzhin du bde blag tu rnyed cing rtogs nas
NK048(tshi)003:5270: gzhan la nor 'khrul med par ston par nus pas
NK048(tshi)003:5271: na gzu bor gnas pa'i blo can chos kyi spyan
NK048(tshi)003:5272: ldan skal bzang mkhas pa'i tshogs kyis legs par bsten
NK048(tshi)003:5273: par mdzod cig ces yang dag par gdams par mdzad
NK048(tshi)003:5274: pa'o // slar rje nyid kyi gzigs gnang mdzad pa'i zhal byang ni /
NK048(tshi)003:5275: nges shes rin po che'i sgron me 'di rang lo
NK048(tshi)003:5276: shin tu gzhon zhing slob gnyer gsar bu ba'i dus
NK048(tshi)003:5277: zhig na 'phral du yid la shar rtsom stan gcig
NK048(tshi)003:5279: don la 'gal ba med cing go rgyu gnad can
NK048(tshi)003:5280: 'dug pas ma bcos par de gar bzhag pa yin
NK048(tshi)003:5281: no zhes mi pham pas rang lo nga bdun par
NK048(tshi)003:5282: smras dge'o // zhes pas tshig gi sdebs sbyor lhur
NK048(tshi)003:5283: ma blang bar don la rton par byas pa yin
NK048(tshi)003:5284: no zhes tshig la mi rton don la rton par
NK048(tshi)003:5285: gdams pa'i shugs kyis gang zag la mi rton chos
NK048(tshi)003:5287: don la yang drang don la mi rton nges don la rton pa dang /
NK048(tshi)003:5288: nges don la yang rnam shes kyi spyod yul la
NK048(tshi)003:5289: mi rton ye shes kyi spyod yul la rton par
NK048(tshi)003:5290: gdams par mdzad pa 'di ni mkhas pa yongs kyi
NK048(tshi)003:5291: thugs kyis brnag bya g.yar dam du bya ba'i gdams
NK048(tshi)003:5292: pa phun sum tshogs pa zhig lags so //
NK048(tshi)003:5294: gang yang mdo rgyud zab mo'i lung rigs dag /
NK048(tshi)003:5295: legs par shan ma 'byed pa'i gnyid 'thug por //
NK048(tshi)003:5296: 'phyan par gyur gang btsan thabs slong byed pa //
NK048(tshi)003:5297: 'jam dbyangs rnam par rgyal ba'i 'brug sgra nyid /
NK048(tshi)003:5299: 1 / khyod med pas na rtogs dka' zab mo 'dir //
NK048(tshi)003:5300: skyes sbyangs blo gros zab zab ltar snang yang //
NK048(tshi)003:5301: lung rigs 'bum phrag rdo rje'i khur lci bas //
NK048(tshi)003:5302: som nyi'i dpyang thag dam pos gnyid du yur /
NK048(tshi)003:5304: 2 / skal bzang mkhas pa'i mdun sar rab grags pa'i //
NK048(tshi)003:5305: mdo rgyud grub mtha'i lung rigs man ngag dag /
NK048(tshi)003:5306: phyogs rer zhen pas phan tshun 'then khyer gyis //
NK048(tshi)003:5307: rtsod pa'i d+r+wa bar chud pa'i 'phyang mo nyug 3 /
NK048(tshi)003:5308: mngon sum mchod ces 'jam pa'i rdo rje yis //
NK048(tshi)003:5309: ye shes phyag gi ral gri'i dbang bskur zhing //
NK048(tshi)003:5310: dbugs dbyung gsung gi snang dang chab gcig par //
NK048(tshi)003:5311: nges shes rin chen sgron me mchog tu 'bar /
NK048(tshi)003:5313: 4 / chos spyan ldan la nyin mo'i snang ba bzhin //
NK048(tshi)003:5314: zab don mngon sum mthong ba'i dpyid dpal de //
NK048(tshi)003:5315: gang la gzan par gyur kyang rang skyon nyid //
NK048(tshi)003:5316: 'di yi skyon du bsgyur ba'i ci zhig rung /
NK048(tshi)003:5318: 5 / deng dus snyigs ma'i gzhan dbang cher bdo bas //
NK048(tshi)003:5319: gzu bor mi gnas byis pa'i rang mthong gis //
NK048(tshi)003:5320: chags sdang snyems pa mtho bas spyi brdol gyis //
NK048(tshi)003:5321: chos dang gang zag mchog la'ang skyon 'dogs byed /
NK048(tshi)003:5323: 6 / yul dus gang zag dman pa bdag 'dra yis //
NK048(tshi)003:5324: 'chad rtsod rtsom min dus min bdag gis 'tshal //
NK048(tshi)003:5325: de lta na yang 'khor lo'i mgon po yi //
NK048(tshi)003:5326: bka' yis gnang bskul don ldan mthong phyir dang /
NK048(tshi)003:5328: 7 / bdag yid goms phyir gzhan dag bskul phyir dang //
NK048(tshi)003:5329: phan pa'i sems phyir tshigs gsal 'di byas so //
NK048(tshi)003:5330: zab phyir dngos bstan tsam yang rtogs min na //
NK048(tshi)003:5331: tshig nus dang ni shugs bstan lta yang ci /
NK048(tshi)003:5333: 8 / de phyir rang mthong byis pas ma rtogs pas //
NK048(tshi)003:5334: ma tshang ma 'brel mi dgos la sogs pa'i //
NK048(tshi)003:5335: nyes pa gang mchis rtsa gsum srung ma dang //
NK048(tshi)003:5336: chos spyan ldan la 'chags kyi dag tshangs stsol /
NK048(tshi)003:5338: 9 / 'dis mtshon dus gsum dge tshogs ci mchis pa //
NK048(tshi)003:5339: bstan 'dzin zhabs brtan dge 'dun sde 'phel zhing //
NK048(tshi)003:5340: bshad sgrub bstan pa rtag tu dar rgyas te //
NK048(tshi)003:5341: snod bcud rdzogs ldan 'byor ba'i rgyu ru bsngo /
NK048(tshi)003:5343: 10 / bdag kyang deng nas byang chub mchog gi bar //
NK048(tshi)003:5344: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis mngon sum rjes bzung nas //
NK048(tshi)003:5345: bdud bzhi'i g.yul las rtag tu rnam rgyal te //
NK048(tshi)003:5346: rgyal ba kun gyi dam chos 'dzin gyur cig 11 /
NK048(tshi)003:5347: 'di dang gang 'brel 'jam pa'i dbyangs nyid kyis //
NK048(tshi)003:5348: byin rlabs rjes bzung tshe ring nad med cing //
NK048(tshi)003:5349: nges don snying po'i lam bzang mthong gyur te //
NK048(tshi)003:5350: phyogs dus kun tu 'dzin skyong spel gyur cig 12 /
NK048(tshi)003:5351: mkha' khyab zhing gi rgyal ba sras bcas dang //
NK048(tshi)003:5352: rab 'byams rtsa gsum rgya mtsho'i bden mthu yis //
NK048(tshi)003:5353: ji ltar smon pa 'grub pa'i mthun gyur dang //
NK048(tshi)003:5354: phyogs dus kun tu dge ba'i bkra shis stsol /
NK048(tshi)003:5356: 13 / de ltar mdo rgyud grub mtha'i zab khyad //
NK048(tshi)003:5357: nyams len bsgom pa'i gnad gsang khas len shan 'byed
NK048(tshi)003:5358: gyi gsang lam nges shes rin po che'i sgron me
NK048(tshi)003:5359: 'di rang chung nas mjal zhing mos pas zhugs kyang
NK048(tshi)003:5360: nges pa'i don gyis dbul na yang /
NK048(tshi)003:5361: gangs can na mngon par mtho ba'i ma g+ha d+ha
NK048(tshi)003:5362: gnyis par grags pa'i shar rgyal ba kahthoga rdo rje'i
NK048(tshi)003:5363: gdan gyi gan+d+ho la'i bstan pa bshad sgrub las gsum
NK048(tshi)003:5364: gyis gzhir bzhes su mdzad pa'i mkhyen brtse nus pa'i
NK048(tshi)003:5365: gter chen si tu rin po ches gsal du bskrun
NK048(tshi)003:5366: pa'i rgyud sde lha khang thub bstan bshad sgrub nor
NK048(tshi)003:5367: bu'i lhun por rje nyid kyi bdag rkyen las gzhung
NK048(tshi)003:5368: mang rabs kyi bshad pa bgyid tshe gzhung 'di 'chad
NK048(tshi)003:5369: skabs / bka' drin mtshungs bral bla ma rin po
NK048(tshi)003:5370: che thub bstan rgyal mtshan 'od zer gyi zhal snga
NK048(tshi)003:5371: nas bshad lung legs par mnos shing bsdus don zhig
NK048(tshi)003:5373: khyad par phyis su yang gdan sa rin po che
NK048(tshi)003:5374: der kun mkhyen sangs rgyas gnyis pa rje 'jam dbyangs
NK048(tshi)003:5375: bla ma'i bka' yi bsdu ba'i thugs stsol gnang ba'i
NK048(tshi)003:5376: bdag rkyen mchog gis dpal dus kyi 'khor lo dang
NK048(tshi)003:5377: / 'di ka sogs kyi bshad lung phul skabs /
NK048(tshi)003:5378: bdag cag gi bka' drin gsum ldan 'khor lo'i mgon
NK048(tshi)003:5379: po mdo sngags bstan pa yongs kyi rgyal mtshan snga
NK048(tshi)003:5380: 'gyur bstan pa'i srog shing mkhas grub yongs kyi gtsug
NK048(tshi)003:5381: rgyan mtshan brjod par dka' ba don gyi slad du
NK048(tshi)003:5383: 7'jam mgon si tu rin po kun gzigs chos kyi
NK048(tshi)003:5384: rgya mtsho zhes snyan pa'i ba dan srid na mngon
NK048(tshi)003:5385: par mtho ba gang gis bkra shis pa'i lha reg
NK048(tshi)003:5386: / gsang ba sngags kyi nang gi dam tshig gi rten mchog /
NK048(tshi)003:5387: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi ngo bo rdo rje dang dril bu /
NK048(tshi)003:5388: rdo rje'i lang tsho bsgrub pa'i rin po che'i ril
NK048(tshi)003:5389: bu dang bri gzhi shog bu bcas bka' lung gser
NK048(tshi)003:5390: gyi cod pan spyi bor yang yang rtsal gnang nyid
NK048(tshi)003:5391: / rten 'brel gyi dgongs gnad che bar mos shing
NK048(tshi)003:5392: rang yang mchog gi bstan bcos kyis bstan rgyun srid
NK048(tshi)003:5393: mthar spel ba'i sa bon bzang po rtsoms pa'i skal
NK048(tshi)003:5394: bzang du bgyid pa'i dad mos legs mthong dang /
NK048(tshi)003:5395: gzhan yang lung rigs smra ba'i chos kyi spyan ldan
NK048(tshi)003:5396: du mas bka' yi bskul ngor chud gsan ma phod
NK048(tshi)003:5397: par skyes sbyang blo gros ldan la 'di 'dras ci
NK048(tshi)003:5398: yang mi mkho bas na rje kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs
NK048(tshi)003:5399: bla ma'i legs bshad sogs mkhas pa'i rigs lam zab
NK048(tshi)003:5400: mo rnams bsdu zhing mdo rgyud zab mo'i lung sbyar
NK048(tshi)003:5402: yi ge mang du dogs nas rgyas spros dang tshig
NK048(tshi)003:5403: gi sdebs sbyor bskyungs nas rang 'dra'i skal mnyam las
NK048(tshi)003:5404: dang po pa shes brtson zhan pa'i rigs rnams la
NK048(tshi)003:5405: tshig don gsal ba'i 'bru 'grel go ci bde gtso
NK048(tshi)003:5406: bor byas na blo gros snang ba'i sgo 'byed du
NK048(tshi)003:5407: cung zad phan du re ba'i sems kyis o rgyan
NK048(tshi)003:5412: kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs mi pham rnam rgyal rgya mtsho
NK048(tshi)003:5413: sogs mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang phyug mang po'i zhabs
NK048(tshi)003:5414: rdul reg pa'i slob 'bangs yongs kyi tha shal sh+aakya'i
NK048(tshi)003:5415: btsun gzugs rmongs brtul gyi na ba tshe rabs kun
NK048(tshi)003:5416: tu o rgyan pad+ma'i bran du smon pa'i yid can
NK048(tshi)003:5417: kun bzang dpal ldan nam thub bstan kun bzang chos
NK048(tshi)003:5419: dpal sprul rin po che'i gdan sa'i mthil dkar chung
NK048(tshi)003:5420: ri khrod dben gnas dam pa'i yon tan phun sum
NK048(tshi)003:5421: tshogs par rig 'dzin 'chi med grub pa'i chos sgar
NK048(tshi)003:5422: thub bstan bshad sgrub gling du o rgyan sangs rgyas
NK048(tshi)003:5423: gnyis pa gangs ljongs bod yul dbus su byon te
NK048(tshi)003:5424: mdo sngags kyi chos 'khor bskor ba'i tshes bcu'i dus
NK048(tshi)003:5425: mchod dang bcas par rdzogs par bgyis pa 'dis kyang
NK048(tshi)003:5426: phyogs dus kun tu ris med pa'i bstan 'gro la
NK048(tshi)003:5427: sman par bslu ba med pa'i bla ma dkon mchog
NK048(tshi)003:5428: rtsa gsum rgya mtsho'i thugs bskyed dang smon lam bden
NK048(tshi)003:5429: pa chen po'i mthus byin gyis brlabs par mdzad de
NK048(tshi)003:5430: dar zhing rgyas la dge zhing bkra shis par gyur
